$Sentinel: $If you choose to go to Klaipeda, I recommend taking the Shadow Forest Road.{nl}The deep woods are dangerous, so try to stay away from there if you can.
$Man in Hiding
$Fi... Finally! Has help arrived?{nl}Huh?! It's just a kid? Hey... Are there still Vubbes outside?
$Ugh. Go away! Don't talk to me! We'll get caught by the Vubbes!{nl}This is my place so leave!
$What? Don't lie to me! I can smell the Vubbes from here.{nl}You can't fool an adult! Go away! Do not come near this barrel!
$Fi... Finally! Has help arrived?{nl}Huh?! It's just a kid? What are you looking at? Close the lid and move along!{nl}
$What's that paper you're holding? It looks familiar...{nl}Let me see that! What are you doing? Hey, there's an adult speaking to you!
$This paper, it's mine! I'm never giving it away again!!{nl}It's.. not something you need - I'll just rip it apart. There.
$Sheesh, that's lame...
$This isn't the first sign to appear after all the Goddesses vanished.{nl}Maybe one of these people will be the one to bring the Goddesses back.
$Soldier Blak
$Be warned!{nl}Monsters are attacking, so all civilians must evacuate!{nl}Why are those civilians in the military zone anyway?{nl}
$Ah, so you are the Revelator! I'm sorry, I didn't recognize you.{nl}Monsters are attacking the supply base at the moment.{nl}I need to get some important rations out from the base. Please help me!
$It was peaceful not too long ago, but now they are coming in groups.{nl}What's happening exactly?
$Even so, I felt uneasy...{nl}Who knew that they'd attack in such an absurd manner?
$The rations are in the First Supply Warehouse, which you can get to using the road on the upper side.{nl}Bring however little leftovers you can find...
$I wrote down who Sparnas is. Maybe it will be useful in the future.{nl}Though I may not appear so right now, I was a biologist four years ago.
$Please pass this report to Luders.{nl}He is probably at the Center Supply Camp.
$Officer Luders
$Ah, you must be the so called Revelator. Nice to meet you.{nl}Is this Block's report?{nl}
$Hmm... Is that so?{nl}They just destroyed the supplies and ran away. Even if Chupacabras had wings, I am sure they can't do something like that.{nl}
$This isn't enough.{nl}I am sorry, but please bring us Moody's report from Amzina Curved Path.
$I feel better since Luders is here.
$Soldier York
$Shaulems are crossing the road.{nl}I am in a panic myself, and I don't know what to do.{nl}I'm sure Luders won't allow this to happen... What should we do?
$Do you think the problem will be resolved just by defeating Sparnas?
$Thanks to your help, I think I can hold myself together.{nl}But... won't this kind of thing happen again? What should I do then...?

$Sparnas? We don't have a clear answer about it.{nl}It just appeared from the sky without any signs and destroyed all the supplies we had. Then, it quickly disappeared.{nl}We got headaches just hearing its cries.
$The place I just talked about is the Second Supply Warehouse.{nl}It is depressing to think how these kinds of things will be recurring in the future.

$Take it. I made some bait from old grains in the supplies.{nl}I will lure it from up there, so you stay here.{nl}Sparnas will definitely appear at one of these two places. Don't let it escape. Destroy it for sure.{nl}
$We may not get a second chance if we don't defeat it this time.{nl}It doesn't seem like they're idiots.
${memo X}I heard the sound of fighting so I came in a hurry. Did you defeat it?{nl}I only spotted Shaulems at my spot.{nl}Thank you. You have performed a meritorious deed.
$Adjutant Paulina
$We should recover the stolen supplies.{nl}We can't call ourselves soldiers of the Kingdom if we don't do anything about it.{nl}
$The stolen supplies were taken by the Shaulems in every Supply Warehouse, recover the supplies and bring them to Volda.
$I feel so fed up having to endure this all the time.{nl}Reinforcements should be coming soon, but what can we expect from such an incompetent kingdom?
$Adjutant Volda
$Thank you very much, but you must be late for other things.{nl}Besides we can't just sit here and wait. We plan to keep attacking.
$Secret Guardian
$The Goddess already foresaw this.{nl}Nothing can escape from her vision.
$Liaison Officer Niels
$Hello.{nl}Have you seen an old man who lost his way?{nl}His name is Jonas.{nl}
$You haven't seen him?{nl}Now which way would that feeble old fellow have gone to?
$Jonas is a descendant of the family that has been protecting this Mausoleum.{nl}He is a very important person to our lab team so please take good care of him.
$Archivist Jonas
$Our family has been waiting for you for a long time.{nl}It is time to give you something that we have been protecting for a long time.
$It is good to hear that Jonas has regained his consciousness.{nl}You are the person who casted the light signal, right?{nl}
$Ahylas, who saw the light, has arrived.{nl}Meet him downstairs.
$We haven't heard any news from Kepeck for a long time after we sent him supplies.{nl}We don't have enough people to form a search team, so please help us find him.
$Historian Beard
$Always be prepared for monster attacks.{nl}Especially in places like here.
$Mercenary Mirta
${memo X}Didn't I already warn you?{nl}Please be careful next time.
$Historian Kepeck
$Niels must have sent you.{nl}Well, if you are in a hurry, archive it yourself and take it back to Niels.
$When you go straight on the right road and cross the bridge, you will see the artifacts of the Great King Zachariel.{nl}Archive them and take the archives back to Niels. He'll understand.
$So this is Kepeck's archive... Mercenary Mirta was looking for this.{nl}You helped confirm the safety of two individuals. Thank you for your efforts.
$Ahylas Jonas
${memo X}Now take the unsealing stone and go to Broken Pillar Canyon. {nl}The Disciple of Gustas will teach you how to release the seal there.
${memo X}Were you not guided yet?{nl}Take it to the Disciple of Gustas in Broken Pillar Canyon.{nl}It is made to let only the chosen one enter.
$Disciple of Gustas
$Have you released the seal of Pagasa Cliff?{nl}It will start from now.
$Words engraved into a rock
$Do not touch or push the rock.
$I was waiting for you.{nl}The next seal is located on the way to Collapsed Sanctum.
$You don't know how eagerly we have waited for this moment.{nl}We really wanted to meet you.
$Gustas Jonas
$It's you.{nl}You are much more than what I had imagined.
$Soldier Alan
$You are a new recruit right?{nl}I received a patrolling order, but I guess you can go my behalf.
$You're good for a newbie.{nl}I had a horrible memory there once, so I don't want to go.
$I'm remembering something...
${memo X}You know that we are dispatched here to defeat Gaigalas right?{nl}Rookie. Can you take this report to Commander Wallis?
$Commander Wallace
$Why did you bring this report without Alan coming?{nl}Are you a new recruit?
$I can return home after we defeat Gaigalas.{nl}Well, I'd like to go home as soon as possible.
$Commander Wallace is at Bird Footprint Junction.
$I don't care how good you are. You are new here.{nl}It is an order. Bring some sap from Kepa Raiders.
$Soldiers these days, they lack guts.{nl}I hope you'll be a good influence to them.
$It's clear that we will win this battle.{nl}Why? Because the Owls are helping.
$The Kepa Raiders are near Ianutis Falls.{nl}To defeat Gaigalas, we will surely need them.
$Soldier Weiz
$Hey, rookie, are you taking a break?{nl}Get some fat from Duckys in Lengvas Garden.
$We will lure Gaigalas using Ducky Fat.{nl}Hey rookie, don't loaf around.
$Today will be the last day for Gaigalas.{nl}Are you ready, rookie?
$Next, we will get leather from Cronewts in Lengvas Garden.{nl}Hurry, soldier.
$We will win for sure this time.{nl}The Goddesses are on our side.
$You are pretty good for a rookie.{nl}It's disorganized here at the moment, so you can keep those ingredients for now.{nl}
$Get to know our soldiers while I make preparations for the battle.{nl}I will call you before we confront Gaigalas.
$When we burn the Ducky Fat, Gaigalas will appear after smelling the odor.{nl}Lengvas Garden will be a good place to burn it.
$My heart is pounding.{nl}I feel like my soul is throbbing with it.
$Old Owl Statue
$There's no one in this forest. Why are you here?{nl}
$Gaigalas?{nl}Defeating it without any assistance will be difficult.
$I have seen many deaths here.{nl}And I don't want to see any more sacrifices.
$I need Kepa Raider Sap and Cronewt Leather.
$Why do you have that?{nl}Hand it to me and I will make a Memory Fragment.
$With this Memory Fragment, I will revive the memories of our sleeping comrades.
$It will be difficult to defeat it without a Memory Fragment.{nl}Please bring Infroholder horns.
$How come you have all these ingredients?
${memo X}Those are people who are already gone from this world. {nl}They are repeating what happened back then because of their anger for Gaigalas.
${memo X}We can calm them if we defeat Gaigalas.{nl}Please go see the Worrying Owl.
$The Statue of the Worrying Owl
$Please help me wake my sleeping comrades and complete the magic of that day.{nl}With the Memory Fragment.
$They may become satiated.{nl}I will stand here while remembering my comrades.
$You will find Gaigalas when you go to Ishimtini Access Way.{nl}Please avenge the fallen soldiers.
$I was in an isolated place so I did not fall asleep.{nl}But, watching it all was painful for me.
$My comrades were attacked while they were trying to help the soldiers.
$Some symbols started to show on the body of Jonas after he drank the medicine.
$Archaeologist Dezic
$I am looking for my assistant named Irene.{nl}Can you defeat the monsters nearby so I can go look for her?
$I told her not to get excited even if she finds something.{nl}And yet she did it again.
$Thanks.{nl}I will go look for Irene.
$Technician Heinen
${memo X}This cable car can only be ridden by those with a permit. I'm afraid I have to tell you to turn back towards Vienesa Highlands.
${memo X}However, if you defeat the troublesome monsters around this area, I'll think about it.
${memo X}Isn't it better to use the cable car rather than getting injured passing through the monsters? Of course, this is if you can ride the cable car.
${memo X}Much better than I expected.{nl}I want to propose a deal to you.
${memo X}
${memo X}
$That barrier...hmm. When did it form?{nl}It has been there for quite some time now, but I can't remember exactly how long.{nl}
$I'm sure that barrier is responsible for the increasing number of monsters lately.{nl}
$We don't have many soldiers guarding this area.{nl}Who in their right mind would come here in this day and age?{nl}
$Rolandas Jonas
$No one knows what the Great King Zachariel tried to protect.{nl}And I'm sure that we're not the only ones who want to solve that mystery.
$Hurry, use the Great King's Key to release the seals.{nl}You should know what to do next afterwards.
$I found Irene, but I don't know how to rescue her.{nl}She is imprisoned in Rodoma 2nd Ruins, but I can't rescue her myself...
$Assistant Irene
{memo X}I can't move because of the barrier.{nl}Please break the three barriers in Rodoma Ruins.
$Are you not done yet? Ah, geez...
$I didn't expect that I would be taken into this kind of thing.{nl}Oh, the mess I caused from chasing that boy.
$Mercenary Glen
$So many researchers are disappearing these days.{nl}I'm trying to find clues by defeating some Sauga. Can you help us?
$The Saugas split their loot fairly among themselves.{nl}Maybe we can find some clues from them.
$Fortunately they are very old.{nl}So that means these cases are not due to monsters.
$This is a very dangerous place where many go missing due to monsters or a misstep.{nl}However, what is interesting isn't that.{nl}
$When these people disappear, no one else notices.{nl}It's as if memories about those who disappeared are erased. Strange, isn't it?{nl}
{memo X}Please defeat all monsters nearby to prevent anything from happening.{nl}There were reports that the monsters at the 1st Architects' Site had turned violent.
$Splendid.{nl}We will be safe for now.
{memo X}Monsters are coming!{nl}They probably found out I was released.
$The Goddesses have sent you?{nl}I never thought that you would protect me.{nl}
$Where did that huge scorpion go? This is very bad!
$I should go see Dezic.{nl}I hope to see you again in the future.
$Someone must have done something strange to the monsters protecting the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}What were they thinking?
$Sir, get a hold of yourself. Sir!
$New Researcher
$I lost my important research materials at the Abandoned Old Workshop.{nl}The monsters must have taken them... Should I just give up?
$I am so glad I get to see the Royal Mausoleum myself, but the monsters... They are scary.
$Thank you so much.{nl}But you should also check the Records Repository.
$The entrance to the Royal Mausoleum is hidden within this gigantic canyon somewhere.{nl}The start of the canyon begins here.
$Many experts have come here to conduct research on the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Maybe we can find some clues about the Medis Diena here.
$Why are there so many monsters in the canyon when there is so little plant life around?
$What happened to my request? Is it not done yet?
$Look closely at the ground.{nl}It may have fallen down.
$Hmm, only these ones?{nl}Well, thank you for finding this much at least.{nl}I can just copy again from the beginning.
$Niels sent you too?{nl}I am not going. I have to research the wild flowers.{nl}
$I guess what I saw was an illusion.{nl}I must reward you for protecting a mineralogist like me.{nl}
$Yes.{nl}Bring me my archives from Niels.
$Jonas told you to bring his archive?{nl}Okay. In return, please bring him some medicine.{nl}
$The medicine will help recover his mind.{nl}Davio at the right side of the Research Camp has the medicine.
$Jonas is the head of the family that protects the Royal Mausoleum of Zachariel, the Great King.{nl}He was very healthy before, but these days he is old and weak.{nl}
$It was after Jonas went out to a visit with his servant.{nl}Jonas was found with dementia and the servant went missing even until today.
$Please take good care of Jonas.{nl}It would be a big problem if he got hurt.
$Davio is at the right side of the camp.{nl}I hope the medicine works well.
$Finally, I remember everything.{nl}I am the head of the family that protects the Royal Mausoleum... Who are you?{nl}
$Revelator. If this is the will of the Goddess, then you must be qualified.{nl}You have a job to do, so follow me to Beacon Hill Pass.
$I have made Niels and you worry...
$I will lead the way and you will handle any monsters we encounter.{nl}I am counting on you.
$The time is now. Please go on ahead to Beacon Hill Pass.
{memo X}I am sure that you are qualified for this.{nl}Goddess Laima has led all these.
$Finally the hidden treasure can be passed down to someone.{nl}I regret not recognizing you sooner due to my senility.
$Zachariel told us to grant his hidden treasure to a qualified person.{nl}You can check whether you are qualified with the Eyes of the Great King.
$We have one more responsibility besides protecting the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}And that is to protect the inheritance until a qualified person comes.{nl}
$We have no idea what exactly the hidden treasure is.{nl}The king just told us to protect it so we are just following his order.
$Medicine Dealer
$Hmm... Well, there's a herb that only grows at Metos Canyon.{nl}Please bring me that.
$Metos Canyon is the best place to wake up one's consciousness. Especially for an old man.
$That's right. You're pretty sharp, aren't you?{nl}
$Alright, it's done.{nl}Take this to Davio.
$Merchant Davio
$I brought that old man's medicine. {nl}But we spent a great deal of effort getting it. I should charge you more.{nl}
{memo X}The gold that Lichenclops have in this town will be enough.{nl}Bring those to the Medicine Dealer in Kapas Highway.
$This will be enough. Davio sent you, right?{nl} I still need one more ingredient to make the medicine truly effective.
$To make the medicine, I needed to find the cause of Jonas' symptoms and it drove me crazy.{nl}Funnily enough, it was caused by a spell that was used long ago.{nl}
$I heard a rumor that Zachariel erased the memories of all workers after building the Mausoleum.{nl}That should be the spell casted on Jonas, though he is also a bit senile.
$It was tough to get that old man's medicine.{nl}But, there's nothing I cannot get.
$It will be completed once you melt it in the honey that you have. Take it with you.
$That medicine works well. Make him swallow it somehow.
$You're late.{nl}Did you bring my archive?
$Go to the Abandoned Old Workshop.{nl}Some old man is wandering around there. I think it's Jonas.
$What is that? It smells like mead!
{memo X}I feel dizzy.{nl}What am I doing here anyway?
$Best of luck on the search.{nl}I left all the supplies and my belongings when the monsters were chasing after me.{nl}Can you go find the scattered supplies first?
$I don't have much to say to the humble mercenary.{nl}Although I was okay even on the Medis Diena, I am certain this place is cursed.{nl}
$How long has it been since I came here?{nl}Where is Mirta and who are you?
$I'm trying to remember something but it keeps fading whenever I get close.
$Vaidotas
${memo X}That smell.. I think the purifying device in the mine is broken.{nl}We better repair it quickly. The kidnapped villagers might suffocate.

$Do you know about the Legend of Cunningham?{nl}The legend states that a great demon was sealed here in the Crystal Mine.{nl}There is a book with more details about it at the Mine Worker's Resting Place in Crystal Mine 2F.{nl}

{memo X}$Anyway, my guess is that the demon is re-awakening and is controlling the Vubbes.{nl}The Bishop's dream and the Legend of Cunningham... I feel they may be a sign that something huge is about to happen.{nl}
$Only the Goddess would know if it will be hope or despair.{nl}
$The purifier can be easily fixed by anyone but it may be hard to find the parts needed.{nl}In that case, use the compass that I gave you to search for them.{nl}
$Well then, I have some things to do so I will meet you in Crystal Mine 3F.{nl}I wish for your fortune of war in the name of the Goddess.
$If you can't find the parts needed to repair the purifier, use the compass I gave you.{nl}It'll help you find them.
$Village Aunt
$You've come to save us? Right?
$It's alright, We are going to be okay now!
$Village Girl
$Please save us. Please..
$Please release me. Please..
$Mr. Juan
$I get furious whenever I see those Vubbes who ruined my hometown.{nl}That's why I want to help people like you who fight against the Vubbes.
$I would have left already if this wasn't my hometown.{nl}Where on earth were all the Vubbes hiding before they crawled out?
$Pharmacist lady
$Thanks for your help last time.{nl}Without you, I would have never gotten this much ingredients.
{memo X}$Perhaps the person that the Goddess sent was you.{nl}You are the most merciful person I have ever seen among the Revelators.
$Soldier Jays
${memo X}I will protect this village for my dead comrades.
$Even if the world changes, I will never forgive the Vubbes.
$Soldier Edgar
$These are the rations that we gathered from East Siauliai Woods.{nl}I will never, ever lose them again. Ever.
$Thanks to you, I received this much food.{nl}I am relieved.
$Knight Commander Uska
$Is this slate the evidence of salvation?{nl}It just looks like an old slate to me.
{memo X}$Ask the mayor of the Miners' Village about a way to Leaf Veil Plateau.{nl}I will send the message to the Paladin Master first. {nl}May the blessings of Goddess be with you.
$It would be good to ask the Bokor Master to interpret this slate.{nl}She lives at the end of Klaipeda's Residential Area so go pay her a visit.
{memo X}$Use your time wisely.{nl}No one else fully knows your future.
$So you finally came.{nl}What did the Bokor Master tell you?
{memo X}$I'm also curious about the girl who cracked the seal.{nl}This is not a seal that can easily be broken.
${memo X}If the Bokor Master told you that I would know it..{nl}There's one place that comes to mind.{nl}
{memo X}$The high gardens that the Goddess mentioned could be an area within Leaf Veil Plateau. I heard the Paladin Master is there, uploading a long term promise.
$Miners' Village Mayor
$Welcome. Aren't you our town's savior?{nl}
{memo X}$Leaf Veil Plateau, huh? If you take the road between the two bridges below, you'll reach Silverstream Gorge.
${memo X}So this revelation is from Goddess Laima and we have to collect all these for the Goddess to regain her powers?{nl}That is amazing.
$Oh, please do not reveal the fact that a revelation has been found unless it is absolutely necessary.{nl}Doing so may only create confusion if the rumors spread.
Ah, you mean the report.{nl}At first, those Siaulagos did something strange to the supplies, but they ran away after a while when Sparnas came.{nl}
I was spotted by those Siaulagos when they were running away, so I engaged in a battle..{nl}Yes.. And as you can see, I lost it. The report, I mean.{nl}Aren't they bastards?
When you find the report, please hand it over to Luders right away.{nl}I feel terrified to think what those bastards did to our supplies.
Yes. After seeing Moody's report, I am confident that they put something in our supplies to lure Sparnas.{nl}Such as Old Grains that birds go crazy on.
The soldiers on patrol found the place where Siaulambs' stolen goods are packed.{nl}How about we steal them for ourselves?{nl}Let's make it known that we're not as weak as they think.{nl}
You should fight fire with fire.{nl}We will keep attacking until they fully realize that they've made a mistake.
We're not going to suffer anymore.{nl}Thanks for your efforts.
It will be Ziedo Pond.{nl}I heard there are many Siaulambs, so be careful.
I have not heard anything else about the Bishop's dream.{nl}Sorry, I can't be of much help.
$Klaipeda Guard Captain
$Go ahead to Klaipeda.{nl}Commander Uska is waiting for you in Klaipeda Central Plaza.{nl}I heard the Bishop also had a dream about the Goddess... it appears to concern that day.
$Klaipeda Guard
$Thank you for making your way here.{nl}If there is still this much left even after Titas handled it himself, can you imagine how it was before?
$Mercenary Tobi
$Do you want to do a simple task for me?{nl}I'm a known face so it will be hard for me to do it myself.
$If you don't want to, then you don't have to.{nl}There are plenty of people around who can do this.
$You passed.{nl}The strength you possess is tremendous.
$It's definitely worth it.{nl}Even if the King spent all his assets building the Mausoleum, its size is huge.
$Hey you. That equipment is not permitted.{nl}Do not leave it lying around.{nl}
$Okay. Bring me some kind of evidence that those people are making counterfeits.{nl}Do whatever it takes.
$I am looking for the evidence of artifact forgery.{nl}The first thing you must do is gather the equipment necessary for digging.
{memo X}$Of course you should show us your skills.{nl}Defeating Desert Chupacabras or Zinutes will be enough to prove yourself.
$Supply Officer
$Thank you for your help.{nl}I think this will be enough.{nl}
{memo X}$)}{nl}If you have time, please tell our troops to assemble.{nl} If you choose not to, you may just go ahead to Klaipeda.
$Scout
${memo X}Go back, it's dangerous!{nl}Kepas will soon be marching in.
$Oh, you're a Revelator.{nl}It must be fate that we are to fight together. Let me give you the inside scoop.
${memo X}You mentioned that we need to assemble, right?{nl}Help me find some missing baggages and I'll go as soon as I can.
$You haven't found the baggages yet? I can't go back without it.
$Thank you. You found it sooner than I expected.{nl}
$If you follow the road to the north, you will find the Search Scout.{nl}Good luck.
$Laimonas
${memo X}Have you ever offered worship to the Statue?{nl}If not, I'd really recommend it.
$That depends on which Goddess it is.{nl}If you follow the road to the right you will find the Statue of Goddess Zemyna.
${memo X}I do worry that the monsters might harm the Goddess Statue.
$I am happy that the statue is unharmed.{nl}The monsters here know to fear the Goddess.{nl}
$Go down the Shadow Forest Road and you should arrive at Klaipeda shortly.{nl}Well then, may be blessings of the Goddess be with you.
${memo X}Please do me a favor if you are headed to Klaipeda.{nl}It's not easy to go back and forth from Klaipeda because of the Infrorocktors nowadays.
$Maybe taking care of the Statues will make the Goddesses return sooner...
{memo X}$Follow the road on the left at the camp crossroads.{nl}{-scp SCR_DIALOG_NPC_ANIM(
$)} You'll meet the troops right away.
$)}Alright, good job.{nl}You'll arrive at Klaipeda shortly if you follow the Shadow Forest Road.{nl}Don't forget to drop by Uska.
$Battle Commander
$I will have my men notify the troops to assemble.{nl}You may return to Titas to let him know.
$It's nothing too difficult.{nl}If you don't want to help, I'll send you off to Klaipeda right away.
$Search Scout
{memo X}$It sure is a problem.{nl}I didn't know Kepas could grow that big.
$Shouldn't a Revelator be heading to Klaipeda instead of hanging around here?
${memo X}I feel so relieved to be stationed in the Western Woods.{nl}There are some places where you'd rather die than be stationed.
${memo X}When you see a Goddess Statue, try offering your worship.{nl}Surely something nice will happen.
$This is a dangerous area. What are you doing here?
$Thank you.{nl}I better go report to Titas about the roaming Large Kepa.
${memo X}Weird... That is not a type of monster you'd face in a place like this.{nl}It must be hard to travel around.
${memo X}Assemble already?{nl}That's tough. There's still a pile of missions.
{memo X}$First, defeat the Hanamings around here.{nl}Then, collect their petals.
$Even if the Goddess arrived, I will not go until the mission is completed.
${memo X}Yes. This should be enough.{nl}Here is a pill that will restore your stamina instantly. I have enough of it so I will give you this as a gift.{nl}

${memo X}Stamina is consumed when you move.{nl}You can recover stamina by destroying a Tree Root Crystal or by resting.{nl}But you might not have time for that when you are being chased by monsters.{nl}That's when this pill comes in handy.
${memo X}I heard news from my men and was becoming worried.{nl}All is well if it ended up good.
$Klaipeda Resident
$)} {nl}When do you think the Goddess is coming back?{nl}Even if I ask the Revelators, all they say is that they must go to Klaipeda...
$Are you a Revelator?{nl}Didn't the Goddess appeared in your dream?{nl}I've heard so from the soldiers.
$Trooper
$I wonder what the Goddesses are doing...
${memo X}Thank you for making your way here.{nl}I am Uska, the Knight Commander in charge of Siauliai and Klaipeda.
${memo X}The Bishop also dreamed of a revelation.{nl}He told me to send the Revelators to the Crystal Mine.{nl}
$Let me know when you are ready to go to the Crystal Mine.{nl}I'll tell you the location and how to get in.
$The Bishop told us to send the Revelators to the Crystal Mine.{nl}He said the Goddess told him to do so.{nl}

${memo X}But the Miners' Village is at war with the Vubbes {nl}and its entrance is limited to authorized people only. Knight Aras is the one managing troops in the East Siauliai Woods. {nl}You should talk to him.

${memo X}Monsters have been around for a long time, {nl}but they only started becoming violent four years ago. {nl}The ones that were most affected would be the plant types. They did not exist before.{nl}
$Certainly, beasts were no exception.{nl}When monsters that seem to have fused with demons appeared, I thought we were close to the end.
$Knight Aras
${memo X}Aren't you hurt?{nl}I appreciate that you got rid of the Poata, because it was really reckless.
${memo X}You want to get into the Crystal Mine?{nl}The Miners' Village is currently at war with the Vubbes and it's very dangerous,{nl}so I cannot permit that.
${memo X}And our troops are in no condition to guard you.{nl}I'm sorry but you will have to go back.
$If you can't defeat the Pokubus, you'll have to give up going into the Miners' Village.
${memo X}Thank you.{nl}Do not worry, I'll keep my promise.
$Outpost Sentinel

{memo X}$Although I'm worried about the situation in the Miners' Village, I'm not getting used to the constant fighting and resting. If only the Chupacabras could be dealt with to some degree, we would be much more well off.
$Other monsters are also flooding into areas where Chupacabras live.{nl}Miners' Village is a problem on its own but there are just too many things to pay attention to.
$Thank you.{nl}Your assistance really helps lift our spirits.
$With your abilities, I have one more favor to ask.{nl}Can you help us drive out the Chupacabras in the supply camp too?
$The Miners' Village is a problem but the situation here isn't so good either. {nl}We have to prepare some measures before the number of monsters increase even more??
$You're done already?{nl}I've never seen anyone as fast as you before.
$I'm on a mission to find out the cause of the sudden increase in monsters in the Eastern Woods.{nl} I also act as the intermediary in supplying the Miners' Village.{nl}
$There are other knights out in Miners' Village. {nl}Frankly, the battle here is taking longer than we thought, as we imagined the battle would end as soon as Aras was here.
{memo X}$Since you're going to help, please defeat the Giant Gray Chupacabras too.{nl}They are the culprits stealing our supplies.
{memo X}$Giant Gray Chupacabras should appear now that you have defeated the Chupacabras.{nl}Well then, thanks for assisting.
$Thank you.{nl}Now we can finally get to work easily.
{memo X}$Finding the cause of the monsters is important,{nl}but I'm more worried about supplies not making it to the Miners' Village.
$The movement of Weavers in the lower areas of the stream seems suspicious.{nl}Seems like they're trying to interfere with supplies to the Miners' Village.
$We might have to give up our current supplies and support ourselves until the next batch of supplies arrive.
$Thank you.{nl}With you helping us out like this, we will not be defeated.
$The next mission is to find the cause of the increasing number of monsters.{nl}Popolions have a big appetite so I hope we can find a clue.
$Although the Miners' Village is in trouble, given that the situation has reached the Eastern Woods,{nl}we can't assure the safety of Klaipeda.{nl}We can just hope that Klaipeda is doing well.
$Operations Officer
$Were you sent by Aras?{nl}This is a piece of Vubbe clothing. Ah... so that's why...
I think the Vubbes of the Miners' Village have made their way into the woods.{nl}Maybe that's the reason behind the abnormal surge in monsters too.{nl}
$I better ask Aras to search for Vubbes in other regions too.{nl}In the meantime, I would like you to take a look at the upper areas.
$We haven't searched the upper areas yet.{nl}Of course, we should be sending troops but I ask for your help as this is an urgent matter.
$You saw a Vubbe Fighter but missed it?{nl}We also got a report of Vubbe Fighter appearing in the Southern area.{nl}
$First, talk to the Search Scout in the lower bridge of Bulvjes.{nl}This will become a tedious drawn out campaign if we let loose that Vubbe Fighter.
${memo X}So the Vubbe Fighters are the reason behind the growing number of monsters.{nl}Please find out how many Vubbe Fighters there are.{nl}
$Under the circumstances, it makes sense that the monsters are controlled by the Vubbe Fighters.{nl}But deep down, you just don't want to believe it.
$Following your report, there are no more Vubbe Fighters in these woods.{nl}
{memo X}$It appears the Vubbe Fighters have been defeated. {nl}I alerted the Search Scout at the Nudegi Felled Area.
$Supply Soldier
$We need Weaver Claws as a part of supplies to be sent to Miners' Village {nl}but we just don't have time to look for them.{nl}What do we do?
$Actually, it doesn't make sense for the Supply Soldier to directly retrieve the supplies.{nl}It should have come straight from Klaipeda.
$Thank you.{nl}Unexpected help always feels good.
$In fact, everything would have been fine if the Pokubus weren't around.{nl}The Pokubus were running wild and that's why were weren't able to retrieve all the supplies.
$I don't know why they suddenly started to prey on the supplies.{nl}Could something be commanding them?
$Thank you.{nl}I envy your ability.
$Eastern Woods Search Scout
$Oh, it's you.{nl}I have heard from the Operations Officer.{nl}
{memo X}$A Vubbe Fighter is hiding deep in the Nudegi Felled Area.{nl}We got the orders to kill it, but it may be safer to wait for additional troops.
$I'm just a Search Scout but it was my first time to see a Vubbe Fighter up close.
$Awesome. You got rid of it by yourself.{nl}Go ahead and report to Aras. He'll be very pleased.
$You mean you really defeated the Vubbe Fighter?{nl}Well then, now we can be relieved since the number of monsters will no longer grow.
$Of course. As promised, I will grant you access to the Miners' Village.{nl}Please wait.
$If you find any clues, let the Operations Officer in the northern area know about it.
$I think the battle at the Miners' Village is in a very bad situation.{nl}It's too late to move the troops so please go on ahead to support the Miners' Village.
$They have low IQ, but these monsters build groups and live as a community.{nl}They used to appear only occasionally in the deeper areas of the mines... Could they be expanding their forces?{nl}
$Whatever the reason is, Vubbes expanding their territory is a big problem.{nl}Monsters that lose their territory to Vubbes will be forced to make their way into our base.
It's a single road from here on so you'll be able to find the people easily.{nl}
{memo X}Oh, let me give you some helpful information in return for your your help.{nl}The evidence of salvation that the Revelators are looking for can be found in the Closed Area.
One thing, there's something that keeps bothering me.{nl}A vague feeling of something alien.
$Miner
$Thank you for saving me.{nl}It's like a dream for a revelator to come and save us.{nl}
$The Closed Area?{nl}If you absolutely need to get in there, gather the mysterious stones that the Vubbes carry.{nl}The crystal wall should open when you touch enough stones to it.
$I was collecting supplies to be sent to the Miners' Village, but the monsters stole them all.{nl}
The supply boxes contain dangerous explosives and collecting them is not an easy task.
They couldn't have gone far.{nl}It would have been better if it just exploded on the way.
$Mercenary Lindt
Thank you again.{nl}I should return to my commander soon. I think I can return to him after I get some more rest.
I knew you would.{nl}One more thing, the ground near the Closed Area is weak so the entrance has been blocked for a long time.{nl}
The kidnapped people are veteran miners so they may know how to get in.{nl}Well then, may the blessings of the Goddess be with you.
It wasn't long ago.{nl}I felt a strange power while performing experiments in the Closed Area.{nl}It was different from the mana that we know but it was very warm.{nl}
But some force did not allow me to approach, as if it had an owner already.{nl}A few days after the incident, the bishop dreamed about the evidence of salvation.{nl}
Perhaps the evidence of salvation is the force I felt...{nl}That's what I think.
$All I see are monsters and we're out of supplies.{nl}I'm also curious how the battle situation is in Miners' Village.
$Until I'm assigned a new task, I'm thinking of going back to my duties as a search scout.{nl}Observing the monsters, you know.
${memo X}The Miners' Village is under siege and entrance is prohibited for civilians.{nl}Remember that we can't guarantee your safety if you do not get my permission.
{memo X}$You have to cheer up.{nl} Even Aras is holding on.
Goddess Zemyna overlooks the Earth.{nl}There are rumors that the Goddess has abandoned us, but that's nonsense.{nl}Her statue still shines beautifully when you pray to it.
$Vubbes suddenly came pouring in into the Siauliai Woods from the Crystal Mines.{nl}Thus, the Miners' Village situated between the Mines and the Woods became a battlefield.{nl}

$For safety reasons, I can't permit entrance to the Miners Village. {nl}Of course it would be a different story if your skill are good enough to ensure your own safety {nl}without the guards' protection.
Gosh, it could have been really dangerous.{nl}That huge thing was hiding so well.
It's very important to study monsters at times like this.{nl}It's like weather forecasts where you try to find out the cause and see what would happen.
I am certain that the Leaf Bugs in Uoros farm stole it.{nl}They did steal from us once before.
Send my regards to the Guard Captain when you meet him.
${memo X}In order to test if your skills are good enough to enter the Miners Village,{nl}I need you to help us solve a problem we have.{nl}
First, take back the farm from the Pokubus.{nl}I believe this would be a fairly easy task
There seems to be a gap in the rock where you can insert something.
Let's search Bulvjes Farm first.{nl}But don't chase them or something as it can be dangerous.
It makes me wonder if you're an envoy of the Goddess.{nl}Anyway, the supply camp is located further below the farm.
{memo X}
Vubbes are emerging inside the Mine Gallery so be sure to stay together in groups of five.
Equipment Merchant
Even at times like this, I struggle to find the best items I can. You can't go easy in terms of dealing with your customers.

Monsters attack and steal from people who buy items from me. I think they know I can tell which items are good.{nl}I feel sorry for those who were attacked but it also proves that the items are worth it.
$The monsters never raided Klaipeda, but with Uska gone, it's hard to be at ease.{nl}You have you watch out for yourself at times like this.
$I want to travel with a single weapon in hand like an adventurer... Yeah there's no way I could.

$If you listen to the soldiers, they'll use terms only they can understand to make things sound complicated.{nl}But when I ask my soldier friend, he says it's not like they are talking about anything important.
$Be cautious of people who sell weapons from monsters without a permit.{nl}They'll try and scam you into to buying useless things or sell you things at ridiculously high prices.
{memo X}Item Merchant
$It's the little things you forget to buy that makes you regret when you travel.{nl}Better buy enough of them when you can.
$I feel sorry for the injured. Can't we just get along with the monsters?
{memo X}I'd rather stay safe and at peace with lower sales than have sales go up because of people worrying when the monsters might attack.
$I sell things that people need, but I sometimes think it would've been better if I was a healer,{nl}because that way I could be closer to the explorers to help them.
$I hear strange howling from the distance. Could it be the sound of the monsters?
$People say I'm weird and I talk too much, but I don't mind. Even if I'm really weird like they say, that doesn't mean the items I sell are weird.
Blacksmith
{memo X}Hello.{nl}I can help you repair items but I can't craft new ones because I don't have the materials.{nl}Go on and choose from whatever is available.
$Klaipeda Resident
$It's true these are tough times, but everyone is looking out for the soldiers.
$Aside from everything else, I want to eat till I'm full.{nl}You need to eat to have strength.
$Why have the Goddesses disappeared?{nl}Everyone is looking for where they've gone, but no one is asking why they've disappeared.
$I can't eat, sleep, or move about freely because of those monsters.{nl}In the old days, we used gather herbs or pick fruits in the Siauliai Woods you know.
$Everyone is talking about the war wherever you go.{nl}Like who and how much people are hurt or who's assigned to where.{nl}All the stories about the war makes me sick!
$I heard they will send soldiers who aren't even trained into the nest of monsters.{nl}Might as well gather the old people and make them soldiers too.
$My life is just a cycle of anxiety and anger.{nl}The Goddess should return soon.
$There are suddenly many people who dreamed about the revelation.{nl}Could it be a sign that something is about to happen again?{nl}
$The Bishop of Klaipeda saw a Goddess in his dream. Did you also have such a dream, Revelator?
$Mother of a Soldier
{memo X}$)}My son has enlisted in the Army.{nl}He said who would, if not him, at such difficult times like this.
{memo X}$)}Monster are growing and the forest is too chaotic for people to live in.{nl}At least, Klaipeda is safe.
$)}Even if Klaipeda is safe, aren't the other cities in chaos?{nl}Putting aside the capital, Fedimian has totally collapsed except for the Sacred Area.
{memo X}$)}It's a good thing that my son accomplished his dream of becoming a solder...{nl}But the monsters are rising and I'm worried he might get hurt.
$)}Maybe Klaipeda is where the Goddess has bestowed her blessings.{nl}I hope the blessings will also reach my son in the army.
$)}My husband used to be a miner. I am relieved that he isn't anymore.{nl}It would be too dangerous if the monsters raid at times like this, wouldn't it?
$)}Many refugees came from the fallen town.{nl}Our food supplies are running short but we still have to help each other.
$I may not bring in the items of the best quality, but isn't having all items necessary a skill of its own?{nl}I've got to work hard to get through tough times.
${memo X}I think the best weapons and armor are the ones that you get used to over a long period time.{nl}In order to do so, you must first start by buying good items.
$I used to pack my things and go around travelling in the past but I guess that would be difficult now.
$Try using a variety of weapons. Eventually, you'll find one that fits you.
$The armors that suit you guarantee your safety.
$A single armor piece can mean the difference between life and death. Look around to see if you have everything you need.
$It's free to look around.
$Look around and see if you need anything.
$Look around carefully. You might find something that can help you.
$Sometimes, things that you just look at without any thoughts can actually fit you very well, so take a look and think about it.
$You can just look around. Find me anytime you need something.
$We have enough items, so take a look.
$You need good weapons and armor to prepare for the monsters. That is what I'm selling.
$Items I have for sale are flawless. These are all new.
$If you don't prepare the equipment now, you might regret it later, when you're surrounded by monsters. Have a look around when you can.
$I've prepared the best items I can find. The prices aren't bad either so look around.
${memo X}The things I sell are good both in price and quality.
$If you have the time, take a look at the items I have for sale.
$I hope good items will find good owners.
$Yes this was originally a bustling shopping area. But everyone left as it became difficult to live here...
$I was too busy to afford to talk to the people when they gathered.
${memo X}A lot of people seem to be coming thanks to Uska's recruitment notice.
$There's a lot of preparation for when you go to battle with the monsters.
$Times are difficult but I decided not to raise prices. Have a look.
$Monsters mistake things for food and just swallow it. They must be really hungry.
$I once encountered a monster in Siauliai Woods. I just stood still and the monster went away...{nl}I guess there are monsters that do not make the first attack on people.
$I've heard that some people sell things that are dropped from those who were running away from the monsters. I don't sell stuff like that, so don't worry about that.
{memo X}Everything aside, I do not lie about my items being cheap. The stuff I sell is priced just right.
$Feel free to look around anytime.
$Things can turn south if you don't prepare enough potions.
$It's free to look around the things I sell.
$How do you continue running a business if you don't make profits?
$I thought about moving my business to somewhere else, but I had to stay for the people who come to me.
$I don't think of making a lot of money. I just need enough to live by.
$I think we have to help each other at difficult times like these. I hope I can be of help.
$Can I help you? I'll show you what we have prepared.
$Please feel free to come back if you need anything.
$You don't necessarily have to buy things so feel free to look around.
$I sold items even before the monsters appeared.
$Don't you feel good just looking at the items even if you don't buy them?
$You can find me anytime if you want a closer look at the items I'm selling.
$What would it be like to go on an adventure fighting monsters? I was born and raised here, so I sometimes wonder how it would be in other areas.
Sometimes when I see the soldiers who protect us from the monsters, I want to give them things for free.{nl}Although it's really not easy for me to do so...
${memo X}Better were the days when Commander Uska took care of Klaipeda himself.
$Isn't there a way to defeat all the monsters running wild in Siauliai Woods?
$I hope some skilled person could drive out all the monsters.
$Living in a place where monsters are running wild outside is driving me nuts.{nl}And I can't think of going anywhere else because of the monsters...
$I'd wipe out all the monsters if I had the skills.{nl}Why are the soldiers leaving the monsters alone?
$I am tired of living a life running away from the monsters.
$Thinking of the peaceful days in the past makes me feel like I'm dreaming.{nl}Being awake is like a very long nightmare.
$I want to run away to another place if I can.{nl}Is there a future for the kingdom?
$I can't sleep well nowadays.{nl}It's all because of those monsters.
$To live at peace in a world where monsters are running wild... Impossible.
$Does salvation even exist?{nl}Hanging on each day in hopes of the Goddess's return is really miserable.
$We can't go out nor can we just stay. Is this really ok?{nl}I can't seem to find an answer no matter how much I think about it.
$Getting used to a world where we live together with monsters, what could be more terrible and scary?
$I heard that there are people who study monsters.{nl}What is wrong with them?{nl}Those monsters are bad creatures that could attack us at any moment.
$I'm afraid that Klaipeda might become like the capital.{nl}It's already being called the fallen city, no?
$Many people are afraid of Bokors for summoning the zombies.{nl}But we curse the enemy of the Goddess.
${memo X}Intelligence, calm judgement and cold rationality.{nl}These are the qualities required for our Cryomancers.
{memo X}Fire is grace sent to us by the Goddess Gabija.{nl}You cannot become a great Pyromancer if you overlook that.
${memo X}It is vain death that lies at the end for those who only seek dauntlessness.{nl}If you wish to achieve true justice, lift the shield of Peltasta.
$After the Goddesses disappeared, the capital was destroyed on Medis Diena.{nl}I hope more people will become Peltastas to protect the world.
$Rodelero Master
{memo X}
$Squire Master
$We are in chaos nowadays, but we used to live in honorable times before.{nl}Well.. that's all in the past now.
$Wizard Master
$No matter how much magic talent you have, it is useless unless you train hard.
$You must be brave in order to protect the kingdom.{nl}But for that bravery to be distinguishable from recklessness, your skills need to be good enough.
{memo X}The Goddesses may be all gone but my powers are still doing fine, right?{nl}I'm sure it must be proof that Goddess Gabija is at least safe somewhere.
{memo X}
{memo X}
Quarrelshooter Master
It's painful to see people come to Klaipeda seeking refuge from the monsters.{nl}If they were Quarrelshooters they wouldn't have to.
Ranger Master
{memo X}I heard monsters swarm in flocks outside of Klaipeda.{nl}If I could improve my skill instead of attacking them one by one...
Sapper Master
People shouldn't do things they'll regret.{nl}Four years ago, on the Medis Diena, I lost even those of whom I wanted to ask for forgiveness.{nl}
Archer Master

{memo X}Defeating enemies one by one from a distance is the beauty of the bow and arrow.{nl}It doesn't matter how many shots you have to take, the shots that actually hit are the ones that count, right?
Priest Master
To suspect the Goddess does a Priest no good, for only faith can support him.
Sadhu Master
Truthful and divine entities  are inherent in all things.
Rexipher
{memo X}You're late. {nl}So, you want to save the woman?
Technician Orion
{memo X}I think this phrase indicates very dangerous monsters.{nl}I think we should've just ripped up the note to begin with.
Please use this bait on the way to Geltonas Highland.{nl}If you hide in the trees it shouldn't be long before a monster comes out.
Good job.{nl}Let's get moving before any stronger monsters find us.
{memo X}If this note is true, we might die at any time.{nl}By the way, what happened to the person who wrote it?

There's something called a Dumble Ball.{nl}According to some soldiers, the Siaulambs changed dramatically after eating a Dumble Ball.{nl}It was as if they lost all fear... The solders said they'd never seen anything like it.{nl}

Fortunately, soldiers on patrol found where the Dumble Balls are.{nl}If we can find that place and burn it down, then we will have a chance.{nl}Please go look in the old wooden box at 4th supply warehouse.
Please don't ever think about eating it.{nl}I don't know what the ingredients are, but you will suffer from terrible diarrhea.
That's good. Please destroy it.{nl}The next location will be the 2nd supply warehouse.
You did such a dirty thing on our supplies.{nl}I can't endure my anger.
Soldiers are reporting that other monsters are appearing at Amzina Curved Path.{nl}Please check if they are related to Sparnas.
Those silly things keep coming to us.{nl}Now may be the only chance we have to go and get Sparnas.{nl}Tell me when you are ready.
They are just creating so many problems.{nl}They even got their hands on the supplies, I will not feel enough even if I hit him with a bat in the middle of the market.
What? Tutu?{nl}I don't have time to think about those insignificant critters.
When you level up, you can increase a status of your choice and become stronger. {nl} Would you like to check it now?
It's important to think ahead about what you would want to be. {nl} It's never an easy thing.
{memo X}Yes. That's how you do it. {nl} Pretty simple, huh?
Aras is in the center area of the Woods. {nl} But there has been a tremendous increase in monsters around here so I suggest you don't go in.
Somehow Klaipeda has managed to hold back the monsters for now,{nl}but we have to find and remove the cause or we won't hold out for long.{nl}
That strange feeling I had in Crystal Mine 3F,{nl}it keeps occurring to me that it might be related to that girl the town people are talking about.{nl}
I just feel bad that I wasn't able to meet
Thank you for saving the villagers,{nl}but you're not going to the Closed Area, are you?
Let's remove the last seal at the left side of here.{nl}The odor in the air is changing. I am sure it's a demon.
Demons are approaching. It's not good.{nl}It is sealed tightly, but I don't feel safe.
I caught the smell of Biteregina.{nl}I'm glad that you're safe.
All right. The hidden door to the sanctum is now open and you may enter it.{nl}You will see one of the two seals that protect the legacy of Zachariel, the Great King.
Now, we just have to see Zachariel the Great King's eternal sleep.{nl}It was a real honor for me to meet you.
Well done.{nl}Morkus is waiting for you at Overlong Bridge Valley. You must hurry.
There are people who are after Zachariel's inheritance.{nl}If they weren't sealed, those people must have taken them by now.
{memo X}Because of that, a few disciples have died.{nl}But, that's strange. It seems that it never happened.
There were Gustas and my senior.{nl}Then am I the youngest? No..
Gustas is proud to protect the inheritance of Zachariel.{nl}I wonder what he's going to do after he hands over that job.
How many things are hiding in this canyon?{nl}More of king's inheritance will be here right?
According to the old records, the king erased the stonemason's memories using magic to protect the Mausoleum.{nl}I think it's amazing that he erased only those memories.
Liaison Official Nian
You saw that, right? That's why I told you not to touch it.{nl}Because of this, we received an order to withdraw from this place.{nl}
Well, if I am to be involved in this, can you at least do me a favor?{nl}Tell Adelle at the Research Camp to watch out for these kind of stones.
{memo X}
Historian Adelle
A stone? I know of it.{nl}Do you want to to know what kind of stone is?
Monsters suddenly became violent and started attacking us.{nl}This is not an ordinary thing.
This will be enough.{nl}Vicious power... I'm certain that the demons are planning something.
Now I have a reliable ally.{nl}You can get them from the nearby Hogmas. I'm counting on you.
Archeologist Friedka
I'm looking for a certain unique stone pillar. But as a scholar, getting it is beyond my skill.{nl}If you help me, you will be handsomely rewarded. Are you interested?
I know that we received an order to withdraw, but know this,{nl}the reward will be well worth your time. You won't regret it.
Okay. First collect amulets from the Hogmas.{nl}After that, put those amulets on the stone pillar at the bottom of Geltonas Highland.

We have to get out of here quickly before something bigger and worse finds us.{nl}Well, so far so good, but coming in so far is not without danger.{nl}I hope the Kingdom pays more attention to rescuing people than they do to these kinds of experiments.

Are you asking me how come a technician is at a place like this?{nl}As an advisor, of course. {nl} You'll need a technician like me to find out how this gigantic structure stood still for hundreds of years.
Looking at equations is one thing, but being out here...{nl}We will find the true nature of this place soon enough.
According to this map, the thing we are looking for is in Stone Pillar Hill.{nl}Alright then. Would you please make a rubber copy of it?{nl}{nl}
It would be best if I went there.{nl}Too bad my body isn't what it used to be though.
Well done!{nl}I should get out of here since I got what I wanted.{nl}There is a mark here that was ruined by magic. I wonder who did it...
I'll get out of here now.{nl}Let's go somewhere safe to continue our research.{nl}
By the way, why are these stones acting like this?
I'm sorry, I don't quite trust you yet.{nl}Come back when you have some more experience.
I just saw those villagers being taken away, and yet I could do nothing. I can't accept that.
Belief in yourself. Endless confidence. {nl} These are the most important things when projecting yourself in reality. {nl} That is the nature of Psychokino and the power that moves the world.
A Linker is someone who connects people with ropes of Mana.{nl}How strong the connection is depends on the quality of Mana.
Cataphract Master
Cataphracts have the power to go though the enemies that block their way.{nl}They are brave warriors who fight on the front lines.
May I help you? {nl}Fortunately, we have some potions left in stock.
Looking for some good equipment? {nl} I have prepared the best ones available. {nl} Look around, the prices aren't bad either.
Oh, this anvil is my small gift to you for saving me. {nl} It's a useful item that can upgrade your equipment. {nl}
Well then, see you in the mines.
$Miners' Village Mayor
{memo X}
$Goddess Saule
{memo X}$To retrieve the revelation, please go to Fallen Worry Forest.{nl}Now is our chance, as the Demon Lord Bramble is trying to recover his power.
$Royal Mausoleum Foundation Stone
$I pass my words to the Revelator who comes here.{nl}I, the Great King Zachariel, sleep here to protect the goal of the Goddess.
$If evil forces attack this place, please protect this place by waking the sleeping Guardians.{nl}{nl}
$Royal Mausoleum Cube Manual
$A Guardian who is corrupted by evil will forget its responsibility to protect the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Defeat these Guardians near the large cubes.
$Defense System Manual
$A Guardian that forgot its mission to protect the Royal Mausoleum deserves to be destroyed.
$Role of the Guardians
$By recycling the power supply of Guardians that forgot their mission, we can return them to be part of the Royal Mausoleum.
$Guardian's Stone Statue
$The Guardians are corrupted with evil energy.{nl}Destroy the corrupted Guardians to stop its spreading.
$The demons are trying to take over the roots of the tomb.{nl}If all controlling magics get corrupted, we can't protect the tomb anymore.
$The Guardians are being corrupted like a plague.{nl}We need to look for a special way.
$We need to destroy the corrupted Guardians that are in sleep.{nl}First, collect condensed magic in this jar.
$I pray to the Goddess for those sleeping Guardians.
$We should destroy those Guardians before they wake up to listen to demons' commands.
$Destroy the Guardians using the condensed magic.{nl}If something interferes, destroy it as well.
You should destroy them before they wake up.
$It's very sad to listen to the commands of demons as the Guardians of the tomb.
$This evil is very real.{nl}It could possibly reach the deepest parts of the Royal Mausoleum.
Royal Mausoleum Blueprint
$If a force of evil is close to the Goddess' revelation, Guardians are programmed to destroy the Royal Mausoleum.
$The evil man is getting close to the Goddess' revelation.{nl}But he will never get the revelation.{nl}
$Revelator, go and get the source of the Royal Mausoleum's power from the Guardians.
It was prepared to against the existence who can not be taken by human.{nl}
$Pour the source of the Royal Mausoleum's power into the Royal Mausoleum pots.{nl}It will create a false revelation as a decoy.{nl}
$The evil man will never get the revelation.
$The evil man has got a false revelation.{nl}How foolish of him.{nl}
$Put the Guardian's will into this pot and go to the last guardian.{nl}It will give you the power to destroy the evil being.
$Evil forces will never get the revelation of Goddess.
To have guardians perform their mission, you need to correct the distorted control magic.

$If the source of the Royal Mausoleum's power is corrupted, the Guardians will lose their mission.{nl}You can purify the origins of Royal Mausoleum's power by lighting up the stone lanterns with burning stone inside of a guardian.
Royal Mausoleum Magic Suppressor Manual
{memo X}
$The demons have cut off the source of magic.{nl}We need you to gather magical power from the nearby Guardians.
$Good.{nl}Now, there is a lack of magical power.
$I will open the way to the problem.{nl}Restore our magical power by reigniting the stone lantern of the Royal Mausoleum.
$When the suppressed power flows yet again, the Guardians will regain their reason.{nl}But that will take a long time.
$Abnormal Guardians are attacking the magical container.{nl}Protect the magical container until the suppressed power flows again.
$The magical container is like the heart of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}We can never let it be destroyed.
$Order will surely return to this place.{nl}But it will take a long time.
$Evil energies have condensed everywhere in the Mausoleum with the current of suppressed power.{nl}Find and remove the corrupted lumps.
$The Royal Mausoleum was designed perfectly.{nl}But the demons' plan seems beyond perfect.
$Our Guardians are under their control, and even do their mission.{nl}This is our failure.
$Evil energy has corrupted even the stone lanterns which were the origins of magical power.{nl}Destroy the corrupted stone lanterns to stop the spread of corruption.
$Evil energy is pervading all over the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}We can no longer remain idle.
It is no longer corrupted.
Royal Mausoleum Document
Wheelen's mark give us power to face against the forces of evil.
$Venucelos are very brave and loyal.{nl}But, if their loyalty are the enemies', they are worthless.
$Zachariel was proud to make huge Guardians.{nl}He even put secret treasures inside them so that only the one who destroy these Guardians could get them.
$The forces of evil will never reach the Goddess' revelation.
Coben
I am looking for my brother.{nl}If you could help me, I may give you some rewards.
He was really fanstastic.{nl}A person like me can not imagine.
Something is between the pages of diary.{nl}Blueprint.. Brother got something again.
I came here to look for my brother, but I am not as brave as him.{nl}I want you to take a look at the gravestone's writing on my behalf.
Yes. My brother is a thief.{nl}My brother used to come to our shop once in a few years and told us his adventures.
So he challenged for the Great Mage Tower?{nl}That's my brother! He can certainly do that.{nl}
The Mage Tower was the fortress that the demons could not come near.
We should look for the next gravestone.{nl}If the writing can't be seen clearly, rub it with Cockatrice fat.
Mage Tower.. Do we have anything to steal there?
Yes! He will not end after stealing at the Mage Tower.{nl}I will go to Negybas Field first so follow me!
You came. The next gravestone is in front of me, but I am just a drunken coward.{nl}I will stay at the road on the left side of Negybas Field so you go and check it.
{memo X}It is a shame to look back once a man starts his journey.{nl}My brother will rather choose to die than looking back.
How could he think of using magic to the great magician?{nl}That's my brother.{nl}
{memo X}We should check by rubbing Hallowventer's wooden coals.{nl}The next epitaph is at the right side of Negibas Fields.
He will do anything if he decides to do something.{nl}How could we have imagined that he will climb onto Mage Tower which even demons failed to climb?
Concentration of a demon's power?{nl}Ah! brother left me something.{nl}I brought it to give it back to him, but I don't know if it's right..
Brother told me that it is a device that will recharge demons' power when it is installed at the right place.{nl}But he also told us that it may summon a strong monster so he told us to be careful.
Mage Tower should let us enter it without any complaints.{nl}If I could find my brother with this.. It will be so good.{nl}
Yes. It is the gravestone..{nl}So now there is only one place left which I haven't been to. Follow me to Karsta Hall.
I am about to meet my brother.{nl}Please check the last gravestone.
His mind must had been like me here.{nl}Famous name can be a burden sometimes.
{memo X}I am sure that my brother stood still even when he was confronting his death.{nl}But, even if we are in mud, living is more meaningful than dying..{nl}
I don't need this anymore.{nl}You have it. Please use it for more valuable purposes.
Then what should we do.{nl}
You should fight fire with fire.{nl}I will find the magician's weakness using magic and I will humiliate to her tower. Haha!
Stonemason Canolyn
Are you going to Fedimian as well?{nl}We are stonemasons. We are called to rebuild Fedimian so w should hurry..{nl}
{memo X}
There is no reason for those monsters walking around. {nl}They are just there.
Hey, Why are you so late?{nl}While you were gone, monsters stole everything from us!
{memo X}We can reimburse for the expenses for others, but what about the tool box? {nl}We lost Sprit of Stonemason to Moa..
The ones with wings like sparkling things.
There was no tool box?{nl}Well. We can't do anything about it. I will think that I just got revenge on it.{nl}
Tara Milds
I am a doctor from Fedimian to help patients.{nl}I have some problems, can you help me?
There's a sign of plague within those monsters.{nl}Fortunately, I think it's not that serious.{nl}
Okay.{nl}Let's talk again at Negybas Field.
You came. Please get some dust samples from the Hallowventers.{nl}There are many reasons that a plague could spread.
It is important to cure a disease, but it is more important to prevent it from the first place.{nl}You wash your hands all the time right?
Thank you.{nl}We just need one more sample.
This is an opportunity for us. The Big Cockatrices are suffering from a disease.{nl}Please get enough tails from them to use for our research.
Even if we fail preventing the disease, we would be able to make a medicine quickly with our research results.
You got it. Thank you so much.{nl}You saved lots of lives in Fedimian.
{memo X}We can suppress the vicious energy if the magic of the tomb gets unleashed.{nl}I need the activating stone that is located inside the Guardians.
The manual for the secret place
$We hid the secret treasures for the Revelator who would come someday.{nl}Find and absorb the Guardians' hidden energy to open the secret door.
The hiding place of the brother I used to serve is located at the abondoned farm up there.{nl}Please get the diary of the brother there.
Grita
{memo X}It seems that there are more monsters here now compared to the number monsters that were present before I lost my conciousness.{nl}Did something happen to Gabija?
{memo X}It may be better for Gabija to let her know that we are here.{nl}There's a pole that we can ignite light on. Let's go.
{memo X}Good. Since she knows that we came, she will recover her health.{nl}Let's go up to see Gabija.{nl}{nl}

It's called Moa. {nl}It ran away to the abondoned farm up there.{nl}
{memo X}

$It would not be strange if the world ended tomorrow.{nl}However, I just want to know. Why the Goddesses disappeared..
