Other troops are fighting in the Miners' Village and we are blocking the monsters from here. {nl}I don't think the Vubbes are smart enough to make use of tactics... I am concerned about that.
We have problems here, but I'm also worried about the other troops fighting in the Miners' Village. {nl} Normally, it should have been cleared up pretty fast.
Guard Gilbert
It's the Pantos again. {nl} They even stole the working parts. {nl} Well then, we've got to take them back, right?
{memo X}I could handle it myself. {nl}Those weaklings would come trembling on their knees to return the parts. {nl} But what if more thieves come while I'm at it?
Well done. {nl} Now put this on and grease it then it will work as it should.
The Pantos hid some parts in the grasslands of Mieguista Hills. {nl} Try to get me those for the time being since it's urgent.
The Pantos think the grassland hides everything. {nl} I used to find that cute about them.
Guard Matthew
I am looking for cable car parts but nothings seems to be in sight. {nl} Maybe the Zignuts of Nepavy sun swallowed it. {nl}
{memo X}
I want to go destroy those demons, but..{nl}The cable car is not working well so I should go after fixing it.
If it wasn't for me, uncle Gilbert would have been going around looking through this huge area. {nl} I'm truly worried.
This is a sacred place we have enshrined for generations. {nl} We used to hold prayer and important meetings whenever there was a disaster {nl}
But it's been like this since it fell to evil forces four years ago. {nl} I guess the elders couldn't have helped it either.
In the past, it was just a rope on a lax basket. {nl} You had to put your life on the line whenever you crossed it. {nl}
So I went to Klaipeda and learned the skills myself. {nl} I have to start looking for a successor, but Matthew doesn't seem interested.
Guard Basil
The curse doll will be filled with the mine of Mushcaria. {nl} It is in the Tustanti Plateu, can you get it for me?
They used to be considered mysterious creatures, worthy of respect. {nl} But nowadays you just go a few steps outside town and they are everywhere, preying on people.
I forgot that Mushcaria was still alive. {nl} Anyway, you did a good job.
There is enough time, so visit Algis first.
Now I will head this way to the chapel. {nl} Our Paladin friend likes the word 'if' a lot. {nl}
If our mission goes as planned, then we will have no need to meet again. {nl} Well, it sounds like it would be unpleasant to meet you again, haha.
Guard Allen
The Mazas barrier which should stop the demons has been destroyed. {nl} Would you help me repair it?
The barriers were made a long time ago. {nl} And now that I wasn't able to protect it well, what do I tell our ancestors?
I'm not smart enough to know anything about restoring the barrier so tell that to Kayetonas.
Follower Kayetonas
No wonder. I was bewildered when the demons suddenly appeared out of nowhere. {nl} I better let my brothers know about this. Thank you.
Guard Kenneth
You can't let your guard down just because the demon summoners are gone. {nl} We don't even know what caused them to appear in the first place. {nl}
Anyway, please tell Kayetonas in Flower Hill about this.
It might be a bit extreme, but I'm thinking about defeating of all the demon souls.{nl}
{memo X}
{memo X}You'd better defeat the extracted souls quickly. {nl} Wouldn't it be scary to see them come back to life?
Actually, I had some doubts, but it seems to work? {nl} Please let Kayetonas know about this. {nl} I think he will be pleased, he is in Flower Hill.
Now, I think I can live. {nl} We have to keep it up and stop the demons. {nl} Please tell Kayetonas that protecting this place isn't easy.
The demons are very strong.{nl}I will protect this place to block those demons.
{memo X}Welcome, I'm glad to see that you've had a safe journey here. {nl}Before anything else, there are things about this place that the Revelator should know. {nl}
My old friend, Algis, will explain. Please listen to him.
I can see the monsters clearly from up here.{nl}He may get surrounded by them soon.
The broken barrier pieces are scattered in the Mazas shelter. {nl} Collect them and give them to Kayetonas in flower hill. {nl}
My poor father would be happy if he knew I became a guard.{nl}But, I already made a mistake.
We can say it's peaceful for now.{nl}For now.
{memo X}
That's why if there are guards struggling with the barrier, I want you to help.
I heard that the plan failed. {nl} I guess we have to do something before Gesti recovers.
Guard Ella
Think about those flowers bite my leg someday.{nl}They may look beautiful to you, but I don't just see them as beautiful.
I need the fluids of Nepenthes, but it doesn't wake up.{nl}If it doesn't wake up, there is no way to extract them.{nl}
{memo X}That's why I am thinking about setting fire.{nl}I hope you collect the fats by defeating Malidus.
Follower Reeke
$The elders gave me many charms that will help me fend off the demons.{nl}I hope they help.
Those elders don't have a sense of reality.{nl}We should have gone to the cathedral instead of those Paladins.
Good. Good.{nl}Let's see if it endures without standing up.
Let's wake up Nepenthes at Piene by burning these fats.{nl}The fluids will be no use if they get spoiled so we should extract them when its alive.
Only a person like me can handle that monster.{nl}What do you think?
They protected their regions, but I guess they came down because of those demons.{nl}
It's not listening?{nl}Is it because of Panto Totems at Valyma divine place?
I will give you the stronger charm so use it after destroying Panto totem.{nl}Just like you did last time. You know it right?
Ah, and if brainwashed Panto attacks the attacking Panto, that Panto will be on our side as well.
Now I get it. {nl}Well done.
Follower Alfonsas
Amazing.{nl}With this, the brothers at the chapel can fight without any worries.
The magic field that summons the demons is the biggest problem.{nl}If we scribble on the field, don't you think the equations would be tangled?
At least, the demons won't cross here.{nl}We may expect a better result.
It's getting swallowed up side down.{nl}Very effective indeed.
Follower Vaidas
It is reassuring to hear that Brother Thomas will be in charge of the altar.{nl}
Brother Vaidutis is waiting on the 1st floor. {nl}Gesti's barrier is blocking the way, but it can simply be put off by the power of altar, so do not to worry.
Follower Vaidas
I regret myself that I didn't bring enough Holy Stones.{nl}I should have put them in all my pockets.
The altars in the chapel are made to stop demons. {nl} Of course, only we, the Paladins, know how to use them.
Is Brother Vaidutis alright?{nl} I would have been in serious trouble if not for your help.
Follower Thomas
Yognome is trying to eat the altar.{nl}I want you to defeat Yognome.
If I have Holy Stones, I want to put them into Yognome's mouth.
Follower Tiberius
I am making a lethal bomb to attack demons.{nl}It can be done if I have a Purified Essence. Can you help me?
Bombs in the chapel doesn't sound good, but..{nl}I think the Goddess will forgive me this time.
I want to test it on Glizardon.{nl}I'll give you the bomb, so that you can put it onto the back of Glizardon?
If you think it'll be dangerous, I will also give you Romuva Divine Water.{nl}When you drink this water, those demons will be invisible for a while.
Run away after setting the bomb on the back of Glizardon.{nl}Look at its size. It will not be fast.
I only have one empty Holy Stone.{nl}Can you help me to fill this stone, please?
We can sustain for a while if these stones can be filled without our brothers' help.
It is a strategy to attack the boss first when there are multiple enemies.{nl}This time, it will be Glizardon.
I never thought you would defeat it this quickly.{nl}Thank you for your help.
Follower Donatas
Thank you. {nl} This is sufficient to make a transformation scroll.
You can transform into a demon by using this scroll. {nl} Persuade the demons to go to the altar on their own.
I get caught every time, maybe the demons know my scent. {nl} I'm sure it'll be easier for you since you haven't been around for long.
Alright. {nl} I think that would be enough for you to take a grasp of it.
The power of the altar makes conversion simple. {nl} First, you activate the power of Globejas' altar. {nl} Then, stay within the influence of the altar to fight the demons.
The demons have stronger minds than you might think. {nl}It will take a lot of effort to make them forget about Gesti.
Don't trust the waste too much since Glizardon may find out about it.
I am thinking about an effective way to defeat the demons.{nl}I feel so reliable since you came.
When we prepare the Holy Stone, the monsters nearby will suck their lives by themselves.{nl}Ignore the monsters that have lost their lives.
You can obtain Vicious Essences from the demons.{nl}You can purify these essences from the altar which is at the bottom.
{memo X}Oh, they will find out if you are not confident enough. {nl}So it's better to fight the demons to gain some self confidence before using the scroll.
Epigraphist Raymond
There isn't only one monument.{nl}There's a fine monument at Irody Square.
Who cherished such traitor? Don't you think there would be a different reason?
Unexpectedly, the status is fine.{nl}We should get ready to restore it.
His monument is cased with a terrible magic because he was a traitor.{nl}We should use that magic instead.
If we received support than we would have hired mecenaries.{nl}Studying about the traitor doesn't mean that we praise the traitor so i don't understand why the support has stopped.
Thanks.{nl}Achat must have drawn to the power of the magic that is casted upon the monument.
You look live a wood so it's curious to find out that you are interested in stone plates.
I am sorry, but we can't find the one that we needed among the fragments you brought.{nl}I hope it's not already eaten.
Don't you think we would be able to find the fragments that Treeambulo swallowed if we burn it?{nl}I have the woods that I stacked before so we push it into it while the woods are burning.
Be careful.{nl}It will be dangerous if Treeambulo in flame runs into the camp.
Treasure Hunter Ethan
I am a treasure hunter and not a monster hunter.{nl}I don't want to add my gravestone here by touching it.
ve Collected all the debris out of the deal is over Raymond. {nl} brought back the parcel to Raymond.
Ethan told you to give it to me?{nl}Hmm. It will take sometime to restore it.{nl}
Can you take the restored gravestone fragments to my assistant at Irody Square?{nl}I think something good will happen when we finish restoring it.
Epigraphist Smid
This.. Our master did it!{nl}Give it to me.
Not yet. Little more.{nl}I think I just need to do little bit more.
Necromancer Drasius
Please put those sacrifices in the jar at Dumbal Pond.{nl}The summoned sprit will come to me if you succeed.
It depends on how one uses necromancy.{nl}It could be good or bad depending on what Necromancer has in his mind.
The experiment failed? I am so sorry.{nl}I should research more here to find out what went wrong.
Monument of Lydia Schaffen
My name is Lydia Schaffen.{nl}To endure deep and strong sadness from now, I am going to tell my truth about Ruklys on this land.
There are no more wood coals besides the ones you have so don't use them too much.
I didn't know she was the alumnus to the traitor, Ruklys.{nl}Damn. I almost used all the wood coals.
Eventually, Ruklys failed.{nl}He was destroyed by the ones who were jealous of him.{nl}He left to the Goddess from my hands.
What was Lydia Schaffen's relationship with Ruklys?{nl}I am not smart enough to understand.

{memo X}I leave Ruklys on this land with my regrets and tears.{nl}If there's someone who wants to continue his will, I want to leave my secret on this gravestone.{nl}I will summarize the long writings here.
The stage that Ruklys had reached was astonishing.{nl}But, his noble mission was too difficult to be accomplished on this land.
Since I am on a long journey, my luggage is not heavy.{nl}It's better to buy anything from local shops.
Any archers would want to have good arrowheads.{nl}I will show you good arrowheads so how about you help me a bit?
They are not quick enough so they won't be hard.{nl}For sure.
Thanks. Very hot.{nl}Isn't it so nice?
Wandering Spirit
{memo X}
Operation File
The steps for luring Unicorns.{nl}1. Collect Jolem Stones from Jolem{nl}2. Set the stones around Neshiriquos divine place ruins.
Guard Leaper
This operation had failed several years ago.{nl}Where did you get this anyways?{nl}
I understand. Please take this Unicorn's horn to that girl.{nl}Her brother went missing after that.
Girl
I told him not to go..
So it was terrible. {nl} I was lucky I almost get dispatches.
If you have trouble pulling it over to the burning firewoods, then kick just kick it hard.
I need the flame of Infrobirk at Shiluma altar.{nl}Getting close to the back of that monster and heats the arrows.
I was trying to get something myself when I signed contract with Raymond.{nl}But, I have nothing besides stone fragments.
You will know what's on Rukly's monument after restoring it.
Great. {nl} Leave activating the altar to me and go to Vidas in Himnas chapel.
{memo X}Even if a person is in danger, if he knows that someone will come to help him, he will have the extra energy to endure longer.
Good. This will be enough.
{memo X}It feels so good to see them flying.{nl}But, they are too noisy so I need to study more.
I have never seen a stone filled with this much holiness.{nl}Thank you very much for trying your best.
{memo X}The demons' attacks are stronger than we expected.{nl}If we are able to defeat Glizardon, then it will be easier to defeat them.
Follower Vaidutis
I came to say that Gesti went up to the 2nd floor and I let my guard down. {nl} I would have been in a big trouble if not for you.
I studied the barrier of the gate, but the power of the altar in the basement is not enough. {nl} Unless you add the power of the crystal held by Corylus.
Maybe the Goddess knew it'd fail and that's why she said wait for the Revelator. {nl} At least, we got the Gesti hurt so it can also be good.
Well done. {nl} Making the Light Crystal with this will be enough power to break the barrier.
{memo X}Prepare yourself before bringing the Light Crystal to the gate. {nl}It can attract powerful monsters.
I think I'll stay here to stop the demons from entering the basement.
It is an honor to fight with you, Revelator. {nl} Could you drive the demons from this area while Algis investigates?
If you are okay, can you take Eyes of Madness to Rodelin?{nl}They are handy when you want to hide yourself from demons.
I don't want those filthy things to be near me either.{nl}But, it's worse to face against those demons alone.
Thanks.{nl}I should share them with other brothers before the demons find out.
You are indeed the revelator.{nl}Now, we can concentrate on protecting the altar.
Don't worry, the barrier of the main entrance on the 1st floor can be offset by the power of the chapel. {nl}That's what the altars are for. {nl}
Let's take care of the Unknocker first. {nl} I'll lead the Unknocker, you'll have to try to find a chance.
{memo X}I want to request to you to defeat Pawndel and Pawnd.{nl}They are demon sisters and they give us headaches.
Be careful since I got almost attacked as well.{nl}They are really violent.
Good job. {nl}The babbling laughter seems to have stopped.
{memo X}
It's a bit blasphemous, but we don't have much choice.
Well done. {nl} It will probably be difficult to trust each other from now on. {nl}
{memo X}I'm thinking of converting the demons using the power of the altar. {nl} The converted demons will absorb the divine power and slowly start to die. {nl}
But before that, it's important to understand the demons. {nl} Collect the demon's souls
I remember the first time I converted the demons. {nl} I pray for their poor souls.
Good job. {nl} If there are any good demons left, the Goddess will look after them.
The Central Altar suppressing the power of the demons suddenly stopped. {nl} Could you take a look at what's going on?
Strange, it was definitely working.
It was an ambush. {nl} We would have been in big trouble without your help.
You need the crest of space to enter the hidden sanctuary. {nl} It's hidden in the Sventove Central Altar, but I just hope it's not too late.
Structures in the Tenet Chapel are placed to ward against the demons. {nl} Each one in itself is a small barrier that contributes to a huge barrier. {nl}
The most powerful barrier is on the 2nd floor. {nl} I heard that it can exert the greatest force when the Divine Sphere is there.
Gesti made the first move. {nl} It will be difficult to approach secretly.
I must change the plan. {nl} First, you need to go watch Gesti's actions. {nl}
Let's start by occupying the Bell Tower.
From here, we can see what Gesti is going to do.
Alright, bring the crest of space from the Sventove Central Altar. {nl} You can do it, right?
You must know that the revelation is hidden in the sanctuary. {nl} The crest of space is the only key that will get you to the sanctuary. {nl}
It's not just the Tenet Chapel. {nl} You can enter all the places that the Goddess hid.
The crest of space can only be used by the Revelator, so you won't be able to find the revelation right away. {nl}
But the enemy is the Demon Queen. Even the Paladin Master couldn't defeat her.{nl}I should use the power of the Broken Altar.
We can't do anything about the destroyed altar, but the fragments still have power. {nl} Gather the pieces and insert them in the 8 pillars of the Sventove Central Hall.
When you are done, I will be able to restrict Gesti through the power of the Divine Sphere and the chapel. {nl} It may be for a short while but that's the best option we have.
So you activated the Malda altar? {nl} Now it will be safe to stay here for the time being. Good work.
Demons are going around the second floor searching every corner. {nl} Activating the Auka altar will catch their attention.
{memo X}I'm relieved you're beside me. {nl} I think it was a good thing that Laima chose you.
Good job. {nl} When this is over, I should gather all brothers and drive them away at once.
I'll ring the bell and let you know when Gesti shows up, so have a safe trip on your way.
{memo X}So you found the crest of space. {nl}Use the crest on the pillar beside me to go to the sanctuary. {nl} It is prepared for the Revelator only.
May the blessings of the Goddess be with you.
So Gesti just ran away. {nl} Fine. Since you got the revelation, we've completed the mission. {nl}
{memo X}
{memo X}When you find the revelation, tell the Paladin Master of the story you've been through so far. {nl} May the blessings of the Goddess be with you.
Seems like Gesti did not notice yet. {nl}We better prepare the Divine Sphere.
All the preparations have been made. {nl} The barriers of the chapel will soon weaken Gesti. {nl}
Once weakend, Gesti will be enough for you to handle. {nl} When Gesti is cornered, I will make the final strike with the Divine Sphere.
This is a piece of Mazas shelter barrier. {nl} Do not worry. {nl} There are ways to recover the barrier so I'm sure it will be alright.
I didn't know the demons were using a summoner to come across here. {nl} Better defeat them all before they siege us.
Even with so many demons, you still managed to make it through. {nl} You may be the Revelator, but that's still impressive. {nl}
It's the revelation. {nl} Cherish it and do not show it to anyone else. {nl}
Come on. Go to the Paladin Master. {nl} He will tell you the way you must go.
I asked my precious friend Algis to go to Tenet Chapel. {nl} I won't lose to Gesti but it is important to have some back up plan just in case.
{memo X}
In the kingdom, there are several valuable weapons aside from this Divine Sphere. {nl} Those weapons saved many lives on the Medis Diena four years ago.
From now on, I will focus on the Divine Sphere. {nl} Meanwhile, please use your skills so that I won't be disturbed.
I'm sorry. It's all my fault. {nl}Gesti found out that the divine heal is not the revelation, so she will head straight to the chapel. {nl}
{memo X}But this old body of mine does not follow my will anymore. {nl} Now I can only trust my old friend Algis and you. {nl}
{memo X}
It is too much for me to handle alone without any help from the other brothers. {nl} I'd better use the Malda altar. {nl}
{memo X}
We still have a lot to do here.{nl}The Goddess told us to never give up.
The world still needs more experience. {nl} We probably wouldn't have made it this far without the help of the Goddess.
The activation of the tree guard post is taking longer than I thought. {nl} We have no time, let's use a demon's soul instead.
All souls are pure. {nl} So even if it's a demon's soul, it can still provide some divine power.
Oh, the tree guard post was filled with a demon's soul. {nl} It still needs some final touches for completion, but I'll take care of it. {nl}Great job.
It's amazing you can use the barrier like that. {nl} Even the Paladins did not know about that. {nl}
{memo X}
Standing against this much enemies itself is a great deal. {nl} It's all thanks to the Paladin Master.
Even though he's still young, Kenneth is amazing. {nl}I think we can trust him a little more.
I have received an urgent message from the guards.{nl}A gigantic demon monster is coming this way.{nl}Quickly, follow me.{nl}
Biteregina used to live in the deep forest came here.{nl}It even built the hive at the upper side of Rojus Plateau. Can you defeat it since it's dangerous?
Thank you so much!{nl}How could they come from such a far forest?{nl}Strange, isn't it?
I can't do anything since Sidmias are attacking us.{nl}Can you defeat them?
$Those Seedmias want me to put my head on that flower bud.{nl}It's not good at all.
We received the charm from the elders that will brainwash Pantos to stand on our side.{nl}Do you want to take up the challenge?{nl}
According to the elders, we are done with those Pantos.{nl}We can't continue the relationship anymore.
This barrier is impossible to open from the inside. {nl} Fortunately, the entrance to the basement looks safe. {nl}
However, it's too dangerous to enter the basement with the Divine Sphere. {nl} I'll wait here so you go to the 1st floor through the basement and open the barrier. {nl}
You have done what other can't easily do.{nl}The Goddess must be proud of you.
My faith in religion is strong enough to destroy those demons, but in reality it isn't that simple.{nl}I hope you will help us.
{memo X}
Defeat the demons around the tree guard barrier. {nl} The souls of those demons will be able to fill the divine powers a little. Thanks!
Very good. Those flowers on the ground will be enough.{nl}Don't you think so?
We are the people following the Paladin Master.{nl}We will defeat the people who disobey the Goddess.{nl}
Everyone has their reasons for following him.{nl}Some of them received benefits from him and some of them were already Paladins like Algis.
Maybe the Goddess knew it would happen and that's why she waited for the savior.{nl}I feel like I put a big burden on your shoulders.{nl}
{memo X}
This is the plan that was carried on for hundreds of years since the first Paladin.{nl}We should never fail this plan.
Please put the pieces to the Ruklys memorial in front of preparing me rubbings. {nl} because had been working with us and listening together, you'll be able to simplify. {nl}
I will follow you soon. Just a moment.
After we finish the rubber copying, we can say farewell to this place.{nl}Can you help me a bit more?
The capital may already be in ruins, but I will protect Klaipeda.
Using all your power to crush any enemy that would threaten the Kingdom. {nl} That's how Highlanders fight in battle. {nl}
Good work, guys. {nl} Actually, I was also an adventure but the results seem to be fine. {nl} You just need to tell it like that to Kayetonas in Flower hill.
Seems like even the Auka altar lost its powers. {nl} There were stories about its powers wiping out dozens of demons in the past.
It's hard to watch the Egnomes running around the Atgaila chapel.{nl} Please clean up the Egnomes.
Many treasures of the Paladin which should not go into the hands of the demons are also here. {nl} You should not fall into it.
After using this amulet on those Pantos, hit them several times.{nl}Try those Pantos at Levanda military camp.
{memo X}Isn't this city amazing? I want to stay here if I can.{nl}But, I prefer going to other places with my horse.
{memo X}The space movement magic field will take you to your preferred floor in the tower.{nl}I don't know if we can use the field anymore. Let's go and find out.
I hope the monsters haven't broken the field yet.
{memo X}Damn.{nl}They broke it. It is unfixable.
{memo X}When you activate the device which sets barriers, monsters won't be able to come in.{nl}The supply device for demons' power is broken, but we can input the power with other methods.
{memo X}I hope that crazy magician, Antares, won't disturb us.
{memo X}He set a trap so well.{nl}I didn't like him even he was concious.
{memo X}We have to be careful from here.{nl}This is the place where Antares, a dangerous magician, was imprisoned.{nl}We should move up to the next floor quickly.
{memo X}He was a great magician before.{nl}But, his ideology was too dangerous.
Damn, why now..{nl}

{memo X}The reason why he was imprisoned here was because he badly wanted the concentrated demons' power here.{nl}What do you think would happen to the tower when the power which was concentrated for hundreds of years explode at once?
{memo X}Gabija is important, but the tower is more dangerous.{nl}Antares may be engaged in something by now.
{memo X}There are two valves here that control the power device.{nl}The first valve is at the lab room so let's go and destroy it now.
{memo X}Explosion, that was too dangerous.{nl}Let's find a safer way to destroy it.

{memo X}Antares has done research on the flow of the demons' power for a long time.{nl}If his research materials are still present, they will help us in destroying those valves.{nl}They must be here somewhere..
The research materials should be here somewhere..
{memo X}This is it. Now I think I know how to break those valves.
{memo X}Let's go find the last valve at the central control room.{nl}When we destroy this, we will be safe no matter what Antares does.
{memo X}Please set this stone and defeat the monsters around.{nl}We can collect the energy to recharge the barrier device.
{memo X}A suitable end for a crazy magician.{nl}It could have been dangerous without defensive magics.{nl}We may have touched it without knowing the first valve was destroyed..{nl}
{memo X}Anyways, that's good.{nl}The tower is now safe, so let's go up.
{memo X}Ah, that's right. Let's also prepare defensive magic in case something happens.{nl}There was magic written in Antare's materials that we can use when there are explosions.
{memo X}
{memo X}Good. We can use it one more time.{nl}
{memo X}Let's go find the second valve on the central control room.{nl}If we can destroy it, we will be safe no matter what Antares does.
{memo X}The Jewel of Prominence is somewhat strange.{nl}Something must have gone wrong when Antares exploded a while ago.
{memo X}Let's check the status while we defeat the monsters with the Jewel of Prominence.
{memo X}What is happening to the Jewel of Prominence?{nl}It is very instable.
{memo X}Did you just see that monster exploding?{nl}It's definitely strange. It seems as if the power of essence is going crazy.
{memo X}And me.. I feel dizzy..
{memo X}If we stay like this, the Jewel of Prominence may break.{nl}There must be a stabilizing device somewhere here. Let's go.
{memo X}By the way, how do I know about the stabilizing device?{nl}I've never been to the 4th floor..
{memo X}Okay.. My memories keep coming back..{nl}
{memo X}Ah, the stabilization has come to an end.{nl}I am okay. It's nothing. Just old memory coming back.
{memo X}The Jewel of Prominence has stopped going crazy.{nl}But, in order to fully stabilize it, we need the Essence of Flame from the fireplace at the middle of the tower.
{memo X}It's almost done. Yes..
{memo X}You gathered everything.{nl}Give them to me. Including the Jewel.{nl}I know the way to fully stabilize it so let's go to the lab room.
I hope the device is okay..
{memo X}Good! We can activate the device now.
{memo X}You are the revelator who helped the Paladin Master right?{nl}My name is Grita. I came from the Mage Tower.
{memo X}Help me. Gabija is in danger.{nl}We are gonna lose the tower to the demons if we don't receive any help.
{memo X}
{memo X}This is the entrance to the tower.{nl}I became unconscious at the tower and lost all my power somehow.{nl}
{memo X}I will take care of you and take you to Gabija.{nl}Are you ready?
{memo X}All other magicians either died or ran away.{nl}You are our last hope. Let's go in.
{memo X}Gabija did not hide herself.{nl}She just coudnl't come forward because she had to protect the tower from demons.{nl}
{memo X}I heard Agailla Flurry went because she coun't find a successor. {nl}I heard it was for something important.. But I don't know what it is.
The Medis Diena can strike anytime again whether it is in your hometown or my kingdom. {nl} The culprit of this plague would be someone worthy of my sword.
Owyn
Support? It really cheers us up!{nl}Please defeat the monsters nearby.
All the other magicians either died or ran away.{nl}Only Gabija is protecting the tower herself.
Those demons attacked before, but this battle is taking such a long time.{nl}I read about Helgasercle from a book. Maybe she has appeared again..
As a follower of the great Flurry, I can't back away yet!
You are indeed the revelator.{nl}Look at you!
With this momentum, please do it one more time.{nl}I am gonna destroy the other monsters, so please defeat Drake.
Those monsters are not that strong when we fight together!
Now I feel safe.{nl}I am gonna be okay by myself from here. Thanks!{nl}{nl}
Cordelier
Black coal powder..With that, we can unleash the seal that is written on the manual, but I can't just find it.{nl}I am sorry, but could you bring me the powder?
{memo X}Isn't it better to just scratch the powder from the monsters nearby?
Thanks!{nl}Now, I better get ready to unleash the seal.
Damn. I forgot the eternal light.{nl}I should have requested this of you before..please get that.{nl}
I should have requested this of you all at once.{nl}I make mistakes all the time.
Is it Ginklas? I hope it's just a bookshelf falling down in the reading room.{nl}Can you check the bookshelf?
I haven't seen a monster who can make this much vibration before.
It was indeed Ginklas. You are so amazing!{nl}Because of you, I had enough time to prepare my magic.
Sealed Stone
I am much more than you could imagine.{nl}I want to be released from restraints. Please defeat those observers nearby.
Defeat the observers.{nl}There's the Eye of Surveillance at Blindlem and Belegg.
I will be released soon.
{memo X}I can't tell my name. {nl}Please defeat the observers and unleash the seal on me.{nl}
Amazing. You possess a great power.
{memo X}
Another me from somewhere else led you to this place. {nl}Now, I can be released.
But, if I get released like this, I will be seperated into pieces.{nl}
{memo X}The Holy Arc that had me inside is broken and the observers obtained those pieces.{nl}Please defeat them and complete the Holy Arc.
The Holy Arc that had me inside is broken into pieces and the observers obtained those pieces.
Now, I can be released.
As long as there is the Eye of Surveillance, I can't be released from my restraints.{nl}Please defeat the observers and release me.
I am tied to a contract.{nl}I am free, but not really free.
{memo X}I was sealed when my sprit was ripped off by a high class demon.{nl}Please defeat Infroroktors for me. I promise I will not be a burden to you.
{memo X}Eyes of Surveillance are attached to Infroroktor.
It's way better without the observers.
{memo X}Those pieces of another me lost the voices to call you.{nl}Please find my voice again from Fallenlem.
His creatings should have voices to listen{nl}
The pieces from another me are able to call you now.{nl}Now, I can be released.
I am tied to restraints. The old microbes are threatening me.{nl}Teach them what the manner is.
You should give them a lesson so that they behave properly.
You have defeated them well. {nl}Now, I can rely on you to unleash this seal.
{memo X}Please unleash this seal on me.{nl}When you gather the essences of restraints from the observers, this seal will break.
You will know when the time comes.
Skeptical Desk
There's a Golem near here.{nl}I am too scared to go out. Please help me.
This won't come out.
Thanks.{nl}I will stay here until it gets safe and then run away.
Furry Odd
Nice to see you. {nl}I am Furry Odd. I am a magician specialized in variating things.{nl}
The revelator at this moment. The Goddess has helped us.{nl}Can you help us collecting variation mediums from monsters?
The magicians that ran away?{nl}What can we do.. For them, their lives are more important than the Goddess Gabija.{nl}I don't think they are cowards. They are just pathetic.
Thanks. You are so reliable.
We have enough mediums now so we will go defeat the remaining monsters.{nl}Do you wanna come along?
You are so great.{nl}I hope our magicians can be as good as you.
There's a problem.{nl}I think I saw Jonna Jolem inside the technical room.. But's it's too much for me.{nl}
I will take care of other monsters so you take care of Jonna Jolem.
I am not strong enough to face Jonna Jolem.{nl}It's fortunate that you are here.
Thank you so much for helping me. It's so good that you are here.{nl}May the Goddess bless you!
{memo X}I can't stand it anymore. Please save me from the restraints.{nl}I will be released when you defeat the observers nearby.
The time to retrieve the body and the soul is near.
I can't endure anymore.{nl}Please destroy the observers that restrain me.{nl}
So I guess I can be released now.
I promise. We can wait for other days.
Simon Show
We should block Bearkaras, but there are so many monsters.{nl}Can you help us?
Now it's time to get revenge!
You are so great. {nl}Now we can face it.
I will go to the small hall to chase after Bearkaras so please reduce the number of monsters.{nl}I am counting on you!
I have no way to defeat Bearkaras myself..{nl}I am sorry to have shown you this..
Bearkaras is still near here.{nl}You are our last hope. We are counting on you.
It was a good decision to trust you.{nl}I am more motivated because of you.
{memo X}The contract needs to continues. Please release me.{nl}As those observers fall down, my spirit becomes free.
{memo X}
It wasn't a long time, but it was frightening for me.
Now only the last piece is left.{nl}
The last spirit is in the observer Stone Whale.{nl}My sprit will be free when he gets defeated.
My body was ripped off, humiliated.. I can't forgive that..
Quickly.. We should continue the contract.{nl}
{memo X}
I will leave now to find my remaining pieces.{nl}We will meet someday in the future.
It's so good to hear that you will participate.{nl}I want you to get back Flame charm which I set inside Black Drake.
Don't ever think of blocking axe from in front.{nl}You will be crushed into powders.
{memo X}You should go to the great cathedral to follow the revelation,{nl}But, unfortunately, you are not skillful enough.
{memo X}Train more at the entrace of Katin Forest. {nl}Believe that you will get your victory at the end.
{memo X}Let's meet at Technical Room 1. {nl}Ah, it will be better if you could get the Blackened Essence from monsters.
{memo X}Look at this busted cable car.{nl} The damage is pretty serious. {nl}
It's obviously the work of Grummer and Zignuts from the Cholras road. {nl}Give them a taste of your skills while I fix this.
This would not have happened if the old people had lent their ears on what the young men said. {nl} But what's done is already done. What can we do about it?
Good work. {nl} It's the parts the Pantos stole before. {nl} I never imagine I'd be seeing it again like this.
Guard Molly
The Pantos were not always such violent monsters. {nl}There must be a way to change them back. {nl}
I want you to give young Pantos the highland beets in Nyosalrus Street.{nl}Then they would come to remind me of something?
It's a bitter thing indeed. {nl} No matter how troubled the world is, they weren't like that before.
That's right. Thank you very much! {nl} Have you seen a broken cable car there? I used to ride that when I was a kid.
Thank you! {nl} You've saved me and my friends from spending more than half of our lives just protecting the cable car. {nl}
Since I'm the only one who can fix the cable car, I'll consider it clear. {nl} Oh, and of course, thanks for your help.
{memo X}Please bring me the Mali seeds in the way to Labure roads. {nl} They would be a good source of magic for the shaman doll. {nl} {nl}
So exciting. {nl} Some straws, seeds, and a bit of rope and those kinds of things can go around alive.
Guard Mori
The appearance of Simorph is a bit frightening. {nl}So the Pantos can fall this bad.
{memo X}Won't you help me purify Labure road? {nl} The shaman doll finds the evil force but we have to purify it ourselves.
Contamination is everywhere, but I think Labure Road is the worst. {nl} Maybe it's spreading through the roots?
Look at these gentle Pantos. {nl} It's insane that we have to make the Pantos our enemies when the demons are charging in.
{memo X}We need the rope for ceremony to make the shaman doll. {nl} It's on the waist of the Panto Shaman in the Cottage. {nl} Bring it to me.
If you persuade Capria, the Pantos will be tamed. {nl}Capri is the leader of Pantos. {nl}
Let's follow the Baby Pantos. {nl}It will definitely lead the way to Capria.
I hope Capria would understand us. {nl} We should do whatever we can.
It became angry right away when seeing the Baby Pantos? {nl} I would've guessed that wouldn't work.
I worked so hard to fix it but I'm worried for the Poatas. {nl} Monsters of that size can destroy the cable car.
{memo X}Our guards love to fight {nl}Pantos were not this reckless before. {nl}I wonder if we should be like this when the demons waiting to march in.
The Poatas also destroyed the cable car in Nepavy. {nl}But it's not like we can guard it all the time. {nl}
Even if we stay on guards, a fight with the Poatas? {nl} That's not easy.
{memo X}
{memo X}
{memo X}
This place has a very sacred meaning for us. {nl} And we have called ourselves the watchmen for protecting this place. {nl}
It has been protected since the day the promised by the first Paladin. {nl} And now that the demons have invaded, it is time to keep that promise.
The Pantos changed and became wild after the Medis Diena four years ago. {nl} Before that, we didn't really mind each other and even joked around together. {nl}
I really wonder what has become of the sacred land?
{memo X}The Caprias were the first to change after the incident four years ago. {nl} And then the Pantos.. now only the babies are left.
Our family has been protecting this land for a long time.{nl}Please cooperate with us to keep the reverent atmosphere here.{nl}- Guard
Thank you for helping out. {nl} My workload has reduced a lot.
{memo X}
We used to be on good terms with the Pantos. {nl} These days, we're constantly at each other's throats.
{memo X}I came back because the elders told me to restore the dolls used for spells.{nl}The dolls for spells. Isn't it exciting?
Thank you. {nl} We might be able to go get more when more young men arrive.
{memo X}I can't stand seeing the Panto totems pressed with evil forces. {nl} I'm going to break it through the shaman doll. Want to give it a try?
We can't do anything until Basil restores the shaman doll perfectly. {nl} Unless for special situations like this, we can use, uhm, nothing.
It would have been a disaster if the Carnivore had legs.{nl}I'm glad it was killed beforehand.
{memo X}I heard we promised the first Paladin three things in return for saving our family. {nl}
To help build the Tenet Chapel, {nl} to protect the divine relics by having watchmen guard the sacred land, {nl} and lastly, to protect each other together when great danger arises. {nl}
I do not know what curse it was. {nl} There's got to be a record in the Tenet Chapel.
{memo X}Our Shaman dolls are different from Bokor's Shaman dolls. {nl}
It does not curse like the Bokor's. {nl} It moves by itself to attack, or something like that.
The demons could have used their hands to make it easier for them to attack. {nl} Or maybe they were eyeing the divine heal. {nl}
Since the divine heal was hidden deep below the ground. {nl} Who could have known that the reason for the world's overturn was because of the plants?
You may use a bit of force if words aren't enough. {nl}We can't grow any further from each other anymore.
{memo X}You can summon the shaman doll with this summon scroll. {nl}
{memo X}If possible, defeat the Carnivore too. {nl} It was contaminated by evil energy and I can't stand watching it anymore.
Make a mess in the nest of Poatas in Margas Hill and it will appear. {nl}
{memo X}Liaison Official Colin
Rexipher? {nl} I've never heard this name before. {nl}
{memo X}
The Desk of Royal Mausoleum
You can't obtain the secret and precious wisdom of the Royal Mausoleum even if you wish.{nl}When the time comes and you are ready, you will be able to fetch it.{nl}
Bring me the blood stone.{nl}It's not late yet. You can still make it in time.
Make sure that you come back within the time frame.
Don't forget your mind about the opportunity and the preparation. [?]
Since you told me about my brother's death, I want to give you some rewards if you want.{nl}I've collected it to leave again with my brother, but I don't need it anymore.
Isn't it Drake's horn?{nl}Are you going to sell all of them?{nl}
No. It's too precious to be used that way. {nl}With this much amount, we could even make Drake's Epaulet.{nl}I will give you the manual. Are you interested in making it?
With this key, we can open the treasure chest.{nl}But, you will need to look for the chest yourself.
Crafting is only possible during rest mode. {nl}You know it already right?
If it weren't for you, I would just live believing that my brother is living well somewhere. {nl}You can't say you are not responsible for this.
Well made.{nl}You will definitely need it sometime in the future.
Until then, I would hold on to it.{nl}When you need it, don't forget to come and take it from me. I will give it to you when the time comes.
You surely know a lot of people. {nl}All the masters at Klaipeda and Fedimian know your name.{nl}
Do you want to bet on this? {nl}Answering all the questions at Mage Tower.
You can get the quizzes from the magicians from the 1st to 4th floors of the Mage Tower.{nl}I will give you a small present if you can solve all of them.
Wow, you came up here! You are incredible.{nl}Okay that's it for questions, shoud we do other things?
Nothing special. {nl}If you can collect all scattered pages of the book at the laboratory room on 3rd floor, I will take that as you answered the question.
That book is very important to me so I can't just leave this place.
Yes. That's correct! This is it.{nl}
{memo X}The Thaumaturge Master told me to give it to you.{nl}If you hadn't done it, I would have kept it for myself.. Such a pity.
I heard your story before.{nl}You did a tremendous job at the Mage Tower right?{nl}
That's why I have a favor to ask you.{nl}
This is the pumpkin where lizard is in. {nl}I heard it's somewhere..I am sure you will find it.
Thank you. This is an amazing jewel.{nl}It is rare that a Sadhu is interested in contemporary objects.
That proves that it is an important object.
Unknown being.
How dare someone wants to confront me.{nl}Tell me the secret number. I can't tell you unless you tell me the number.
You're a brave guy. {nl} There are five clues in 1st Mine Lot . {nl} No need to hurry. It will take a long time.
Found it. {nl} Then I'll start from now.
I'll give you a riddle. {nl} It is something you must do, have done most, and will have to do. {nl} Show your answer in action.
Good work. {nl} You will be rewarded with proper compensation.
{memo X}What do you think are the factors that affect outcomes?{nl}If you just focus on attacking, then you may receive more damages.
If you ask me what is the strongest weapon, I will answer that is is faith.{nl}An ally that you can truly rely on.
A Thaumaturge does not get stronger by just learning.{nl}You should learn it yourself.
{memo X}
Stealth, detection, trap installation. {nl} Scouts are masters of searching and monitoring.
We Sadhus are always on an eternal journey. {nl}When our journeys in this world come to an end, we'll still continue in the afterlife.
Nothing is unfair in real battles.{nl}You've gotta do anything to win. Don't you think so?
We should find it quickly..{nl}It may be an end to Mage Tower.
{memo X}I don't mind people learning my skills if I receive reasonable rewards.{nl}In truth, I will welcome them.{nl}Although, I won't chase after them to teach them.
{memo X}But, yeah. {nl}Asking me to teach in the military is just too much ..{nl}Could it be another problem?
{memo X}Welcome! What do you need?{nl}The stuffs I have are not like old days, but I tried my best to prepare them.
Old Man
You must have seen many artifacts while coming to this city.{nl}But relative to a long history, those heroes are small beings.
Especially Ruklys, from Maven's disciples.. I pity him.
There's an interesting stroy behind that gigantic statue.{nl}Should you have a chance
Silver of Fedimian
Read a book called
{memo X}The spear in itself is a weapon of pure destruction.{nl} It is the best weapon anyone can easily learn and master.
{memo X}Golem, that's awesome. {nl} And you remember what I taught you?
I guess the Revelator really is different. {nl} You you seem to be different from the other Revelators too...
You looked so cool when you defeated the Golem. {nl} Where did you learn to do that?
I'm grateful for your help. {nl} Commander Uska is waiting for you in Klaipeda, so go find him.
I firmly believe that the Goddess will return someday. No doubt about it. {nl} We have to believe it. If we do not believe in the Goddess then who will?
Please hurry and support the Miners' Village. {nl} Someone like you will be of great help.
I heard the stories. So you defeated the Vubbe Fighter, huh? {nl} That's incredible.
I was anxious watching from a distance but it was really awesome.
Frankly, I'm scared. {nl}Miners' Village, and then the East Woods... Even Klaipeda is becoming dangerous.

$You came. {nl} First, let's clear the wagons blocking the way into the mines. {nl}
$The wagons can be demolished with explosives that I have prepared. {nl}I'm concerned about the Vubbes that will come after hearing the explosion {nl}but with your skills, I think we'll be fine.

$Thank you. Thank you very much. {nl} You're a savior of our town. {nl}

$Mines Manager
$I'm hanging on somehow but I'm losing strength in my arms.
$I should have been more careful. {nl} It's all my fault.
$I have my roots deep in hunting. {nl} Don't worry about me. Go look after the others.
$As the Mayor, I can't just leave the village like this. {nl} How could the Goddesses be so indifferent?

${memo X}Aren't you a Revelator? The Goddess must've sent help. {nl} In order to enter the mine, you must save a young man name Vaidotas first. {nl}He was kidnapped and brought to the Vubbe Outpost. {nl} Please, I'm begging for your help.
Kind Owl Sculptor
There are so many wandering spirits these days.{nl}This really..
Big

What's the problem? {nl} um ... it's big, very much.
You saw it right?{nl}He is called Sequoia. {nl}He once protected us owls, but now...{nl}
Humans attack us owls.{nl}So a few owls have been destroyed and there are many people getting hurt.
That
There is an owl that knows well about this problem.{nl}But who was he..{nl}
Ah, I can't concentrate.{nl}While I am remembering it, can you take care of that Ellogua?{nl}I just can't remember easily.
We are made of ordinary wood so we are scared of moist and insects.{nl}We are keen to be broken as well.{nl}It would have been better if we were made of iron.
Thank you!{nl}I can't scratch my head because I am a tree..Hehe..{nl}
Hm! Yes, I finally remembered it! {nl}Go find instabilized owl.{nl}That owl was so close to Sequoia so it must know the method.
Instabilized Owl Sculpture
I will tell you as I promised. I mean Sequoia. {nl}
Sequoia is obsessed with vicious power.{nl}You face vicious power with divine power.{nl}Yes. We should face it!{nl}
Please gather wood pieces from the broken sculpture.{nl}Ah. the ones with the power in them. Select well.
My friends became ordinary. {nl}Yes. Ordinary wooden statues. {nl}They must still have some divine power left, for sure. I believe..
Okay. Good. This will be enough! {nl}We have enough materials. Good. Good.
Hm? Sequoia? I know it well. Big mouth, big hip..{nl}Look at this. Many of my friends fell down.{nl}Sequoia did this. That's right.{nl}
But, monsters are keep trying to take them.{nl}What was that? Okay. The Essence of Spirits.{nl}If you get them again, I will tell you. The Essence of Spirits. My poor friends!
They were very good friends. Bad. Yes. I mean those monsters.{nl}I will try harder for my friends. {nl}Yes. I look little confused..
Thanks. Yes. {nl}I will take you to a good place. For sure..
Gather them, and string them together and stab Sequoia.{nl}Then it will be surprised and run away.
You should succeed on your first try. Okay?
I sometimes miss it. The old Sequoia.{nl}Why was it possessed by vicious power? There is no way to know it. I am just sad. A lot.
Something's wrong. {nl}The Guide Owl is not in a good mood. I hope you go there fast.{nl}
Take that stick with you. They are my friends.{nl}I think you will need it from now on.
It will be okay. That owl is strong.{nl}It will be okay. It will be okay.
Guide Owl Statue
I almost fell into eternal sleep if it weren't you.{nl}Sequoia is our enemy now. Enemy!
Sequoia is not only owls' problem.{nl}It is attacking any living creatures!{nl}Please help us to defeat it.{nl}
If we let Sequoia act like now, all owls will be destroyed.{nl}Many people will die as well...{nl}There will be full of wandering spirits and we won't have any owls to guide us.{nl}
Sequoia is too late.{nl}They are not only attacking humans, but they also attack us who used to be it's old friends!{nl}
The memory of Sequoia and us together.. was it weaker than the vicious power?
Grave Protector Owl Sculpture
Thanks for saving me.{nl}I don't understand how I got attacked by those little things.{nl}Maybe I am too old now.
It seems that the Guide Owl finally made a decision.{nl}It once tried hard to bring Sequoia back to the way it used to before..{nl}
{memo X}Anyways, It's good.{nl}I need the Essence of Spirit from the spirit that is wandering around the grave of unknown warrior.{nl}You can do anything, just bring us the Essence.
The spirits that were wandering for a long time are like monsters.

Wow, you collected those Essences.{nl}When you go back to the Guide Owl, it will empower your weapon with the power of spirits.{nl}I am not sure if that will result in a positive outcome..Only Goddess will know.

It is a personal matter, but there is an angry owl at Cross Hill near here.{nl}But, after it fell into a deep sleep due to an incident, it is obsessed with evil power.{nl}Please wake up that angry owl and persuade it to gain it's conciousness again.{nl}
If it doesn't listen to you..{nl}Then just destroy it and let it go to the Goddess.
I will do anything to bring it back to it's normal status.
This is the symbol of the Guide Owl which guided his spirit.{nl}When it sleeps for a long time, it gets influenced by monsters.{nl}Many of its allies changed like that.{nl}
I am sorry. Let me be alone for a while.
So you brought the power of spirits.{nl}I will inject the power of spirits into your stick.{nl}The stick with lots of spirits' power like this will be able to destroy Sequoia.
You must succeed.{nl}If you think about those owls that were eaten by Sequoia or burnt into deaths, you must succeed this time.
What?{nl}Sequoia ran away alive?{nl}
That's a big problem!{nl}Desperate Owl is there..
It is my mistake. I thought it too easy. {nl}I didn't know this would happen. {nl}If Desperate Owl gets destroyed, then I..{nl}
Please..{nl}Please help Desperate Owl. {nl}
Desperate Owl Sculpture
It was very scary.{nl}Thanks for saving me.{nl}But, it seems that Sequoia is going crazier than usual so I feel relief..{nl}
Anyways, it seems that Sequoia when to Desperate Owl.{nl}I hope nothing happens..
I saw Sequoia was very angry and going crazy.{nl}I never saw Sequoia doing that before. We are going to be destroyed by it!{nl}So please help us!{nl}
Try everything we can.{nl}I need the blackened boughs.{nl}I will string them together and make a stronger stick.
Sequoia destroyed one of my friends, burnt this forest, and..{nl}
We basically have kind minds..{nl}I will curse Sequoia even at the moment that I fall into deep sleep.
This will be enough.{nl}It will be better if I could string my anger into it as well.
I made a stick with the curse from the blackend wood branches that you brought.{nl}Sequoia must be still near here.{nl}Please stab Sequoia using this.
Sequoia will swallow us and absorb more spirits' energy.{nl}At one time, he was our friend..{nl}But we forgot those days.
It's good to see the forest in burning in flames.{nl}It's okay. It's not surprising anymore.{nl}The day when the Sequoia was possessed with vicious energy was worse than this.
I hope the owls don't feel dissappointed due to their failure.{nl}Sequioia wasn't defeated, but that doesn't mean the stick had failed.{nl}Especially the last two blows must have been fatal to it.
However, if we let Sequoia act like that, it will burn the whole forest in flames.{nl}It will recover itself by swallowing us.{nl}Please destroy Sequoia now.
The scream from Sequoia is echoing even in my body.{nl}It wouldn't be difficult to defeat him now.{nl}You don't have time to waste anymore anyways.
You defeated Sequoia.{nl}It was once our protector, but it's death was cruel.{nl}The way we think about Sequoia.. You would never understand.
There are some purifying devices that doesn't activate right away. {nl}I've put in a guide for it so you just have to follow that.
There is a shopping plaza in the lower part of Klaipeda. {nl} Stop by and look around if you need anything.
I just want him to run away far. {nl}Nah, in fact, I don't know. He was a really good friend of me..
Okay.{nl}Please find the Grave Protector Owl from the grave of the unknown warrior.{nl}If he could lend us his power, it will be a good chance to defeat Sequioa.
Follower Adele
Thorny vines are also plants so they must be weak to strong acid.{nl}What do you think? Isn't that a good idea?
Filibo?{nl}I wouldn't worry if it only steals food.{nl}
It bites on any wooden materials on military equipments and it also breaks medicine jars.{nl}It makes holes to tents.{nl}And it is not afraid of anything. It attacks people.
Ha! Now I am relieved!{nl}The materials and the tents have come and the equipments and supplies would come soon..{nl}Then we should just wait for carts.. carts? carts?!!{nl}
Ah, I forgot about carts!{nl}I am sorry, but can you request carts to Pakelas?{nl}I can go myself, but I think I am gonna get scolded again.. Haha..
Adjutant General Pakelas
Ah, You must the tat famous.. Oh..It's so good to see you.{nl}Why have you come here?{nl}
Ah, carts..damn. Malt forgot them again..{nl}We have extra carts, but they need to be fixed so I should first check them.
Please check their status.{nl}Those soldiers should check them, so I am sorry..{nl}I will scold Bran.
What?{nl}These are the only carts that can function normally?
Damn. The materials and the equipments should come..{nl}Since I just can't wait, I should get some stems of Harming in the meantime.{nl}I feel dizzy already..
How should I scold Malt?
That's enough!{nl}I feel sorry to you.
So, does this mean that you can help me?{nl}Please get some claws from Velwrigglers at Rajuma Curved Path.
{memo X}Our revelator is so kind.{nl}Isn't he?
Darn, it just grazed, but it hurts so bad.{nl}Well done.
{memo X}It will be completed if I have Truffle poison mushrooms at Ajidu intersection.{nl}I am counting on you.
Where are the mushrooms from Truffles?{nl}Look closely at their horns. That is in fact a mushroom.
Isn't it strange that their mushroom grows from on their head?
It's already completed.{nl}Please mix all the ingredients that you've gathered at the Altar of Harmony at Isdidu Fork.
In the past, the altar was the place to purify holy water or objects dedicated to Goddess Saule.{nl}Forget about the past, right now it's better to use that place for its right purpose.
What was your impression of seeing the altar?{nl}I felt somewhat nostalgic by seeing it.
Anyway, the acidic solution will be completed after mixing them!
Please melt the thorny vines with this acidic solution.{nl}The thorny vines are located on the upper side of Isdidu Fork.
I hope Thorny Forest returns to what it used to look like.{nl}Birds are nowhere to be found right now.
Thorny Forest was once a very beautiful forest.{nl}We, the followers, used to hold sacred prayer ceremonies here.{nl}
It turned out like this after Demon Lord Bramble came to our forest.{nl}I can't remember the last time hearing the sounds of birds. I miss the old and beautiful forest...
Sometimes I miss the old forest.{nl}I also miss listening to the words of Goddess Saule.
Follower Birgis
There's nothing that we can't do with our religious faith.{nl}If there is anything that we can't do, then that's because our religious faith is not big enough.
Follower Noyus
{memo X}
Supplies Officer
I am the supplies officer here.{nl}I received the list of supplies that is needed, but look at the number of supplies here.{nl}I can't manage them myself.{nl}
I will get scolded by Selina if I am late..{nl}Can you help me?{nl}I need the grass called Jilgyung.
The people in charge must have forgot about the support.{nl}If not, do they think that we can live by eating nothing?
Wow, so fast.{nl}But that's not an end.{nl}If it would be done with Jilgyung, than I could have finished it myself.
Meat is perfect to cheer us up. Meat.{nl}The cows that grew by eating apples will be good, but there aren't any cows here.{nl}Let's try to hunt for Tinis that have similar taste.
The number of supplies is not the only reason that I am not acting quickly.{nl}Vubbes stole supplies before.{nl}Nowadays, zigris are doing that..
This is enough. Well done.{nl}I feel happy to see meat.
So.. We have everything we needed.. I will check the list again and report to Selina.{nl}Wait..{nl}
Ah.. They are worse than those Vubbes. Damn!! The potion jars went all missing..{nl}Those zigris sometimes steal the objects that seem unique to them.{nl}
They are more than thieves.{nl}If anything looks good, they take it away.
We don't have to worry about Zigris for a while.{nl}They will be scared to think about you.{nl}
Now we have everthing we needed.{nl}I was able to prepare them by the deadline.{nl}Now, I am relieved.
Fortunately, everything look alright.{nl}Those Zigrises.. I want to show them how scary I am.
There is a flag at the Zigris camp which Vubbes installed long ago.{nl}Now zigris are at the place.{nl}I don't care about that, more important thing is..{nl}
They just stole all the supplies that I gathered hard! I can't forgive them.{nl}They must know the pain. Please burn down the flag.{nl}I will check the supplies again!
Hahaha! Damn you Zigris!{nl}Understand now how scary I am!
Damn, I am confused.{nl}I have so many things to do, but the number of monsters is not decreasing..{nl}Don't you think so? I should do the job, but those monsters..
Forecastor Owl Sculptor
So you finally came here.
Before we get into a real action, we should try destroying the monsters nearby.{nl}We can't just get into real action right now.
You are indeed growing.
You are indeed the person I was waiting for.
Okay. then let's get into the real actions.{nl}You should awake the owls that will give you tests.{nl}Awake the three sculptures and try those three tests.
I am sure you can do it.
Examiner Owl Sculpture
I will wait at the test site.{nl}Please awake the other owls.

I will wait at the test site.{nl}Good luck..
You woke me up..{nl}You are ready to take the test, right?
Okay, then let's start the test.{nl}Please come to the place.
You passed the first test.
Please prepare for the second test.{nl}Please talk to me when you are ready.
You passed the second test.
It's gonna be the last test.{nl}Are you ready?
You passed the last test.{nl}Congratulations.{nl}Please meet the Forecastor Owl.
Please go to the forest again.{nl}The person waiting for you is there.{nl}Please put the pieces of the scupture toghther at the designated place.
Please do not forget your valuable experiences here.{nl}Don't be afraid, please move forward.
You woke me up to take the test.
I've been waiting for you. I'm the Swordsman Master, the one who will help you. {nl} I'm not sure if you know about attribute training. {nl}
Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl} You can learn attributes from each class master by paying them silver.
You'll be able to fight easier if you learn attributes. {nl}
You've come to the right place. I'm the Wizard Master. {nl} I'm going to teach you about attribute training. {nl}
Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl} You can learn attributes from each class master by paying them silver.
So did you understand the attributes? Now you'll be able to fight the enemies more easily.
How you become strong depends on what choice you make. {nl}It differs depending on your choice and thoughts.
Good to see you. I am the Archer Master. {nl} Do you know about attribute training? {nl}
Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl} You can learn attributes from each class master by paying them silver.
Mastering this attribute will help your skills in combat.
Will is the force to create magic power. {nl} There is not a stronger weapon for a wizard than that.
{memo X}The archer gives an arrow as a present, but the enemy take it as death.
There are ones who fit with the sword and there are those who don't. {nl} It means find something more valuable than your life.
$A Ranger's arrows target many, not only one.{nl}
{memo X}It's very likely you'll be exposed to the enemy when you shoot arrows. {nl} So my theory is that you have to use whatever comes in handy, like shields or stones.
One thing I'd like to tell you... I think your attack lacks something. {nl} If you learn skills, you'll be able to make more powerful attacks when you need.
There are different skills for each class but you will be able to fight better when you learn it. {nl} Also, you can do a lot of things aside from attacking.
{memo X}What do you think? There are a lot of useful skills, right? {nl} Using the skills effectively will be of great help in combat. {nl}
Oh, you said we need to assemble? {nl} Please let the battle commander know about it too. He's over there on the right.
Guiding spirits is an important task, but it's not a pleasant task.{nl}There's nothing happier than living right?
Blackened boughs can be found when you defeat the monsters nearby.
Others are violent as well, but Filibos are the worst.{nl}They are resilient as hell.{nl}I think I can relax a bit if they get taken care of.
Jilgyung is all around here so you can easily find it.{nl}I will do other works first.
There are many Tinis when you climb up the hill from the road down.{nl}8 big scoops will do.
We don't have time collect the potion jars again.{nl}Let's go steal the jars that Zigris stole from us. They are the ones who started this.
Monsters really like the Essences of Spirits.{nl}They become strong when they absorb the power.
If it goes wrong.. then go meet the Gatekeeper Owl.{nl}He is most clever among us.{nl}May the Goddess bless you.
Nice to meet you, follower of the Goddess. {nl} Do you know about learning attributes?
Welcome, you who follow the goal of the Goddess.{nl}Do you know about the attributes' training?
Now do you understand what the attributes are? {nl} Acquiring attributes will help you to easily defeat the enemies. {nl}
Healing and helping others is the mission of the Clerics. {nl} How can you ignore the people seeking help in the name of the Goddess.
People are suffering in body and mind from the wounds of Medis Diena.{nl} They need our help.
I am sorry, but please find my ally, Badat.{nl}I haven't heard anything from him since he left to do research.
I don't know where he is gone.{nl}He will be in danger without protection from mercenaries.
Gorath was looking for me?{nl}I am sorry. I will be done when I find the rest of the research materials.
Thanks. I was thinking maybe Tontus may have swallowed it.{nl}I promise you that I will go back to the Research Camp when you find me this.
{memo X}I remember the most of it, but those are really important research materials.{nl}They contain the information on how we could enter into the Mausoleum and etc.
So this is all? hmm..{nl}Thanks for finding them. I will go back to the Research Camp.
Monsters will get no benefits by obtaining those research materials.{nl}But, there are many people claiming that they lost the materials. Isn't it strange?
You want to be our disciple?{nl}Do you know who we are?
We should ask for more when we are in times like this.{nl}I don't know what they are looking for, but they pay a lot when something is discovered at the Mausoleum.{nl}{nl}
Good. Good. This will be enough.
$Now go get lime from the monsters that swallowed some.
After finish making this, I am outta of this town.{nl}I stayed here so long.
Good. Go meet my partner at Garden of Poles with this.{nl}He is called Vincent and he is very skillful.
Ah. Welcome.{nl}There aren't any people in this world who can make counterfeits well like us.{nl}
I needed someone to do some errands.{nl}Get some firewoods that are scattered on the ground.
Vincent
Ah, ah so you are the newcomer.{nl}Check the thing behind me and if the thing inside of it gets solidified, bring it to me.{nl}{nl}
Where should we go?{nl}Are there more valuable places than the Mausoleum?
You are very skillful as a starter.{nl}By the way.. do you know how we were able to survive in this world?
I am looking for the poles that were used in building the Mausoleum.{nl}If you see unique poles, please let me know.
Aren't they amazing?{nl}I wish I live here forever doing researches on those poles.
They are great pieces.{nl}We should go to Zlugi ruins.
I request for your guard one more time.{nl}I don't want to get disturbed by the monsters while I am observing.
It was a good study because of you.{nl}But, I found some traces of magics on them. I feel angry about it.
Ho. As I expected.{nl}The one I am looking for must be marked.
I am smarter than you guys think!{nl}Do you think I am gonna get deceived by you guys?
It is a real honor to be chosen as a member of the research team, but I am afraid of making mistakes.
The man with silver hair requested me something, what was it?{nl}Or was it blonde hair?
Forecastor Owl
Necroventer has obstructed the road to Thorn Forest. {nl} You must defeat the Necroventer to enter Thorn Forest.
The Owl Sculpture with anger
Die all those who are resistant to Necroventer.
{memo X}
Revelator! I wanted to meet you for a long time.{nl}Pitt and I applied to the military because we wanted to listen to your heroic stories.{nl}But we are just standing guards..It's depressing.{nl}
If you are okay, can you persuade our commander so we can go out to the battlefield?{nl}The commander may permit us to go if you ask him..{nl}And that will be a good experience for us.
Wow, you are my role model. I respect you!
I think something good will happen since I met you.{nl}Yes.. something good will happen.
Hm Hm, actually.. {nl}I am here to solve the problems.. no, I was called to server for the military.{nl}
You probably saw it when you came a while ago. Thorny Bushes. They are very resilient, but we have a solution.{nl}I was born here so I know them well.{nl}
Please gather the fluids that come out from Tinis.{nl}It has a gland that contains the fluids near it's tail.{nl}Be careful since it smells bad.
I can make it quickly if I have them a lot.{nl}Yes. Very quickly..
Wow, it's more than I thought. {nl}Please wait a bit. It will be done quickly..
Okay.. When you pour this onto Thorny Bushes, they will die quickly.{nl}Yes. I grew that..ah, no. I made that. I can guarantee it's effectiveness.
What a lovely Thorny Bus..{nl}Ah! No. What am I saying..
What was that? I thought we just needed to defeat Thorny Bushes.{nl}It was tremendous!{nl}
Herb broker is not here, anyways let's go back to the training camp!{nl}I want to tell this to Raimondas as soon as possible!

So you guys are the ones who wanted go to the battlefield?{nl}You guys are not good. Nothing to expect from you guys.{nl}And those pets.. are you guys crazy to take those pets to dangerous battle field?
What is that defiant glare? {nl}You don't wanna accept that you are not skillful?
Okay. I like your attitude.{nl}But that is not enough.{nl}Defeat those Golems at the training camp and bring me the evidence that you defeated them. Then I will acknowledge your skill.
Fighting Golems will be easier than going to the battlefield.
Lads. You came. Show me the evidence.{nl}You defeated Golems? or you just ran way from them?
Good! Very nice. I will acknowledge your skill.{nl}Do not ever forget. The ones who survive in this war are the winners.{nl}
Okay. You go back to Raimondas.{nl}Be confident.
Okay. Have you brought the evidence?
Very good. You guys are the members of my camp now.
The feeling that you felt while you were fighting against the Golem. Do not forget.{nl}The newcomers these day.. I don't find any confidence in them..
By the way.. I don't see that hairy creature that you used to take with you.{nl}Tell me what happened to it.
Okay. I received a strange report so I was wondering what happened.{nl}I heard the dead body of a monster was found near Morkos farm.
That monster looked like the monster you used to have.{nl}I will give you the first mission. Search Morcus farm.{nl}Find out if it's the same breed or if it's the monster that you used to have.
Good luck on your first mission.{nl}If that is him, it's so pity.
Ah... how could this... It's not true. This body must not be Spion's!!{nl}I can't believe it. Look closely, it must be a different monster.
No... No way... How could you be...{nl}No...
Ah... Spion!! How... Because of me, you...{nl}We are so sorry...
Herb broker!! This is all because of the herb broker.{nl}I will find that broker and get revenge for Spion!{nl}Where is he, by the way?
It's not your fault that Spion turned out like this.{nl}Even if that's your fault, it's not that Spion should die.
Okay. What happened to the monster's dead body?{n}
Okay.{nl}This would have never happened if I found the identity of the broker sooner...{nl}Pitt, Bran, I am so incompetent... I am so sorry.
I want to thank you.{nl}You made them real soldiers.
Well done.{nl}I will take care of that myself.{nl}Those Siaulambs should practice running away from now on.
I can't stand this anymore.{nl}I will defeat it myself.{nl}You follow me too. If you could help us, that will really help us out.
Thanks for saying that.{nl}I will wait at Malkos Felled Area.
If I was a little richer, then I would have hired a personal mercenary.{nl}It was my mistake to rely on the Goddess' blessing too much.
I know many people are missing, but no one tries to find them.{nl}They don't even know those people even existed.
We should make some money when the world is in chaos.{nl}Ah, never mind.
Farewell to this land when this is over.{nl}I never saw that scary man before.
No one will believe what I saw.{nl}I learned something interesting from it.
I will lure Saugas.{nl}Bring me the poison from Woodfung near Alkune Stairway.{nl}And please also bring me the stone with vigor.{nl}
It's fortunate that you two are okay.{nl}Thanks for recognizing me. May the Goddess bless you.
Good luck.
I will feel more comfortable if I do that myself, but my knee which was shot by an arrow before aches a lot.
If you look closely at the stones across Apynys Camp, it will definitely appear.{nl}I hope the artifacts haven't been digested fully yet.
$The evil forces have caused the Guardians to break the stone plate which contained the rules of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Defeat the Guardians and bring back the pieces.
$Those Guardians are trying to break the stone lantern of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Stop them. They are out of control.
Everything at the Royal Mausoleum is designed for the revelation.
$With the Great King's will weakened within them, some Guardians now prioritize the Royal Slate more than the Revelation.{nl}It's tragic.
The rules of the Royal Mausoleum are in place.{nl}We can prevent the evil beings from getting near the revelation.
My wound is deep, so please pass the object to me when you find it.{nl}Meet Kepect at Apvija Hills.
I welcome you with our family's courtesy.{nl}To obtain the great king's spell, you need to be qualified.{nl}You should also possess courage and wisdom to unleash the seal.
There's a white oak tree at Zeme Plateau.{nl}First, extract some fluids from it.

This will be enough.{nl}Let's move on to the next step.

Our family has been waiting for the chosen one for hundreds of years.{nl}It is a real honor for our generation to meet you.
{memo X}
It is sealed with two seals so that only the chosen one could obtain it.{nl}The chosen one should possess courage and wisdom to unleash all the seals.{nl}
Of course, our family's men will guide you.{nl}We know that you are qualified.
These are fluids that I've collected for hundreds of years.{nl}Be careful since lots of monsters are after those fluids.
{memo X}
It's very fortunate that Jonas regained consciousness.
I was waiting for you.{nl}Do you have the Great King's key?{nl}
Okay. Find the map that indicates the location of the seal.{nl}Also, there is false information on the map, so you should check various places.
This is something that should not be handed over to those demons.{nl}I don't know the exact location.
Nothing here.
But, there are still places to check.{nl}I will mark them on the map, so please check all those marked places.
You found it.{nl}The inheritance of Zachariel, the Great King, has been waiting for you.
{memo X}This map contains all the locations of the seal devices at Awaiting Stone Bridge.{nl}When you unleash the seals with the king's key, you will realize what to do next.
{memo X}
No antidotes yet?{nl}His pulse is fading.{nl}
Thank you!{nl}Fortunately, he is breathing again.{nl}
We'll rest a little more and return when he regains his strength.{nl}May the Goddess bless you.
$The Revelator is here?! Thank the goddess..{nl}I am a historian, Rexipher. I am studying the Mausoleum.{nl}
We already have the most of the answers.{nl}But to get the last answer, I need your help.
{memo X}There are things that only revelator could see.{nl}The questions from the owner of the tomb..
It is so good to meet a person like you, I guess this is the blessing of the god.
Good.{nl}The next epitaph is at Shirnas Highland. Let's go.
I wonder what they tried to protect by building the tomb.{nl}I want to see it myself.
Are you okay?{nl}The next epitaph is at Dykyne intersections.
The god is quiet. {nl}I think the tomb will be the same.
It was dangerous.{nl}But, we can't stop.
{memo X}
What do I want to get from the Mausoleum?{nl}That's a secret.
{memo X}Zachariel's journey is not easy.{nl}With the skill you have, he should have recognized you.
The last epitaph is at Apati cliff.{nl}I hope Zachariel understands our truth.
{memo X}Soon we should have all clues.{nl}I am looking forward to it.
{memo X}
{memo X}Is that so..{nl}The clues are covered with something so I can barely see them.{nl}
How about you bring us the teeth of Hogma?{nl}It's okay if it takes some time.
{memo X}I will wait here patiently.{nl}No need to hurry since we have the clues.
I feel reliable.{nl}I will see you at Isvalyta Ruins.
{memo X}Explained about the writings on the epitaph.
Historian Odell
There was an order to withdraw from here.{nl}I still have many things to research on.
Are you looking for a person?{nl}Can you tell me the name of the person you are looking for?
Are you sure the name is Rexipher?{nl}There's no one with such name on our list.{nl}Ask other people to see if there's someone who knows Rexipher.
I searched the list and asked other people..{nl}There's no one with the name Rexipher.{nl}I am sorry that I couldn't be a help.
Rexipher? I am not sure.{nl}Are you sure that's the correct name?
Moving around with the name, Rexipher, she must be very courageous.
Wait a min. I read it from a book.{nl}Rexipher is the lord of the demons who serves for the demon king, Baiga.
Using the name of a demon, that doen't look like a good intent.

She is a crazy person controlling monsters.{nl}She made me like this and she also destroyed the altar which I used to research on.{nl}
Go to Cheses altar first. {nl}They are also aiming for Gedula altar too.
