We shouldn't be hanging around like this.{nl}We should go after Rexipher.
The seals that haven't been destroyed yet at the Plateau of Rex will block Rexipher.{nl}That means you would have enough time to chase after Rexipher.
Please go to the Mausoleum.{nl}We should find out what Rexipher has in her mind.
I came here since Laulas' injury is severe.{nl}How did she unleash the seal?
{memo X}
Anways, Rexipher will go after the remaining altar.{nl}Go to the nearest Chedeque's altar. It is on the way to Keturka Entrance.
Ruklys was a traitor so his monument also received ordeals.{nl}After it was broken into five pieces, they all dissappeared.{nl}
I am trying to find one of them by using small trees at Balkonas wilderness.{nl}With a wooden piece from the monster, we will make an exploration stick to find it.
There's a piece below Secrus Bridge that is suspected to be a piece from the monument.{nl}But Achat is around there so I can't reach near.
TreeAmbulo that lives in Gaisra Hall likes to collect stone pieces.{nl}Maybe, the pieces from the monument could be there.
Hmm.. Let's see.
{nl}Ah, here it is. I found it.{nl}Now I can string the pieces together.
{memo X}$We are the believers of Goddess Saule.{nl}We are here to prevent Thorny Bushes from growing in this forest.{nl}
If it weren't us, all of this forest will be covered with thorny vines.
Human controlling monsters.. That's the first time I saw such thing.{nl}And why did she break the altars..
{memo X}
Please take care of those Tamas. I am getting disturbed by them.{nl}When I gain my conciousness, those tamas are all around me and glancing at me.
{memo X}The artifacts that Raymond is looking for are not there.{nl}I think probably Tama has swallowed it.{nl}What do you think?
I guarantee you that Tama swallowed it. Do you want to bet?
It truly existed.{nl}Is it expensive? I don't know how expensive it is.
{memo X}Can you see the good source of money? I mean the fluids from the small trees.{nl}How about we make money together?
I don't care what's it's use.{nl}But I am glad that it is precious.
You brought a lot.{nl}Thank you so much!
I saw the fragements that are buried on the ground as I ran away from Tamas at the intersections. {nl}I am trying to negotiate with Raymond using those so can you bring me those?
It's okay if you quit.{nl}I can't do anything at the moment due to those monsters.
It's enough.{nl}They will do something if I brought them to them.
Thanks.{nl}It was in the dream.
I will pray for the Goddess to bless you.{nl}You should block him no matter what.
I came here after hearing that her epitaph is here, but it will be difficult alone.{nl}I hope I have a companion. Are you interested?
He is the traitor of the Kadumel's era and the owner of Tower of the Earth.{nl}He was regarded as the best swordsman even when he was young and lots of people followed him.
His greed was too much so he caused coup de ta.{nl}If the great merchant, Premier Eminent wasn't there, the the histroy could have changed a lot.
Ruklys learned from the same teacher that I used to learn from.{nl}That's why I understand what he wants to achieve and what's his objective.
{memo X}We have no choice. We should get charcoal ourself.{nl}Those trees with long branches at the square at the brook will do us good.
This is more like praising. I should rip it off.{nl}Carrying something that has praises about the traitor written on it may lead me to the prison.
The fourth epitaph is at Shiluma Altar and the last epitaph is beyond Griuve. {nl}Let's say farewell here since I should also check them myself from here.
[Can't read the rest since the epitaph is damaged.]{nl}

As I landed on this land as a bystander, I saw the epitaphs of my predecessors.{nl}Long ago, Ruklys tried to accomplish the revolution,{nl}Lydian Schaffen also formed her forces and they still remain nowadays.
If you are talking about that epitaph, it was broken long time ago when monsters swept on it.
But, I have the rubber copy.{nl}If you could find my bag for me, then I may tell you about it.
Thanks. As promised, I will tell you about it.{nl}
But, I was ignorant at then.{nl}I too may had to concentrate on accomplishing my mission.
When you use this collecting device on those small trees, the fluids will be collected inside.{nl}Bring those to me when you collect them.
I feel so reliable. The first and the second epitaphs are located near Virdului Cabin. {nl}I will give you necessary tools so bring the rubber copies of them.
My tower that will stand towards the Goddess Gabija may carry that answer with it.{nl}But, I won't ruin the task as my predecessors did.

I got my luggage back with your help so I will help you again.{nl}
Go to Pelena. {nl}On the way to it, there is the epitaph which you are looking for.
Let's see, it may take little time to put them together.{nl}Can you take care of the monsters nearby while I am concentrating?
Well done.{nl}It took little long because there was a small piece.
It's so cruel to be a traitor.{nl}He was a respected swordsman, but even the monument after his death was not in good status.
He even casted magic on the monument after it was broken into pieces.{nl}It's so hard to find those pieces because of those monsters that were inflicted on that magic.
Ah, That's the object I ordered.{nl}It finally came.
Don't you want to know what to do with it?{nl}I will call the powerful spirit from Dumbil pond.
Thanks.{nl}It will take some time to dry it.{nl}
It will be a plesant experience.
I need a live creature to sacrifice to complete this spell.{nl}Lizard Man on the way to Dumbal Pond would be good.
The spirits are mischievous and primitive.{nl}Lizard Man will be good for the experiement since it is very fast.
The Lizard Man that you sent to us was really lively.{nl}Now, we are almost done.
The peak of this spell will be Incroberk.{nl}I will give you the stone to control minds so please bring me Incroberk.
Those Incroberks that you brought me are not enough.{nl}Please try harder.
Well done.{nl}This will be enough.
{memo X}Thank you for making your way here. {nl} I am Knight Commander Uska and I am in charge of Siauliai and Klaipeda. {nl}
{memo X}The Bishop told me to send the Revelator to the Crystal Mine as soon as they arrive. {nl} The Goddess told him in his dreams that the evidence of salvation would be found there. {nl}
The monsters there are extremely dangerous so you be careful.
{memo X}All right. {nl} Oh, do not forget to offer worship to the Goddess Statue before you leave. {nl}
{memo X}Also, drop by the Item Merchant for the warp scrolls I left with him.
You have so much curiosity.{nl}Okay. Bring me the grass that only grows at Kriakul Stream.
Please use this stone to Lizard Man.{nl}After getting control of it, it will run to me.
The era of Kadumel was the period of turbulence.
Tyrant Kadumel, Premier Eminent who was renowned as the great merchant and the disciples of Maven..{nl}They all lived extraordinary lives.{nl}
There are many artifacts here that praise the heroes of that time.{nl}And there are many side stories of them as well.
When you use the stone to Incroberks, they will automatically come to me.{nl}Okay then, I am counting on you.
She is the most impressive Archer in the history.{nl}She defeated Ruklys who was a traitor and the great swordsman with an arrow.{nl}
That's why all archers want to purchase things that are related to her even if they are expensive.{nl}She is like the Goddess to us archers.
There was a priest called Maven in the past.{nl}He is the person who built the great cathedral. Anyways.{nl}
Maven lived for a long time and he had three disciples.{nl}The first one was Ruklys and the second one was Lydia Schaffen.{nl}
And when Lydia Schaffen got old, Agailla Flurry became the last disciple.{nl}As the other two disciples were, Agailla Flurry was a great person.
She learned all magics that existed then.{nl}She also built Mage Tower. She was so amazing.
Our old man always complains.{nl}Even if I give him the best things to him, he always complains.{nl}
I don't wanna help him since he always complains.{nl}I am sorry, but can you tell my feelings to the old man?
When he first came here, he had hard time adopting to the new environment.{nl}I used to cook him some food and made him some clothes..
How come Cahill didn't come here and how come you are saying that?{nl}Well, it doesn't matter. Are you finished?
Hey. Since you came, please do some errands.{nl}You see those lumbers over there? Please bring me ones that are fine among them.
Cahill is helpful. {nl}Except for his complaints..
What! Can't you find more decent ones?{nl}Well.. that's okay..
Please give this crutches which I made myself to Cahill.{nl}Where was Cahill hurt his ankle..
Before I change my mind, get outta here.
Crutches from Moze..{nl}I really don't know what he is thinking.
I didn't say it's over.{nl}Please get me the leather of Wing Frogs near this camp.{nl}
I don't wanna know it's use.
Damn, it's worse than the lumber that you brought a while ago{nl}Wait, I haven't told you to leave yet.

Now, hurry. {nl} We can finally end it this time.
This time, it can finally come to an end.

Have you seen my ring?{nl}If you see my ring, please bring it to me.
That ring is full of divine energy so it will be hard for monsters to swallow it.{nl}Unless the monster is big.
You found my ring! {nl}Thanks. Thank you so much!

I hope the Goddess stands still until then.

We will succeed..

I really want to know how my family is doing but I'm too scared of the monsters to go back. {nl} I just ran out of the house and I regret it a lot.
{memo X}
I just feel sorry to my brother.
$Old Man of Andale village
God is looking after our village so our village has clear water and air. And there are no disasters here.
So finally the revelator has come.{nl}Very healthy and reliable. I gues we can do it this time.
Aren't you the Revelator? {nl} So, what brings you to our village? {nl}
Goddess Saule? {nl} We haven't seen her for a long time. {nl}
The portal leading to Goddess Saule just won't open. {nl}I think it's all because the diving pond is contaminated.
Tanu in Zvelgian Vacant Lot has the purifying stone. {nl} That would be able to purify the pond.
Just like there are many demons, same goes for the Goddesses. {nl} The five Goddesses are just the ones who became well known.
Our village serves Goddess Saule who overlooks the sun. {nl}We used to go see her a lot before through the portal but one day, the portal closed.
{memo X}I haved carved the owls for a long time.{nl}At one point in time, they got their lives and determination.{nl}
{memo X}When I gained my conciousness, a few hundreds of years have passed.
{memo X}Sculptors should be careful not to exaggerate their skills.{nl}They should be humble to themselves.
It is a good sign that you, the revelator came here.{nl}We've been waiting for you for a long time.
Please come to our village.{nl}Villagers will really like you.{nl}For sure.
The god guides us to meet together.
Don't think it's a pain. We received a blessing.
Trust the god.{nl}We can be together in the tree.
We will be saved by being together.{nl}The god had told us to do that.
Not yet?{nl}Where is the girl?
{memo X}I can't use my power since I was deceivied by the demon's trick.{nl}You should find my power to guide you to the revelation.
That portal is the gate to lies.{nl}Laima has brought you to me because of that.
Demon Lord Bramble can absolutely never be forgiven.
Bramble must be recovering his power even at this moment.{nl}Please meet the believers at Gate Route.
Please be careful of the trick of the observer at Gate Route.
{memo X}I am gonna stay here and recover my lost energy.{nl}I don't wanna create chaos in this world so please do not tell my existence to anyone.
{memo X}The Mausoleum you should go can be reached only through the portal that I have opened for you.{nl}May the Goddess bless you.
It seems that rain won't stop. In fact, it rarely stopped.{nl}Do you think this is because of the vicious energy?
These thorny vines just keep growing even after we cut them.{nl}But it's better than doing nothing.
Even if Bramble disappears, I think I am gonna stay like this for a while.{nl}The entire forest is covered with thorny vines. They are so big.
So, you seem to live up to your reputation. {nl} Our people in the village are just cowards hoping the Goddess will take care of everything.
But, did you not see the young man of our village? {nl} I told him to go see how the portal works, but I have not heard back since then.
Thank you. {nl} The portal is in the Nugria Sanctum
Injured Villager
Thank you for saving me.
So you're the Revelator the Mayor spoke about. {nl} I'm fine, please check the portal of the sanctum.
The portal can be opened from the altar in Nugria Sanctum.
It doesn't work? {nl} Well, that's going to be a big problem. {nl}
{memo X}
{memo X}That portal is.. a fantasy... No. A portal going to Goddess Saule. {nl} Anyway, opening the portal is very important.
Injuries are not that severe so don't worry. Please check the portal in the sanctuary first.
I will move again if I take a little rest.{nl}But first, the portal...
Ah, so you are the Revelator!{nl}It's a real honor for us.
Monsters are trying to attack us, but we can't just quit the purification process.{nl}Saule has told us to do that.
{memo X}
We want to live quietly by serving Saule.
Royal Mausoleum Guardian's Stone Statue
The rules of the Royal Mausoleum are being ruined by the forces of evil.
$Guardian's Stone Statue
It is our mission to protect the Great King Zachariel who is in his rest.{nl}We will defeat anyone who disturbs Zachariel's rest.
We will destroy anyone who intrudes into the Royal Mausoleum.
It is our mission to protect the Great King Zachariel who is in his rest.{nl}We will defeat anyone who disturbs Zachariel's rest.
Wheelen! Oh, my faithful Guardians..{nl}If the chosen one comes here, do your best to give him the weapon of Saam.{nl}The spear that will break the armor of evil.
$Venucelos are very brave and loyal.{nl}But, if their loyalty are the enemies', they are worthless.{nl}The dogs who can't protect the Royal Mausoleum will lose the leash with the king's name on it.

The proof of powerfulness! Such a beautiful words..{nl}Zachariel was proud to create the gigantic Guardians.{nl}And he put the secret documents of the kingdom in those Guardians so that the one who defeats them can get those documents.
$Guardian's Stone Statue
{memo X}Listen quietly with your eyes closed.{nl}The nature keeps singing to us the songs of lives.
Broker between the life and death of humans. {nl} That's what Bokor is, if you ask.
You don't look like a delivery man. What's up?{nl}
I can't see the head of the tree with long branches. Do you want me to get it for you?
Klaipeda is a small and quiet town. {nl} We haven't had so many people come to town before.
Did the Goddess mention where she is in the dream of revelation?
Go ahead to Klaipeda. {nl} Commander Uska is waiting for you in the Central Plaza.{nl}
I heard the bishop also had a dream about the Goddess... And I think it has to do with it.
That girl. {nl} She just appeared in town some time ago. {nl}
I mean she didn't speak and her clothes were all dirty. {nl} She seemed hungry so I brought her home to feed her some food and this happened.
I mean the girl who was confined together with us before. {nl} Do you think she has a family? It seemed like she could not speak at all. {nl}
If I was a parent, I probably would have gone around like mad looking for my daughter. {nl} Parents nowadays are really irresponsible. {nl}
The girl did not speak at all. {nl} In addition to that, a young lady all grown up walking all the way to this remote village barefoot. Doesn't it seem strange?
Can we go home..
I want to go home soon..
{memo X}
{memo X}Husband of refugee family
{memo X}
Oh, the Accessory Merchant said she has a gift for you. {nl} Would you mind visiting her?
You can meet the Accessory Merchant if you go straight to the left from here.
Accessory Merchant
Nice to meet you! Are you the Revelator chasing the dream of the Goddess? {nl} I'm going to give you this accessory as a present. {nl}
{memo X}If armor protects you from physical attacks, accessories protect you from magic attacks. {nl} I hope this will be useful for you.
You can meet the Accessory Merchant if you go straight to the left from here. {nl}
Ah, I was waiting for you.{nl}Are you person chosen by the Eyes of the Great King Zachariel?
Welcome.
Oh, seems like you have Yukopus leaves and Kepa stems. {nl} I need a lot of those. Can you share some with me?
Thank you very much. {nl} I need these to treat the injured men in our village but I don't have enough.
I know you tried hard but I need some more.
I still need more Yukopus leaves and Kepa stems. {nl} But I don't want to just take them from you. What about trading it with the potions I have?
Your act of kindness really gives me a lot of strength.
Thanks you! {nl}I hope it would be helpful for you.
Yukopus and Kepas appear around the Miner's Village.
{memo X}Hey, are you going to take on those Vubbes? {nl} But your equipment seems a bit shabby... Do you mind if I help you with it?
{memo X}Get me a few materials and I'll help you craft some new armors. {nl} The materials needed can be obtained from Large Red Kepa, Yukofus, and Vubbe Thief.
{memo X}Large Red Kepa, Red Kepa, Yukopus, and Vubbe Thief. {nl} Not sure if it's a good thing but you can craft some pretty useful stuff with what the monsters drop.
{memo X}I'll give you the recipe so try crafting the armor with the materials I gave you. {nl} You will feel more reassured. Well then, may the Bless of Goddess be with you!
I am looking for medicines to cure wounded ones.
{memo X}Oh you brought it. {nl} This is the front plate. {nl} Keep it until we have all the parts ready to craft an armor.
{memo X}Oh, here we are. Let's see. {nl} Seems like you brought enough of what we needed. {nl} You can make a Mantle with it. {nl} This reminds me of the good old days.
{memo X}Ordinary Man
{memo X}This is the back plate. {nl} I'll let you craft when we have all the other materials ready.
{memo X}Here you go. This is a Chest protector made of leather. {nl}It was fun to do this in a long time.
Bone fragments are seen in the well.
I'm furious and upset. {nl} If we got here earlier, we wouldn't have been totally wiped out ... {nl}
$Dear Revelator, I have a favor to ask of you. {nl}Can you recover the keepsakes of my comrades?
{memo X}It's bad enough that they were killed by the Vubbes, but even their keepsakes are being abused. How awful...
{memo X}Thank you. {nl} My comrades will now be able to rest in peace.
$Oh my God. The Vubbes stole all the food supplies. {nl} They even took our food for today... Please use your strength to help us.
They stole the food meant for both the army and the residents. {nl} What do we do if we can't get back our food.. {nl}
Thank you. {nl} This will at least get us through the next few days.
Thank you for your help earlier, but there are more keepsakes that need to be retrieved. {nl} Think of my comrades who can't rest in peace.. {nl}
So please help us. {nl} If you get us back the rest of the keepsakes, we will provide compensation.
{memo X}Thank you, but we still need more... {nl} Sorry... {nl}
{memo X}We've almost collected all the keepsakes... {nl} Please help us til the end.
{memo X}It hurts to think about giving these keepsakes to my dead comrades' families.
{memo X}Thank you very much. {nl} My comrades can now rest in peace with the Goddesses.
We survived immediate danger with your help earlier, but we still need some assistance. {nl} Could you help us out a bit more?
I'm enraged thinking about the Vubbes who will be heartily satisfied with our food. {nl}Especially with such difficult times nowadays.
Thank you. {nl} We're still lacking some goods, but at least we got back this much.
Fedimian Resident
I heard the wise man Maven who built the great cathedral left five necklaces.{nl}I also heard that the one who collects those five necklaces will possess the great power.

Hey, if you are planning to keep on your journey, don't get close to the cursed city.{nl}It didn't even receive the blessing on the Medis Diena. You will turn into a stone if you get close to the city.
{memo X}$It's true that I am looking for the Revelator, but I need someone skillful.{nl}I am sorry, but you don't look like the Revelator I am looking for.
{memo X}There is The Great Cathedral, which was built by Maven, beyond Pilgrim's Way.{nl}Ruklys, Lydia Schaffen, and Agailla Flurry are all his disciples.
The Great Cathedral was significantly damaged on The Medis Diena, so I wonder if there are people still going there, but...{nl}There once was a great many of people going there to do various rituals.
They call the trail to The Great Cathedral, Pilgrim's Way.
{memo X}$Welcome. {nl} Only hard-to-find stuff here.
Hawkers of Klaipeda
I came to pray in the distance Klaipeda. {nl} again as disaster does not occur, I like son between the army returns Moruchonhi.
Each time you come here along the husband on the Klaipeda, it is always prayer to come here. {nl} I was either God Beast of the day also defended to me was one wishes excluded get to.
Don't you ever think about going to the great cathedral.{nl}Besides the dangers due to it's breakages..
Yes. The Pilgrim's Way that must be passed when you wanna go to the great cathedral.{nl}Ah well.. the spirits of
Seal of Vubbe Tribe, Horn of Pantos, Heart of Merog, Teeth of Hogma. {nl} That is a lot! {nl}
The bootys that you've obtained are not to be boasted about.{nl}How about we bet?
{memo X}
Haha, I lost.{nl}You are great as I heard so. Here, it's your reward as promised/
I have buried a revelator once in the past.{nl}I was too arrogant with the trust from the Goddess.
It's freightening to think that I turned out like this after all.{nl}I don't know whether I will bury one more revelator in the future.. You won't know either.
Are you proud of your skills to talk to me at this moment while the time is passing?
{memo X}If a person becomes a handful of soils after his death, can you imagine how he will be treated.{nl}The soils that once conquered this world..
{memo X}Yes. You managed to avoid being like me. Yes..
Without the blessing from the Goddess, You must be near the Goddess now.{nl}But lots of people can't do that anymore.{nl}
{memo X}
{memo X}We can't revive the people who died by Chapparitions.{nl}I feel sorry, but we can't just do nothing.
Innocent Spirit
Do not be surprised. {nl} There's something to give you before returning to the Goddess. {nl}
I want to apologize to my sister who left house because of me but now I can't even do that. {nl} Can you find my sister and give her this necklace for me?
My brother asked you to give this necklace to me? {nl} Where is my brother?
Innocent Soldier
You are new here. Defeat all monsters nearby on behalf of me.{nl}Somehow, I can't move.
Now I can go back to my hometown.{nl}Do you best, newcomer..
Errand Man
{memo X}What. This isn't the Ripper? {nl}But since you've seen my face, you'll soon be cursed to death. {nl}
Wait a minute. No. No. {nl} Deliver this letter and I'll bump it. {nl} You just have to deliver it to Ripper, the guard of Fedimian. Do not look at what's written in the letter.
Letter forme? What is this.. {nl}
Curse? I get it, I get it!{nl} I'll give you this money, so please tell him to not curse!
{memo X}huhu. Poor guy. He won't be able to see the light soon {nl} Whether it's in prison or coffin, only he will know. {nl} I feel sorry for the dead soldiers.
Oh, I really thank you for last time. {nl}My injury is getting better now that I can move. {nl}
But, uh, I'm too hungry and do not have energy to go back to boss. If {nl} If you have anything to eat, can you share some?
Oh, thank you so much! {nl} I'll take this to recover and return to the commander for sure.
Chicks.. They remind me of Sparnas.{nl}I don't wanna see him even in my dreams.
Hm, Okay. I have accessories that will fit on that.{nl}I don't need them anymore so I want to give them to you if you could take care of the monsters nearby.
Not yet?{nl}They will fit on you nicely.
Yes. Well done.{nl}Here you go. It's a gift to you as promised.{nl}
Don't underestimate it. It was a strong animal in the old stories.{nl}In some places, one becomes an enemy to all other people just by touching that animal.
{memo X}
{memo X}The canyon area is like a grave for many explorers and historians. {nl} And we study to find more factual history on top of their graves.
Thank you. {nl} Our academia will not forget him too.
The revelator is lying here after he said such thing.{nl}If he survives after facing the nearby monsters for 2 minutes,
Next time, be careful when using public utilities. {nl} Well that's that and you have some great power.
Oh.. It's absurdity gets me at loss for words every time I look at it. {nl} Was is really this fragile..
I don't feel good.{nl}We may have to evacuate from here.
{memo X}
I will pray for that monsterl.{nl}If there are spirits who would listen to my prayer..
Unfortunately... I don't know where my brother is. {nl} He also probably won't know my whereabouts too.
I can't leave here unless I complete the mission..
He is so stupid. {nl} He could have given it sooner in good terms rather than getting on each other's nerves. {nl} Hmm. Maybe I belittled myself too much.
Don't you act like you know me anymore! {nl} It not my fault. That's the one who's bad!
Are we there yet? {nl} I think we need to eat something to regain strength.
Frankly, I'm afraid of what the world will turn into.
Cyrenia Odell
Hmm.. where is this place?{nl}What about Rexipher? Where is he?
$Ah, the woman. I forgot.{nl}I will release her as promised, so keep her alive.
Sincerity is our strength. {nl} There will be no problems if you sincerely believe and follow the Goddess.
I think being confined in there damaged my throat and now my throat hurts. {nl} But what about the girl who was with us? Where did she go?
Aren't you the Revelator who saved us last time? {nl} We were more than glad to see you back then.
The Goddess must have sent you.{nl}If that's not it.. we already.. It's too scary to think about it.
It was horrible in captivity. {nl} The Vubbes would come and smell us.. {nl} and make us dig here and there using a pickaxe..
Rexipher... Was he really a demon?
You saved us. Thank you so much. {nl} But I have a question for you.
Healing magic. {nl} Can people easily do it?
But listen to my story. {nl} When I was taken to the mine, I injured my knee. {nl}
But a girl touched my knee and the pain was gone. {nl} Even the wound is gone. {nl}
Amazing huh? I will make her a flower ring if we meet again. {nl} But I don't know where she's gone to.
{memo X}Good job.{nl}I will take the Jewel of Prominence.
Strange Sack
Found a letter in the sack
The letter in the sack
Receiver: Drasius{nl}Address: Virdului Cabin{nl}I am sending you the head of the tree with long branches that you ordered.
400 years would have passed by when this revelation reaches you. {nl} Thank you in advance for your continued pursuit of finding the revelation. . {nl}

As I'm sure the demons will prey on the revelation, I will leave this revelation in the hands of Rimgaudis, the first Paladin. {nl} if you find this revelation, it would mean that he had done an excellent job in fulfilling his mission. {nl}
{memo X}The demons have been chasing the revelation before I made this revelation. {nl} Gesti, the leader of the demons whom you have met is one of them. {nl}
Three demon Kings and the demon leaders who follow them. {nl}Giltine is the one who controls all of them. {nl}
All these catastrophes are her plans. {nl} The disasters will continue and at the end of it will be the end of human race. {nl}
I am a very fatal existence for them as I can see all of this. {nl}That's why Giltine will try to revert me to the world's waters. {nl}
Also, they will extend their evil powers to the Goddesses who go against their will. {nl}
But disasters are happening just as I saw them to be. {nl}And it means that the hope, which I saw further away, will also definitely come. {nl}
Dear Savior, our sister Saule is losing her light. {nl} Find her back the light from the colorful valley and you will be guided to the next revelation.
$Revelation of Crystal Mine
Dear Savior, {nl} in order for me to regain my whole appearance and stop the demons, {nl} you must find all the revelations hidden in the axis of all times. {nl}
${memo X}But only you and I can save the world. {nl} I will wait for you in the high gardens.

$Now take the Seal Release Crystal and go to Ramstis Ridge. {nl}The Disciples of Gustas will teach you how to release the seal there.
$Were you not guided yet?{nl}It's the Disciples of Gustas in Ramstis Ridge.{nl}It is made to let only the chosen one enter.
$Ask the mayor of the Miners' Village for directions to Gele Plateau. {nl}I will send the message to the Paladin Master first. {nl}May the blessings of Goddess be with you.
$The high gardens that the Goddess mentioned could be an area within Gele Plateau. {nl}I heard the Paladin Master is there, uploading a long term promise.
{memo X}
{memo X}
{memo X}If you ever fight against us Rodeleros, better be careful of your legs. {nl}Swords pop out from below the shield. {nl}
${memo X}The simplest forms are the strongest ways. {nl}If you want to study the roots of everything, take the path of Elementalist.
$Go straight down the Twin Bridge and you'll arrive at Srautas Gorge.{nl}Go further into the right from the Srautas Gorge and you'll be able to get to Gele Plateau.
$The Paladin Master is in Gele Plateau.{nl}You can get there by riding the cable car.
$This is one of the devices the first Paladin set in preparation for the invasion of the demons. {nl}Many like it are placed to cover the whole of Nefritas Cliff. {nl}
${memo X}You must find Goddess Saule...{nl}The colorful stream mentioned in the revelation may refer to the upper region of Veja Ravine. {nl}Well then, may the blessings of Goddess be with you.
$This is the holy weapon used to fight against Gesti in Nefritas Cliff. {nl}It has been handed down since the times of the first Paladin.
${memo X}Go. Tenet Chapel is located in Tenet Garden.{nl}You must prevent the revelation from falling into the hands of Gesti.
$Go find Gesti. {nl}Tenet Chapel is located in Tenet Garden.
{memo X}There is a way to stop it but only you can do it. {nl}Please, come to Karsta battlefield in Fedimian outskirt.
You need to use the cable car to go from Srautas to Leaf Veil Plateau. {nl}I heard people used to hang baskets on ropes in the past. {nl}Well the cable cars are scary enough for me.
$I came to protect the divine land from the demons. {nl}I heard that the Paladin Master is also in Gele Plateau. It must surely be a big problem. {nl}
$I'm worried for my brother in Nefritas Cliff. {nl}I hope nothing happens to him.{nl}
$We'll have to manage with the remaining dolls left. {nl}Everyone's lives are at stake in Nefritas Cliff so we can't complain about this, right?
$And if you're talking about Rukas Plateau, it's been a while since we pulled out of that place as it wasn't worthy of research anymore.
${memo X}Understanding the root of everything becomes the power of Elementalist. {nl}Wind, Water, Fire, Earth. We pull the strongest powers from the simplest forms.
$Bring the Seal Release Crystal and find Disciple of Gustas in Ramstis Ridge. {nl}He will teach you about the seal.
$The Netherbovines are becoming violent again? {nl}As long as us Rodeleros are standing ground, no monsters shall pass.{nl}
$I used to live in the woods but I came here to do what I had to. {nl}I will do whatever that can be of help.
$Physical enhancing magic is a profound and mysterious field. {nl}If you make good use of it, you can easily identify friends and foes.
$When a seal is released, you must advance to the next seal in Ramstis Ridge.
${memo X}Death may be the price that I pay for the sin I committed. {nl}Even if it is the curse of the demons, it is still for a sin I made.
${memo X}I don't want to... die like this... {nl}Mother...
$Wait. Aren't those Succubus Eyes? {nl}Wow. How did you get them... Can I take a look?
$I've heard about those eyes. {nl}Succubus craved the Cathedral's blessing that were hidden in a necklace, so she put it in her eyes. {nl}
$Did you know I used to be an aspiring Alchemist? {nl}I can turn that back into a necklace. {nl}
$Done. {nl}Do you know about the five Necklaces of Maven?{nl}
$They were created to remind people of the five sins. {nl}Naktis caused them to look like curses on the Pilgrim Path.{nl}
{memo X}Looks like the necklace belongs to you. {nl}If it wasn't for you, the teachings of Maven would have been left as a curse.
$To be honest, I'd like go to Kvailas Forest rather than staying here. {nl}I want to see the source of evil with my own two eyes.
$Thank you. The tools are sold by the blacksmith in Klaipeda. {nl}But before that, there are stones in Stele Road that are known for their quality. I ask for you to retrieve some for me.
$Done. Please place this at the entrance of Royal Mausoleum in Zachariel Crossroad. {nl}This should bring comfort to their souls.
{memo X}Hmm. You're really as good as they say. {nl}Rolandas is waiting for you in Akmens Ridge.
{memo X}Please be careful. {nl}A dark aura similar to the voice a while ago is covering the Thorn Forest. {nl}Especially the Kvailas Forest.. I have sharp ears for things like this..
$The Necroventer that occupied Kule Peak is gone. {nl}Kule Peak should become peaceful again.
$This was prepared for releasing the seals in Tiltas Valley. {nl}The sap was collected little by little over centuries. {nl}So please handle it with care.
$This is it. {nl}Bring the Seal Release Crystal to Ramstis Ridge. {nl}The Disciples of Gustas will welcome you there.
$The day of discovering the true owner of the Great King's inheritance has finally come. {nl}Hurry, meet the Disciples of Gustas in Ramstis Ridge.
$My teacher is poisoned and cannot breathe. {nl}Hurry and borrow an antidote from the others in Akmens Ridge.
$I had no idea it came from Rukas Plateau. {nl}What are they trying to do by releasing the seal? {nl}
$Follow the road on the right to go to Cobalt Forest. {nl}Our town priest there is waiting for you.
$When you have all materials ready, combine them at the Ershike Altar.
{memo X}The evil force was first felt in Kvailas Forest. {nl}The force was very strong so it will remain this way for a while even if you defeat Bramble.
{memo X}The evil force of Kvailas Forest is becoming stronger and our followers are becoming weak. {nl}I hope you can help us. {nl}
$Perhaps the source of evil in Kvailas Forest has become the forest itself? {nl} I only hope this is just an ill-founded worry.
$Everything will be resolved when the evil aura deep inside Kvailas Forest is dealt with. {nl}It's a pity that everyone is only after what's right in front of them.
$Kvailas Forest is the worst. {nl}The evil aura is unquestionably concentrated and even your lives are at stake.
$I miss my family in Cobalt Forest. {nl}And... I want to apologize to my brother for the fight we had.
$I remember singing and soaking my feet in the stream waters with my older brother in Cobalt Forest.
$Can you inform the elderly in Vieta Gorge about this for me? {nl}If you veer left and move up from here, you'll quickly arrive there.
$The most important root must be somewhere in Kvailas Forest. {nl}Maybe we've been reacting around too much. {nl}Cutting off the head root will reduce the forces in this forest.
$I knew it was Evoniphon's poison. {nl}No one else would use a poison this strong.
{memo X}Don't worry. I'll give you the recipe. {nl}Ridimed leaves from there will be enough to make it.
$Is the antidote ready yet? {nl}The situation's grave. He is gradually getting worse.
$Evoniphon sure employed a vicious poison. {nl}We need to hunt him down before he causes more damage...
$Oh, is this the antidote? {nl}Thank you very much. I will let him take it right away. {nl}
$If it wasn't for you, many workers would have lost their lives for nothing. {nl}I will report about this to Uska. {nl}Truly... You were sent by the Goddess!{nl}
$The monsters in the Owl Burial Ground should be a fair bet for you. {nl}Right?
{memo X}The Chaparition in Escanciu Village took a lot of lives. {nl}Please defeat that monster in the name of the Goddess.

{memo X}I'm sorry but can you burn this oration in front of the epitaph in Rukas Plateau? {nl}You have explored different areas of the valley. {nl}I think you are more than qualified to comfort their souls.
$Try and perform a killing spree of the monsters in the Owl Burial Ground. {nl}Around 40 of them? I bet you can't do it.
$I'll go to Ramstis Ridge and release the seals

They are already gone from this world. {nl}They are repeating what happened back then because of their anger for Gaigalas.
This cable car does work. {nl}But the monsters around make it such a hassle to maintain it.
Can you take care of it?
$It's better to use the cable car rather than fighting your way past the monsters.
I thinks monsters are crawling out of the mysterious barrier in Nuotori Cliff. {nl}Can you get rid of that barrier?
Maintenance would be easier now that the barrier is gone.
Go down from the middle of Twin Bridge and you'll arrive at Srautas Gorge. {nl}Go further into the left from there and you'll get to Gele Plateau.
First, defeat the Hanamings around here. {nl}And gather Hanaming Petals while you're at it.
The Miners' Village is a problem but we also haven't gotten any rest from the endless battle. {nl}Defeating those Chupacabras would make it a lot better.
Defeat Vubbe Fighter. {nl}Search Scouts are on stand by in Nudegi Felled Area.
You need to fo further deep from Srautas Gorge to get to Geli Plateau. {nl}Go down from the Twin Bridge and you'll arrive at Srautas Gorge.
You came all the way here after me for that woman? {nl}You'd go that far to save her?
We're looking for a stone with strange engraving like this. {nl}When you see a stone like this, please don't touch it and just let us know.
The Magic Suppressor of Royal Mausoleum can be destroyed with the power of activation stones. {nl}Details can be found in the Magic Suppressor Manual.
Fedimian is just around the corner but we can't get there because of the Cockatrice. {nl}Can you teach them a lesson on how scary men are?
$Denoptic is trying to control the corrupted guardians. {nl}Annihilate them so that the guardians will not fall in its hands.
{memo X}Thank you in the name of the Goddes! {nl}Please defeat the filthy Cockatrice first that are spreading diseases.
Fight with the demons a bit then use the power of barrier to extract the soul. {nl}Then, you defeat the soul. Would you give it a try?
Our squad was given order to hunt down the Unicorn. {nl}Details should be in the command plan..
The plan is to transform into a demon and confuse them. {nl} Please collect Pondell and Pond's clothings first.
{memo X}Activate Malda Altar and the demons nearby it will be sealed. {nl}You must defeat those demons.
I'm tired. I want to rest. {nl}I just need a little time, so can you take care of the demons around here?
Defeat whatever demons you see.{nl}Only then can our brothers can feel safe to protect the chapel.
{memo X}I think I can find a way if I have the core of Red Infro Rocktor. {nl}I can't use magic but that doesn't mean I lost my knowledge.
{memo X}My sould is shredded and trapped in the seal. {nl}Defeat the Experimental Slime that's guarding it and help me get released.
{memo X}I am here and all over the world. {nl}I am collecting fragments of my soul which was torn into pieces long ago.
{memo X}Where are my other pieces..
I am Demon Lord Hauberk. {nl}Helgasercle torn up my soul and a part of me is in the barrier of this tower, {nl}and the rest was spead in the world.
You still have business left?
The Altars here are defensive devices against Royal Mausoleum intruders. {nl}They were built a long time ago so should've be reactivated, {nl}but no one knew how. {nl}
But the seal in Rukas Plateau was the answer. {nl}The altar will not function if it is destroyed {nl}but if we get to activate it before that..
I don't know what Rexipher want to do{nl}but it sure can block him from doing it.
{memo X}It's either Rexipher destroying the seal, or us activating the altar. {nl}Run and don't look back!
{memo X}Aren't you hurt? {nl}Oh, that is the seconds hint of the King.
{nl}The next epitaph is on the left road of Dykine Crossroad. {nl}Third, is it? Looking forward to it.
{memo X}Finally, we've gathered all clues. {nl}Now we must interpret it.
{memo X}Then destroy the Royal Mausoleum Guarding device of Sesija Parvise.
This time, get the Cauliflower sap from the Rusybe Dead Tree Area. {nl}The sap burns well.
Now, I will focus on finding Clymen. {nl} Please remove the nearby demons and suppress their evil power.
{memo X}I can feel Clymen in Ishpirki Entrance. {nl}Hurry and defeat it.
Read the epitaph.
It's the last epitaph.
Allow me to introduce. This friend here is Wreath.{nl}Do you like birds? If not, you can never become a Falconer.

I heard the sound of figthing so I cam here in a hurry..Have you defeated it?{nl}I only spotted Siaulambs.{nl}Well done. You have performanced a meritorious deed.
I feel stuffy.
If you have time, please tell our troops to assemble. {nl}If you don't want to, you may just go ahead to Klaipeda.
Thank you so much for your support.{nl}Follow the road on the left of the camp crossroads. {-scp SCR_DIALOG_NPC_ANIM(
{memo X}Vubbe Fighter is hiding deep in the Nudegi Felled Area. {nl} We got the orders to kill but it may be safer to wait for additional troops.
We should check by rubbing Hallowventer's wooden coals.{nl}The next epitaph is at the right side of Negibas Fields.
$We can suppress the evil forces if the magic of the Royal Mausoleum is released.{nl}This requires a number of activating stones located inside active guardians.
{memo X}It seems that there are more monsters here now compared to the number monsters that were present before I lost my conciousness.{nl}Did something happen to Gabija?
It may be better for Gabija to let her know that we are here.{nl}There's a place that we can ignite a signal light. Let's go.
Good. Since she knows that we came, she will recover her health.{nl}Let's go up to see Gabija.{nl}
I could handle it myself. {nl}Those weaklings would come trembling on their knees to return the parts. {nl} But what if more thieves come while I'm at it?
Welcome, I'm glad to see that you've had a safe journey here. {nl}Before anything else, there are things about this place that the Revelator should know. {nl}
That's why I am thinking about setting fire.{nl}I hope you collect the fats by defeating Malidus.
I leave Ruklys on this land with my regrets and tears.{nl}If there's someone who wants to continue his will, I want to leave my secret on this gravestone.{nl}I will summarize the long writings here.
{memo X}Even if a person is in danger, if he knows that someone will come to help him, he will have the extra energy to endure longer.
If you are a true Revelator, you can find the divine secret at the end of this paper.
The space movement magic field will take you to your preferred floor in the tower.{nl}I don't know if we can use the field anymore. Let's go and find out.
Damn.{nl}They broke it. It is unfixable.
When you activate the device which sets barriers, monsters wont't be able to come in.{nl}The supply device for the demons' power is broken, but we can input the power with other methods.
We have to be careful here.{nl}This is the place where Antares, a dangerous magician, was imprisoned.{nl}We should move up to the next floor quickly.
He was a great magician before.{nl}But, his ideology was too dangerous.

The reason why he was imprisoned here was because he strongly desired the concentrated demons' power here.{nl}What do you think would happen to the tower if hundreds of years of concentrated power exploded all at once?
Gabija is important, but the tower is more dangerous.{nl}Antares may be engaged in something by now.
There are two valves here that control the power device.{nl}The first valve is at the lab room so let's go and destroy it now.
{memo X}Explosion, that was too dangerous.{nl}Let's find a safer way to destroy it.
Antares researched the flow of the demons' power for a long time.{nl}If his research materials are still present, they will help us in destroying those valves.{nl}They must be here somewhere.
This is it. Now I think I know how to break those valves.
Please set this stone and defeat the monsters nearby.{nl}We can collect the energy to recharge the barrier device.
{memo X}A suitable end for a crazy magician.{nl}It could have been dangerous without defensive magics.{nl}We may have touched it without knowing the first valve was destroyed..{nl}
{memo X}Anyways, that's good.{nl}The tower is now safe, so let's go up.
Ah, that's right. Let's also prepare defensive magics in case something happens.{nl}There was a magic written on Antare's materials that we can use when there are explosions.
{memo X}I think I can find a way if I have the core of Red Infro Rocktor. {nl}I can't use magic but that does't mean I lost my knowledge.
Good. We can use it one more time.{nl}
Let's go find the second valve on the central control room.{nl}If we can destroy it, we will be safe no matter what Antares does.
The Jewel of Prominence is somewhat strange.{nl}Something must have went wrong when Antares died in the explosion.
{memo X}Let's check the status while we defeat the monsters with the Jewel of Prominence.
What is happening to the Jewel of Prominence?{nl}It is very instable.
{memo X}Did you just see that monster exploding?{nl}It's definitely strange. it seems as if the power of essence is going crazy.
{memo X}And me.. I feel dizzy..
If it stays like this, the Jewel of Prominence may break.{nl}There must be a stabilizing device somewhere here. Let's go.
{memo X}Ah, the stabilization has come to an end.{nl}I am okay. It's nothing. Just old memory coming back.
The Jewel of Prominence has stopped going crazy.{nl}But, in order to stabilize it fully, we need the Essence of Flame from the fireplace in the middle of the tower.
{memo X}You gathered everything.{nl}Give them to me. Including the Jewel.{nl}I know the way to stabilize it fully so let's go to lab room.
Good! We can activate the device now.
{memo X}You..are the revelator who helped the Paladin Master right?{nl}My name is Grita. I came from the Mage Tower.
{memo X}Help me. Gabija is in danger.{nl}We are gonna lose the tower to the demons if we don't receive help.
There is a way to stop it but only you can do it. {nl}Please, come to Karsta battlefield in Fedimian outskirt.
{memo X}This is then entrance to the tower.{nl}I became unconscious at the tower and lost all the power somehow.{nl}
{memo X}I will take care of you and take you to Gabija.{nl}Are you ready?
All other magicians either died or ran away.{nl}You are the last hope of us. Let's go it.
{memo X}Gabija had not disappeared herself.{nl}To protect the tower from demons, she just could not appear.{nl}
{memo X}Agailla Flurry's is not found is successor, I heard and was borne away instead. To refer it's in order to ensure that a {nl} something important .. I don't know exactly.
I was sealed when my spirit was ripped off by a high class demon.{nl}Please defeat Infrorocktor for me. I promise you that I will not be a burden to you.
Eyes of Surveillance are attached to Infroroktor.
{memo X}Those pieces of another me lost the voices to call you.{nl}Please find my voice again from Arma.
Let's meet at Technical Room 1. {nl}Ah, it will be better if you could get the Blackened Essence from monsters.
{memo X}We need the rope for ceremony to make the shaman doll. {nl} It's on the waist of the Panto Shaman in the Cottage. {nl} Bring it to me.
Please go to Viesa's Altar.{nl}I will follow you.
It's either Rexipher destroying the altar, or us activating the altar. {nl}Run and don't look back!
Looks like the necklace and collection belongs to you. {nl}If it wasn't for you, teachings of Mayvern would have been left as a curse.
Let's give up on this and move to the big transportation magic field instead.
The Asmodian attacked the tower is not the first time, but did Mase Long earthquake up here. Thanks to {nl}, and whether they are by but Gabija disappeared in the world?
That was a trap.{nl}It seems they read our every movement.{nl}
{memo X}There's nothing we can do about it.{nl}Even it would be little late, let's give up on the magic field and destroy those monsters who are coming into the tower first.
The protective barrier device is on the left end of his hallway.{nl}Let's go upstairs right after we activate the device.
The protective barrier device is at the left end of this hallway.{nl}It seems okay yet.
Good!{nl}There won't be more monsters now.{nl}
Soon Let's go to the next floor.{nl}Gabija is awaiting us.{nl}
It will be completed once I have Truffle's poisonous mushrooms at Isdidu Fork.{nl}I am counting on you.
We are the believers of Goddess Saule.{nl}We are here to prevent Thorny Bushes from growing in this forest.{nl}
We have no choice. We should get charcoal ourself.{nl}Those trees with long branches at the square at the brook will do us good.
This is all my fault. I shouldn't have underestimated it.
I told you that there's a way to block those demons at Fedimian.{nl}I will complete the Jewel of Prominence here and help the Goddess Gabija.{nl}
{memo X}Well done.{nl}But, this is just an empty stone.{nl}You can complete it by empowering it with various ingredients.
I will fill the Jewel of Prominence with flame steam.{nl}There is a flame steam which possesses magic in it at the reading room.
{memo X}You should search for it hard.{nl}The flame steam is not clearly visible.
This is enough. Well done.
Now we have to fill the Essence of Fire into the jewel, but it's complicated.{nl}
First, unleash the steam from the Jewel of Prominence.{nl}Then the steam will collect the Essences of Flame that are hovering in the air.{nl}You just have to fill the jar with it. Okay?
Don't worry. It won't hurt you or explode.
Hew .. {nl}We almost completed the Jewel of Prominece!
{memo X}I will collect the sources of the flame into the last pot.{nl}You can get them from the monster that has the power of fire.
Gabija will recover her energy if we could make the Jewel of Prominence completely.
Good!{nl}Now we just have to combine the flame into the jewel.
Let's go to the fusion machine.{nl}We just have to put all the materials in it and the jewel will be completed when we activate the device.
So this is the Jewel of Prominence. I can feel it's great energy.{nl}Let's hurry and give this to Gabija. There's a stairway up on the right side.
To find the Jewel of Prominence, just use this detector.{nl}When you use this detector near the place where the jewel is located, the jewel will come out.
{memo X}The portal that you tried to open is the gate of lies.{nl}The villagers hear are the tricks of Demons' lord, Bramble.
{memo X}I am Saule, the Goddess of the sun.{nl}Everything is just like how Lamia has forseen.
{memo X}It's true that I am looking for the revelator, but I need someone skillful.{nl}I am sorry, but you don't look like the revelator I am looking for.
$Welcome. {nl} Only hard-to-find stuff here.

{memo X}I'm sorry but can you burn this oration in front of the epitaph in Rukas Plateau? {nl}You have explored different areas of the valley. {nl}I think you are more than qualified to comfort their souls.
This place is like a grave for many explorers and historians. {nl} And we study to find more factual history on top of their graves.
Good job.{nl}I will take the Jewel of Prominence.
We came here from the Vubbes' attack.{nl}But, This place seems to be not safe.
The demons have been chasing the revelation before I made this revelation. {nl} Gesti, the leader of the demons whom you have met is one of them. {nl}
Alright, I will tell the troops to assemble
