$Anyway, my guess is that the demon is re-awakening and is controlling the Vubbes.{nl}The Bishop's dream and the Legend of Cunningham... I feel they may be a sign that something huge is about to happen.{nl}
$Finding the cause of the monsters is important,{nl}but I'm more worried about supplies not making it to the Miners' Village.
$Vubbe Fighter is hiding deep in the Nudegi Felled Area. {nl} We got the orders to kill but it may be safer to wait for additional troops.
If you face us as enemies, you should be careful not to lose your legs.{nl}Swords will come out from the lower part of the shields.{nl}
{memo X}I heard the monsters are moving in herds outside Klaipeda.{nl}Instead of defeating them all at once, it will be better to learn my skills.
I think, these words are indicating a very dangerous monster.{nl}Don't you think we should eliminate it?
Ah, if you don't have confidence, the possibility of getting caught is high.{nl}Before you use this scroll, it is important to gain some confidence by fighting against the demons.
I feel happy to see them being defeated.{nl}But, I think I need more research on it.
You should be ready before you take the Light Crystal to the entrance.{nl}It could attract a powerful monster.
I feel relieved to have you beside.{nl}I feel that the fact that Laima has chosen you is very fortunate.
That explosion was too dangerous.{nl}Let's find a safer way to destroy it.
There are many things to protect so we should not irritate those demons and defeat them quietly.{nl}I feel so relieved to have you, revelator.
{memo X}There are rumors about Golems appearing so don't go far too deep. {nl} It will be safer to take the bigger roads where there are less monsters or just head straight to Klaipeda.
You are easily exposed to enemies' attacks when you are using a bow.{nl}So my strategy is to use anything such as a shield or a stone to protect myself.
Most of them are already in my head, but that is a really important material.{nl}It contains information on how to enter the Royal Mausoleum and such.
This map marks all the locations of the sealed devices at Tiltas Valley.{nl}When you release all those seals with the Great King's key, you will know what to do next.
The artifacts which Raymond is looking for are not there so I don't understand why he is keep trying.{nl}I personally think Tama has swallowed them. {nl}What do you think?
Can you see they are all money? I mean the fluids from those trees.{nl}How about it, why don't you try it yourself?
Well done. When you wear this armor, it will be very useful at the crystal mine.
Varkis' Spirit
{memo X}That is my adventure journal.. lots of my diaries are hidden at Rukas Plateau besides that..{nl}I want you to retrieve those..
{memo X}That object is not useful to me anymore now..{nl}If you could find those diaries, I will make you the completed version.
{memo X}Here it is..{nl}The completed version.. I will leave now..

The one who fell seeking for knowledge.{nl}Gone back to the Goddess by becoming a part of the canyon.{nl}Saddened mind would penetrate the gold stones, the liquor that is poured would permeate onto the ground for tears..{nl}
{memo X}Notice/Unfortunately, Varkis passed away. {nl}But, if you go to Varkis' camp, you will meet his spirit#5
$The Eternal Adventure (1)
{memo X}Notice/It is written that the next material is hidden on the way to the neck of the snake cliff!#5
$The Eternal Adventure (2)
$The Eternal Adventure (3)
{memo X}Notice/The spirit of Varkis has disappeared after leaving the completed research material!#5
$The Eternal Adventure (4) - Deleted
Tell him that it would be better to take some rest here
$It would be better to stop the attacks destroying the Royal Mausoleum.
{memo X}Notice/The portal has opened after activating the device!{nl}Check the location of the portal from the map!#7

The search team told you that Vubbe Warriors are at the felled area, but it would be better to wait for the reinforcement. But, since you should go to the Crystal Mine as quickly as possible, let's first defeat those Vubbe Warriors.
Retrieve the diary from the lost bag of Varkis
The adventurer Varkis told you that monsters stole the bag and ran away. Retrieve his diary by finding the bag at way below the Shirnas Highland.
{memo X}Go to the camp of adventurer, Varkis
{memo X}The gigantic monster was defeated, but Varkis passed away. Go back to his camp with the diary.
Move to the camp of Varkis
Varkis passed away. Go back to the camp where Varkis used to reside and meet his spirit.
Collect the research materials of Varkis at Dykyne Intersections.
It seems that Varkis still has some regrets on the research that he used to do when he was alive. Collect his materials at Dykyne Intersections.
Collect the research materials of Varkis at the neck of the snake cliff
It seems that Varkis still has some regrets on the research that he used to do when he was alive. Collect his materials at the nect of the snake cliff.
Look for research materials of Varkis near Apati Cliff
Monsters are attacking. You better defeat them quickly.
It seems that Varkis doesn't have regrets on his research anymore. Talk to him again.
It seems that the newcomer seems to be in a trouble. You better help him out.
The unstable owl told you that it would be better to face Sequoia with divine power. Let's collect the wooden pieces with the divine power of the broken owl sculpture in them.
At the end of Stone Pillar Hill, the portal that leads to the secret location of the Royal Mausoleum was opened after releasing all the seals! Use the portal to go to the secret place.
The treasure hunter, Ethan is saying confidently that he is sure that the tama swalloed all the artifacts. Defeat the tama and look for the artifacts.
I am sure you are competent enough.{nl}Everything was guided by the Goddesses.
The gold that the monsters have in this town will be enough.{nl}Pay the gold to the herb merchant at Kapas Highway.
I feel dizzy.{nl}What am I doing here?
I wish the Goddesses were here.{nl}I don't want to see anything sad anymore.
The proof of the salvation is this Slate?{nl}It just looks like an old slate to me.{nl}
Use the time efficiently
Of course, you should first show your skills.{nl}Defeat Sand Chupacabras and Zinutes.
If you are going to help me, please also take care of the gigantic gray Chupakabras.{nl}They often steal the supplies.
When you defeat Chupakabras, the gigantic gray Chupakabra would appear.{nl}Okay, then I am counting on you.
I can ask for my money back for the others, but that toolbox. {nl}I lost the spirit of stonemason from Moas...
I thank you in the name of the Goddesses!{nl}We should first eliminate those filthy Cockatries that are spreading the disease.
You better eliminate the spirits that are pulled quickly if possible.{nl}Wouldn't it be scary if they resurrect again?
The attacks from the demons are quite aggressive.{nl}I think they would be discouraged if we could somehow defeat Glizardon...
I have a request for you, which is to defeat Pondell and Pond.{nl}They are demon sisters and they are quite a nuisance.
Activate the Malda Altar and the demons nearby it will be sealed. {nl}When you defeat those demons, the altar should absorb the power.
Let's keep an eye on the Jewel of Prominence while we defeat monsters.
I can't tell my name. {nl}Please defeat the observers and unleash the seal on me.{nl}
{memo X}My soul is shredded and trapped in the seal. {nl}Defeat the Experimental Slime that's guarding it and help me get released.
The Holy Arc that had me inside is broken and the observers obtained those pieces.{nl}Please defeat them and complete the Holy Arc.
Our guards love to fight.{nl}The Pantos were not this reckless before. {nl}I wonder if we should be like this when the demons are waiting to march in.
If possible, I want you to defeat Carnivore as well.{nl}It is polluted with the demonic energy and I can't stand it anymore.
Tools for stonemasons? {nl}10,000 Silvers will do.{nl}{nl}
Welcome.
It was made long ago, but any stones will break it.
I need to find the key to open the last seal.{nl}This scroll will open a gap of space. You better be careful since it's unknown what can come out of it.
Hmm. You're really good as they say. {nl}Rolandas is waiting for you in Akmens Ridge.
We will be ready when we rub Monster's poison on the stone with full of vigor.{nl}It will be done when we put this bait on the Alkune Hill.
Can I ask you one more favor?{nl}I want you to defeat the monster at Odega Hills.{nl}It disturbs my research.
A monster in disguise as a Goddess Statue. I pity the souls. {nl}Now the souls may rest in peace. This is all thanks to you.
We didn't just stay put when we were besieged by the monsters. {nl}We sent out Scouts to get away from here but no one came back. {nl}
If you are okay, I want you to search for them.{nl}
$It's going to be hard.{nl}The Thorny Forest keeps growing.
$A dark aura similar to the voice a while ago is covering the thorny forests. {nl}Especially Kvailas Forest.. Please be careful.
Good. {nl}First, defeat the Big Blue Grivas up the hills.
When you throw this bomb to the long branch trees, they will burn.{nl}When you feel they are burnt enough, destroy those tress to get wood coals.{nl}
$Be careful. This place is full of evil energy from Bramble.{nl}You better go back to be safe.
$Ah, it was you, Revelator! Could you help me little more?{nl}I am trying to burn down the thorny vines that are full of evil energy.
There's a demon that I want you to defeat.{nl}The monster is called Likaous at Thorny Pole Garden. It brings vicious atmosphere with him.
$I heard a very ominous voice. It was a voice searching for you.{nl}Please be careful...

$I never thought I would meet someone other than a follower in this place full of thorny vines and monsters.{nl}It's difficult without the protection of the Goddess. Don't you think so, Revelator?{nl}
$So you are the Revelator. The followers are having a hard time due to the thorny vines.{nl}Can you help them, please?
$The evil aura was first felt in Kvailas Forest. {nl}The force was very strong so it will remain this way for a while even if you defeat Bramble.
$The evil aura of Kvailas Forest is becoming stronger and our followers are becoming weak. {nl}I am worried that we may lose to the forces of evil. If only the Revelator can be with us...
$Really?{nl}I will let the other followers know that you are helping them.
$Help me, please. Infroholders are chasing after me.{nl}I don't stand a chance the way they're ganging up on me.
$Put the Matsum's Flower Stamens in this potion and shake it. {nl} It will help you withstand the musky aura of Bramble.
This place is too dangerous. {nl}Please go to a safe area.
Clymen... I can feel it is at Ishpirki Access Road.{nl}Please exterminate it.
$Bramble..{nl}It is a pity that it denies its own fate.{nl}
When I gained my conciousness, a few hundreds of years have passed.
Jane's Spirit
I saved nothing.{nl}Master, Mage Tower, and my peace??nl}
You have no reason to help me, but it's been such a long time that I saw a man alive.{nl}Can you listen to my story if you are okay?
Thanks. It's going to be a long story.
It's too selfish to seek salvation now.{nl}Exhausted. It may be better to eliminate Archon with me.
Salvation?? Would I be able to have hope.{nl}Then, I will count on you.{nl}

You gotta find a way to block the magical power that will be injected with the magical stone of the interaction.{nl}If we could find the documents that Balryus left at Beiniki Prayer's Room, it may not be a meaningless dream...
Salvation. That's the word that I forgot for a long time. I thought hope was extravagant.{nl}All I could do was just depress for a long time.
Okay. Was the document present?
Magic generating stones.{nl}They are at the room of senses and the room of rituals.{nl}
I know the basic composition. I've researched it when I was alive.{nl}But, it won't react if it's not Balryus magical power.
You can find the artifacts of Balryus from Bebaiki chamber.{nl}The magical power would still be there since Balryus was a great magician.
I am sure the magical power still remains.{nl}There's no other way so I hope it still exists.
It's fortunate that the magical power still remains.{nl}First, let's stop the magic generating stone near the room of senses.
I hid the magic generating stones among the fakes in the room of senses.{nl}But, with the brooch you found, you will be able to distinguish the real ones from the fakes.
Keep this in mind. Pick out the real magic generating stones and stop the magical power.{nl}If you touch on the fakes, all magic generating stones will be activated again.
I felt earnestness for the first time in hundreds of years.{nl}To prevent it from ending meaninglessly, I will pray to the Goddesses.
The magical power that came from the room of senses has completely disappeared.{nl}Now, we just have to block the room of rituals.
The room of rituals is slightly different from the room of senses.{nl}Although, they are the same that you have to shut down the magical power of all magic generating stones.{nl}
You will know how to handle it when you control it yourself.{nl}But, if you feel something went wrong, use the magical power of Balryus.
With the warp magic field under me, you could quickly go to the room of rituals.{nl}I hope you are successful...
The magic generating stones in the room of rituals affect the other magic generating stones nearby.{nl}We could start over with Balyus' magic.
The magical power that was supplied to the magical stone of the interaction has been completely shut off... {nl}Do you think we can really wish for the salvation.
We are all ready. But, that Akorn is different from the Akorn from your era. {nl}It may be better to leave it like that.
We have an other way. The sealed artifact among Balryus artifacts...{nl}I heard there are some of them in Uzdaromo stone chamber that were created to suppress the demons.
I already gave up the hope that I would be free a few hundreds years ago.{nl}In fact, I still can't believe it.
The seal that is suppressing the demonic energy... that's it.{nl}Now everything is ready.
Now, when the magical stone of the interaction stops, I will be free with Akorn.{nl}
I will tell you one more time. You should not think of Akorn that was present in your era.{nl}It will be hard without using the seal.
In fact, I am okay even if I disappear like this.{nl}It's so thankful that you care for me, but I don't want you to get hurt.
We are almost at the moment of being released from the restraint that was on us for hundreds of years.{nl}
I can be saved. I... finally...{nl}I can't thank you enough.{nl}
I will now leave to the Goddesses.{nl}Thank you. Thank you so much...
How's going?{nl}We can alleviate the strange energy in this region when we enhance the magic field.
{memo X}If I only had little more time...{nl}My documents... I can't leave them...
{memo X}The objects are useless to me now...{nl}Okay. Maybe you... My documents at Dykyne Crossroad...
I don't have regrets anymore... but, be careful about that man.
Let's see, while I am cleaning this...{nl}I am sorry, but while I am bringing the brush and the tools for the rubber copy, can you take care of the tombstone at Gritis Hall?
Will be wandering when the string of the destiny disconnects...{nl}It must mean Laima Goddess... But there's a rumor that she appeared... It's complicated.
When someone borns with a gold spoon, life will be good.
{nl}What, what the hell...
It's too soon to be disappointed.{nl}When I went to Vegio Cliffs, there was one more tombstone.{nl}
But, it seems that the ink won't be smeared due to the mosses.{nl}The juice of Crout Grass will solve it. I forgot to bring it when I came back.
Don't accept the forecasts of the oracles as the foresight of the future.{nl}Sometimes, they could help us determine what's right and wrong as we live on.{nl}
Was it difficult? But, you will soon know.{nl}You will soon find the clue that would solve the interwined world.

When you find all the grass juice of Crouts, rub them onto the tombstones at Vegio Cliff until the mosses rub out.{nl}It is famous for having the smell that lures the monsters... I do have a good assitant.
You will see the effects right away when you rub the grass juice on it, but you should leave it for a while.{nl}The mosses will go away.
It wasn't effective? I guess the moss is not normal.{nl}Hmm. Then I guess I should ask Vaidotas. There must be some way.
Okay then I will go. {nl}Ah, can I ask you to get the bone powders of monsters?{nl}I need something sticky that would help the ink to be smeared well.
Luckily, Vaidotas gave me a good one.{nl}I heard you should use this special ink with the sticky liquid.
Okay. I want you to do the last rubber copy with this.{nl}My legs ache since I travelled too far...
I have a good feeling about this.{nl}Don't you think we may be able to find decent forecast this time?
The world for the death of the death also would exist
{nl}Death after death? This... This may be the forecast that I was looking for.{nl}
I should research more on this forecast. {nl}Thank you so much!
While I am interpreting this, I will give you the rope with a magnet so please go to the well with that.{nl}I saw a gold plate on the floor. If that's the plate, it will come up after being attached.
There's no strange reason.{nl}The people used to live here even before the empire was built here.{nl}
A small village becomes a big village and then a city...{nl}And then it will be forgotten.
I told you a while ago, but if possible, I would have pulled it out.{nl}Please beware of the surroundings near you.
Difficult, difficult...{nl}The words are hard to understand.
I guess it was the gold plate.{nl}It was lucky that the well was dried... If not, it could have been horrible.{nl}
I will organize them and show you later.{nl}You are the revelator. They will help your journey to find the Goddesses.
It seems that the gold plates that you've brought can't be worked due to the rusts.{nl}Why did they record on the gold plate...
In fact, I didn't know what this gold plate was.{nl}Since this place is the hometown of Demetrius, I came here expecting something may be present.{nl{
Nothing was engraved on it, rather it was full of rusts.
At then, my eyes were ignited with flame.{nl}Demetrius has something to tell you.
Yes. Now is not the time to just complain. First, I should make the rust remover.{nl}I want you to obtain the inner core of Hallowventor Magician.
Defeat the rusts with the rust remover and maintain it with the anticorrosive agent. {nl}If it weren't you, I wouldn't have done it.
Fast indeed.{nl}Okay. I will make the acidic solution with this. It will become the basis of the rust remover.
Secondly, when we sprinkle the rust powders, some monsters react.{nl}Collect some boiling liquid from that monster. A lot of it.
Ah. If you sprinkle it too much, it may endure all the monsters nearby.{nl}
I went to meet Alchemist in Mine Village because of Rust Remover and Acidic Solution.{nl}He was being so arrogant...
Well done. {nl}This place is almost completed so go help Alruida near Apsuba Hall.
Ah, I forgot to tell you. {nl}He is my ally. He is probably looking for the gold plate at the great hall.
Alruida
You came here since Justas told you to help?{nl}I was tired as hell so I really welcome you.{nl}
First, we should look for the gold plate at the great hall.{nl}Shall we start?
Someone should research at the camp and the other person should look for the gold plate.{nl}That's why I am here. I am not a coward like Justas.{nl}
Now, I know all the locations of the gold plates, but I can't do anything about the monsters.{nl}It is so fortunate that you would help me. really.
This reaction reagent only reacts to the gold plates from the specific era.{nl}The gold plate that shows boiling response is the one that we are looking for. You understand right?
We gotta distinguish the real ones by finding out when the gold plate was created.{nl}We should look for the gold plate that was built before the establishment of the kingdom.
The next one is at Apsuba Hall.{nl}The gold plate is under the bushes in the corner, but I can't do anything about it myself.
Originally, it was forgotten and was deep in the ground.{nl}But, Medis Diena was in fact beneficial.{nl}
As the land caved over, they were carried away to the various places in Istora Ruins...{nl}That's our prediction.
Be careful all the time. The monsters here rush in scarelessly.
It is a disaster to someone and it is a blessing for the other.{nl}I can remember the words from the old literature.
Oh! That's it. Give it to me. Let's see... I should first make it corrode.
The gold plate that you found for me a while ago... I think the next part is remaining.{nl}The gold plate that I know is that one so I don't know what to do from now.{nl}
Ah, there is one place that I haven't searched yet. Polsas Highway.{nl}Could you go there for me?
Bring this detector.{nl}From the place where you can feel the reaction, the gold plate must be there.
That's it! Now we found all the records.{nl}You've done it well. Now, I should sprinkle this rust remover so give it to me.
As I expected, this gold plate was the last one.{nl}Now we've collected all gold plates... I think I know what's written on them.{nl}
Can you give this to Justas?
So Alruida did it and the gold plate that we didn't know...{nl}Okay. We solved all the puzzles. Please wait a bit.
Justas must be waiting.{nl}Please give it to him.
I never thought that the gold plate would explode. I am sorry.{nl}I will gather the contents all at once later and show you.
These are the contents that I never thought about.{nl}The Goddesses and the humans once used to live together. And the demons?{nl}
If Demetrius is sane, this record... okay.{nl}I promised you that I will show you the record so read the copy yourself.{nl}Well done indeed!
They were gentle monsters but suddenly became vicious. {nl}Have you also heard anything like this?
Revelator, we are in trouble. Please help us!{nl}As you can see, the workers are dying due to the poison of the monsters.{nl}
It's so fortunate that you are here.{nl}How come I can't hear anything from the soldiers who went to defeat Gorgon.
{memo X}Mirtis is dead, but the Vubbes are still following its order.{nl}And there's also a rumor that stronger Vubbes were spotted at the 2nd lot.{nl}
The village will be in mess if those Vubbes come out from the mine.{nl}Could you check the 2nd lot in Crystal Mine if you are okay?
You can go down to 2nd lot from the isolated district in the 3rd floor in Crystal Mine.{nl}Okay, then I am counting on you.
They are more dangerous Vubbes.{nl}We can't guarantee the safety of Klaipeda.
The Vubbes climbed upto the 1st lot? {nl}It's worse than I expected.
This is the scent I mixed exclusively for Vubbes. {nl}This will cause lethargy and fear.{nl}
It is a problem that it is still in the test stage, but you can't do anything about it at the moment.{nl}I will put it into the incense burner so please place it at 2nd lot in Crystal Mine.
I am researching with respect to various aspects so that it would never occur again.{nl}I can't think of a better way besides the scent at the moment.
Well done indeed.{nl}This is for testing so I don't know how long it would last, but I guess it would be safe for a while.
I am dizzy since the Pantos are keep trying to get out from Gelli Plateau.{nl}If they go into the region where people live, that will be a big problem.{nl}
So I am thinking about sprinkling the scent of Moas onto the way to Gelli Plateau.{nl}Moas are the biggest enemies of Pantos. I will think about a way to prevent it from going out somehow.
Are you going to help me? Then It will be grateful.{nl}Moas are spotted near Piene Fields. I want you to get their lumps.
Just get the lumps of Moas.{nl}I will do the rest.
Well done.{nl}I will do the rest. Thank you.
I am blocking Pantos from getting out of Gelli Plateau with Era.{nl}I will put something on the way which Pantos will be scared.{nl}
They are the things that can't be done by me...
Really? First, I need Fishermen's eyes and the essences of Ellums. {nl}I heard they live at the entrance of Katyn Forest.
I never went upto the entrance of Katyn Forest so I am scared.{nl}I heard that is the road where spirits lost their ways.
Damn. Disgusting.{nl}I will make the strings which Pantos will be scared.
Okay. I made the strings.{nl}Now, could you put them on the Srautas Gorge and Nepritas Cliffs?
To tell you exactly.{nl}Hm... I will just mark it on the map.
Thanks for helping me.{nl}This must be effective so you can feel you did something worthwhile.
Do you know about Tilenis Prince who went missing while he was fleeing to Klaipeda?{nl}The mayor went out to welcome him, but they all went missing.{nl}
But recently, the brooch of the mayor was discovered.{nl}But, we can't investigate it publicly... Can you investigate for us?
The place where the brooch was discovered is called Sidabra Rest Area in Veya Valleys.{nl}And please accept this.{nl}
These are the eyes of the spirits that were created by requesting to Bokor Master.{nl}They make things visible. They will be helpful.
$The Spirit of Klaipeda's Mayor
I am... Okay.{nl}He was fighting again. Prince...
{memo X}Most of them died while returning with the colleagues of the prince.{nl}But, they weren't guided even after their deaths. {nl}
When they realized that, they continuously fought with them.{nl}The people who are serving the tree... they kidnapped the prince.
I can't stop this fight.{nl}Please save the prince...
The mayor... he already passed away.{nl}But, the prince may be still alive.{nl}
The people who are serving the trees. I guess I should investigate little more.{nl}Thanks for helping me.
I am okay even if I don't get guided.{nl}Please guide the prince...
The villagers of Andale Village who were slaughtered by the demons...{nl}I am sure they were scared. They must have had regrets.{nl}
{memo X}We want to mourn for the ones who died.{nl}Don't you want to be with me.

The resentment of the villagers in Andale village is floating around as a negative energy.{nl}Fill the beads I will give to you with the essences of Tini, absorb their resentment and bring them to me.
They had so much pains and felt unfair.{nl}This should never occur again.
With your help, the fight with Bramble has ended.{nl}But, his thorny vines are spreading with vicious energy.{nl}
If we leave it like that, the whole forest will be covered with thorny vines.{nl}But, since my power is not complete yet... I want to ask help from you.
You should eliminate the thorny vines that are on the way to Gate Route.{nl}If we don't block here, Siaulai Forest will also be covered with the thorny vines.
The vicious energy that spurts out from the thorny vines is very bad for humans.{nl}I hope you will be okay.
This is just only the slightest part.{nl}If we don't defeat the Thorny Forest completely, the thorny vines will keep spreading.
$The source of all thorny vines is Bramble... and Sirdgela Forest where he used to stay.{nl}To purify the forest, please locate my crystal that has my power in it.
I am sorry that I put heavy burden on your shoulders. {nl}But, you will be able to do it.
Thanks for your efforts.{nl}I will be keep staying here until Thorny Forest recovers it's original status.
Unvisible substance... I mean spirits.{nl}I am researching about the relationship between the spirits and the magical power.
I just don't have time to get the essences that are needed for the experiment. {nl}I think you will be able to help me.
Bring this essence of chill.{nl}When you use this to the monsters in Poslinkis Forest, the spirits will be frozen.{nl}

When you defeat that monster, you will be able to obtain frozen spirit fragments.{nl}Put that into the magical power condenser. I've used them long time ago, but some of them should be still remaining.
I've used it long time ago so it may show some strange results.{nl}That's why I needed your help.
This innocent essence of chill... It is as I thought.{nl}Ah, you were almost on the blink of the death. That's why I called you.
As I was tiding up the objects of my older brother, strange beads came out.{nl}It was written on the memo that the beads are there to find the hidden objects of him easily.{nl}
But the manual... It will be hard for me.{nl}So how about you have it?
I mean. They told me to defeat the monsters near this bead.{nl}Then the monsters' magical power will recharge the bead. It's too hard for me.
I know it's sad, but we should live on. {nl}I can't just stay sad when I think about my brother.
Is recharging enough?{nl}I feel sad again as I look at that bead again.
The bead will tell us where the hidden objects of my brother are located.{nl}I don't know what's gonna come out, but please use them well.
If I can't have it, I hope it gets used for a better objective.{nl}I am sure my brother also thinks like that.
My disciple created the magic summon field, but something is wrong.{nl}Maybe... it is connected to the different world. {nl}
If it goes wrong, the demons would come out to this world.{nl}Please. I will stop the summon ritual here so please break the magic field at Aqueduct region.
We can't do anything if the portal completely opens.{nl}What the hell is happening at Aqueduct region?
Succeeded?{nl}I think there's something that connects to the other world at Aqueduct region.{nl}What the hell is that...
Disciple Ramelie
The sealed tower that was protected by the revelator is being attacked again.{nl}But, it can't be protected by us and the villagers.
The first seal of the sealed tower is already destroyed by the attacks from the demons.{nl}The second seal still remains, but I don't know how long we can hold up.
The Goddess asked us to protect the seal. {nl}Now, only one we can trust is you, the revelator.
Is the seal okay?{nl}I don't know how many times I've prayed to wish that you are okay.
Now is the time to restore the first seal.{nl}I know it's going to be hard, but I can't seek help for this.
Are you really going to help? How grateful...{nl}First fill the crest of Austeja Goddess with the sacred energy near the altar.{nl}
When you dedicate the completed crest of the Goddess to the sealed tower, the seal will be filled again.{nl}
Even if you've done the dedication, you can't seal the vicious energy completely. {nl}This attack will not be the last. I hope the Goddess return fast.
We can't just rely everything on the Goddess.{nl}But, I don't know if we could hold up anymore.
I am so grateful since you are helping us with the restoration of the seal.{nl}But, I don't know how long this seal would hold up... I hope Austeja comes back soon.
I will comfort this.{nl}
Their pain, resentment, wrath and sadness...{nl}I hope they all forget in the arms of the Goddess.
The Chapparitions in Esanchiu village took away lots of lives.{nl}Defeat them in the name of the Goddesses.

I'm sorry...but,{nl}Can you burn this oration in front of the epitaph in Nepatogu Fields of Rukas Plateau? {nl}You have explored different areas of the valley. I think you are more than qualified to comfort their souls.
{memo X}key to check the map #7
{memo X}Notice/!/The box appeared!{nl}Check the box inside while avoiding monsters' attacks!#7
{memo X}Notice/You failed to get the treasure of the stonemason's family!{nl}Pipoti has dissappeared, but you will meet him again in the future!
{memo X}Notice/Obtained the diary of Varkis{nl}Let's bring it back to Varkis!
{memo X}Notice/Rescue Varkis under attacks! Defeat Lithorex and save him!#5
{memo X}Notice/Unfortunately, Varkis passed away. {nl}But, if you go to Varkis' camp, leave his diary#5

Talk with the spirit of Jane
Jane's spirit is not leaving from dangerous Akorn. Ask her why.
Listen from Jane's spirit
It seems that something complicated is going on with Jane. Listen from Jane's spirit what's the matter.
There is always a way
It seems that Jane's spirit is trying to take some extreme measures. Talk to her slowly to help her.
Look for the records of Balryus at Beikini praying room

Jane's spirit told you that if you look at the records which Balryus left, you may obtain more information about the magical stone of the interaction. Read the records which Balryus left at Beikini pray room.
You've found a way to block the magical energy of the magical stone of the interaction from the records of Balryus. Go back to Jane's spirit and let her know.
According to the information on the magical stone of the interactionn which Balryus left, there's a way to save Jane. Talk to Jane about it.
Search the keepstakes which possess the magical power of Balyus

Jane's spirit told you that in order to stop magic generating stones that is supplying the magical power to the magical stone of the interaction, Balryus' magical power is needed. Look for the objects that are likely to possess Balryus magical power at Bebaiki Chamber.
You found the brooch that you could feel the great magical power. Go back to Jane's spirit to determine whether it is real.
You've found the brooch that possesses Balryus' magical power. Use this to talk with Jane's spirit how to stop the magic generating stones.
Stop the magic generating stones in the room of senses

Use the brooch with Balryus' magical power at the room of senses to find the real magic generating stones and stop them. If you stop fake stones, all magic generating stones will start to generate magical power again.
You've stopped all magic generating stones in the room of senses. Go back to Jane's spirit.
You stopped magic generating stones in the room of senses and now is the time to stop the stones in the room of rituals. Listen to Jane's spirit.
Stop the magic generating stones in the room of rituals

The magic generating stones in the room of senses influence the other magic generating stones nearby. If you accidently touch on them, you could reset them using the brooch with Balryus' magical power.
You've stopped all magic generating stones in the room of senses. Go back to Jane's spirit.
What's bad about being careful
You've blocked the magical power that is going into the magical stones of interaction by stopping all magic generating stones. Talk to Jane's spirit again.
Search for the keepstakes of sealed Balryus in Uzdaromo stone chamber

Jane told you that when the magical stones of the interaction completely stop, Akorn will be released with you. To defeat the released Akorn easily, look for usable objects that Balryus created when he was alive.
You've unleashed the seal and obtained the stamp that suppresses the demonic energy. Return to Jane's spirit with this.
You are ready to fight against Akorn. Talk to Jane's spirit if this will be enough.
Stop the magical stones of the interaction

{memo X}Investigate the sacred object of the religious body

{memo X}Tell Sigis Yuta's apology
{memo X}As I look around, I can see the sacred object of Zemyna Goddess. I am gonna go there to examine it.{nl}Since it belongs to Zemyna, she will give me some answer!{nl}

{memo X}I am worried that the corpses may wake up again and interrupt the ritual.{nl}When you go to the burial chamber over there, you will see coffins where the corpses are in.{nl}Please destroy those coffins before the corpses wake up.

{memo X}I can see the sacred object with the shape of a tree over there.{nl]I think that is the sacred object which the Tree Sect of the Truth received from Zemyna Goddess.{nl}Trees symbolize Zemyna Goddess so I am sure the Goddess gave them the sacred object!

{memo X}While you are destroying the coffins, be careful that the lids of the coffins do not open.{nl}I destroyed a few coffins myself, and I found out that the corpses out from the coffins and attack when the lids are open.

{memo X}The corpses didn't attack since you've destroyed the coffins.{nl}But, I couldn't check the sacred object. I could not get near to the sacred object.{nl}It was like as if something was pushing me.

{memo X}The grave guard who manages here, Catacomb may know a little about that sacred object and the barrier.{nl}But, I can't talk to the grave guard.{nl}The grave guard shouted at me while I was preparting for the ritual after entering here.{nl}Could you find out about the sacred object of the Goddess from the grave guard on behalf of me?

{memo X}When I entered Catacomb to look for the traces of the Goddess, what I encountered were the corpses that were interrupting the ritual.{nl}After seeing teh corpses walk out from the coffins, I destroyed the coffins before they wake up.{nl}The grave guard who saw that shouted at me madly because I didn't show respect to the dead ones.{nl}I did that because I thought that was better than seeing the corpses wake up again...

{memo X}The sacred object of the Goddess? What the hell. Are you on the same side with that rude Bokor?{nl}If that's so, get our from this place. I get mad whenever I think about that Bokor.{nl}He destroyed all the coffins where the corpses were in.{nl}I can't understand how he could do such thing!

{memo X}Please tell well to the grave guard. I have to find Zemyna Goddess.{nl}The underground is also the territory of Zemyna Goddess so the reason why the corpses here are resurrecting is because the Goddess is not here.

{memo X}This is absurd. The dead ones are waking up again...{nl}If someone did this purposely, nothing will be more insulting than this!{nl}Who would you suspect the most when the corpses are waking up from the grave?

{memo X}If this was really done by Bokor, then I should help the corpses to rest again.{nl}They may resurrect again if I bury them under the ground so please purify their bodies with your respect using this torch.
{memo X}Why are you hesitating! Move fast! I can't see it anymore...
{memo X}Thank you for helping their rest on behalf of me...{nl}It was hard for me as a grave guard to point the sword at those people who I should take care for.

{memo X}I saw the sacred object of the Goddess which Bokor said before. That's the sacred object created by the guys in the Tree Sect of the Truth.{nl}They said they are the official disciples of Zemyna Goddess and since this grave belongs to the Goddess, they will ask the Goddess to bless the plce.{nl}I think the corpses started to wake up after the guys set the sacred object here.{nl}But, I can't get near to that sacred object.{nl}

{memo X}...Ah! That's right!{nl}When you go deep inside, you will see the box that contains the objects which my father used to use.{nl}Please pull out the spell doll from there. I should go, but I am scared to walk through the corpses...

{memo X}From long time ago, the lunatic Bokor or Necromancer used to come to Catacomb secretly sometimes.{nl}The did some insane experiments on the corpses here.{nl}My father created the spell doll to protect Catacomb from the ones who try to mess up this sacred grave.{nl}When you put magical power into the spell doll, it will find the energy that is messing up the grave and destroy that energy.

{memo X}Our family is guarding the grave for generations. On Medis Diena, my father got into the incident and passed away so I am guarding the grave after that. I didn't learn anything from him, but now I am the guardian here...
{memo X}Yes! This spell doll is it! I haven't used it for a long time, so I gotta check whether it's working properly.

{memo X}Now bring this doll to the place where the sacred object is.{nl}If the cause of the awakening of the corpses here is that sacred object, the spell doll will break the barrier and destroy the sacred object.
{memo X}This is the spell doll that my father used to use. We won't have any problem if we just follows how my father used to do... Just like how my father used to do...

{memo X}What...? What did you just say?{nl}The spell doll broke the barrier and attacked the sacred object, but the doll was destroyed instead?{nl}That's impossible... Maybe it was really the sacred object of the Goddess so that's why the doll was destroyed...{nl}But the fact that the doll broke the barrier means its power is the vicious energy...{nl}
{memo X}If this is related to the Goddess, I can't handle it myself.{nl}Since the barrier was destroyed, ask Bokor to check the sacred object as well.
{memo X}Wow... You broke the barrier. That's splendid.{nl}Hmm... About the doll... Maybe the doll was impaired. It is the sacred object of Zemyna Goddess, but what do you mean by vicious energy.{nl}
{memo X}Anyways, since the barrier was destroyed, let's go with me. I will check it myself.{nl}Can you go there first? I will go right away when I am done preparing for the ritual.
{memo X}The spell doll... Vicious energy... Ahhaha... The grave guard is so funny...
{memo X}I saw it... That monster... It was the grave guard... The sacred object a while ago is not Zemyna's! I am sorry for being selfish...

{memo X}Due to my wrong faith, I didn't suspect the vicious sacred object and broke the coffins... I am disappointed myself...{nl}Now, since the vicious sacred object is gone, my abilities would help calm down the mess.{nl}
{memo X}To express my apology, I want to help the grave guard.{nl}Can you pass my apology to him?
{memo X}Those gentiles! They used the name of the Goddess and did this...{nl}They should not insult the dead ones like this. I want chase them right away and make them pay for it...{nl}

{memo X}But, as a grave guard, I think we should first stabilize Catacomb.{nl}Thanks. I realized that I also have to take care for the resurrected ones' rest as a grave guard.{nl}Since Bokor said he would help me, I will protect the ones that have remained.{nl}
{memo X}The Tree Sect of the Truth crossed here
and entered the Mausoleum of Karail

{memo X}.{nl}They are going to looking for something that will be used to spread their doctrines...{nl}If you get a chance to go to the Mausoleum of Karail, please investigate about them.{nl}I think they are insane.
{memo X}You are not here... Where have you disappeared to... Zemyna Goddess...

This place became dangerous because of monsters emerging since Medis Diena.{nl}Quickly return while you can, because Kepa's will soon be marching in.
You were telling that we need to assemble, right?{nl}Please search my luggage first and return quickly, so I'll go as soon as I can.
Have you tried offering your worship to a Goddess Statue yet?{nl}The Goddesses might have forsaken us, but I still believe in them.
I was worried that the monsters caused harm to the Goddess Statue.{nl}Even though the world is messed up.. It's terrible.
Hey, I'm really in a bind.{nl}Who knew that the Kepa could grow so big.. Is it because of Medis Diena?
Don't forget to worship a Goddess Statue when you see one.{nl}It'll give you a blessing. I hope the Goddess hasn't forgotten about us.
We need to assemble already?{nl}Even though the world may be on the brink of destruction, I can't accept this kind of insane order.{nl}I have enough missions on my hand as it is.
Alright. This should be enough.{nl}Here is a pill that instantly restores your stamina.. I'll give you one as a gift since I have enough.{nl}
I heard the news from my men and I was starting to become worried.{nl}With how messed up the world is, if it ended well, all's well.{nl}
When travelling all over the Kingdom, you might be able to find the scattered Goddess Statues.{nl}Try to offer worship to these statues to receive blessings.
Press {img F10 40 40} to open the Help menu for more information.
Thank you for the regards from Laimonas.{nl}You should enter Klaipeda. Uska is waiting for the Revelators.
There might be more of these Large Kepas roaming in the area nearby.{nl}Could you take a look for me, please?{nl}
Just like I said so, right? It was this instinct that kept me alive during Medis Diena.
It's been too long, my men should've come back, but I haven't heard anything from them yet.{nl}I know it's been four years since Medis Diena, but my men are getting too relaxed recently.
